table.name: TABLEAU_HS_REFERRALS_FY21
table.viewSql: select --count(*) hs.homestudy_id, hs.uac_program_id, hs.referral_id, hs.referring_facility_name, refstat.referral_status, case when hs.expedited = 0 then 'No' when hs.expedited = 1 then 'Yes' end as expedited, exped.reason_expedited, spec.special_instructions, refreas.ref_reason, hs.acceptance_date, hs.exp_closure_date, hs.referral_date from (select * from uacportal.uac_homestudy_case_referral where date_created >= date '2020-10-01') hs left outer join uacportal.list_ref_reason refreas on refreas.ref_reason_id = hs.reason_for_referral left outer join uacportal.list_referral_status refstat on refstat.referral_status_id = hs.referral_status left outer join uacportal.list_reason_expedited exped on exped.reason_expedited_id = hs.reason_expedited left outer join uacportal.list_hs_special_instr spec on spec.special_instr_id = hs.special_instructions

table.name: TABLEAU_INDIVIDUAL_SERVICE_PLANS_LEAN
table.viewSql: select --count(*) service_plan_id, uac_program_id, orientation_start_date, orientation_end_date, assessment_start_date, assessment_end_date, medical_start_date, medical_end_date, ea_start_date, ea_end_date, rl_start_date, rl_end_date, ic_start_date, ic_end_date, gc_start_date, gc_end_date, ars_start_date, ars_end_date, cm_start_date, cm_end_date, lo_start_date, lo_end_date, v_start_date, v_end_date, ep_start_date, ep_end_date, ec_start_date, ec_end_date from uacportal.uac_individual_service_plan where (isdeleted is null or isdeleted = 0)

table.name: TABLEAU_INDIVIDUAL_SERVICE_PLANS_LEAN_FY21
table.viewSql: select --count(*) service_plan_id, uac_program_id, orientation_start_date, orientation_end_date, assessment_start_date, assessment_end_date, medical_start_date, medical_end_date, ea_start_date, ea_end_date, rl_start_date, rl_end_date, ic_start_date, ic_end_date, gc_start_date, gc_end_date, ars_start_date, ars_end_date, cm_start_date, cm_end_date, lo_start_date, lo_end_date, v_start_date, v_end_date, ep_start_date, ep_end_date, ec_start_date, ec_end_date from uacportal.uac_individual_service_plan where date_created >= date '2020-10-01' and (isdeleted is null or isdeleted = 0)

table.name: TABLEAU_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT_FY21
table.viewSql: select --count(*) initial_intakes_id, uac_program_id, uac_arrival_date, uac_arrived_time, cor, date_departure_cor, case when had_medical_issue_past30 = 0 then 'No' when had_medical_issue_past30 = 1 then 'Yes' end as had_medical_issue_past30, case when had_medical_issue_ever = 0 then 'No' when had_medical_issue_ever = 1 then 'Yes' end as had_medical_issue_ever, case when has_allergy = 0 then 'No' when has_allergy = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_allergy, case when has_dietary_needs = 0 then 'No' when has_dietary_needs = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_dietary_needs, case when taking_medication = 0 then 'No' when taking_medication = 1 then 'Yes' end as taking_medication, case when doc_visit_or_stayedin_hosp = 0 then 'No' when doc_visit_or_stayedin_hosp = 1 then 'Yes' end as doc_visit_or_stayedin_hosp, case when has_tb_hist = 0 then 'No' when has_tb_hist = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_tb_hist, case when has_seizures_hist = 0 then 'No' when has_seizures_hist = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_seizures_hist, case when have_scars_tattoos = 0 then 'No' when have_scars_tattoos = 1 then 'Yes' end as have_scars_tattoos, case when feel_safe = 0 then 'No' when feel_safe = 1 then 'Yes' end as feel_safe, case when fear_someone = 0 then 'No' when fear_someone = 1 then 'Yes' end as fear_someone, signature_date, date_arrival_us, case when child_room_location = 0 then 'No' when child_room_location = 1 then 'Yes' end as child_room_location, case when roomassignmentsafe = 0 then 'No' when roomassignmentsafe = 1 then 'Yes' end as roomassignmentsafe, case when anyinappcomments = 0 then 'No' when anyinappcomments = 1 then 'Yes' end as anyinappcomments, identifyas, identifyasother, case when istransorintersex = 0 then 'No' when istransorintersex = 1 then 'Yes' end as istransorintersex, case when tellsexualpreference = 0 then 'No' when tellsexualpreference = 1 then 'Yes' end as tellsexualpreference, case when isanythingthere = 0 then 'No' when isanythingthere = 1 then 'Yes' end as isanythingthere, case when lotofcomments = 0 then 'No' when lotofcomments = 1 then 'Yes' end as lotofcomments, case when haseversexuallyactive = 0 then 'No' when haseversexuallyactive = 1 then 'Yes' end as haseversexuallyactive, case when haseversexuallyactiveboth = 0 then 'No' when haseversexuallyactiveboth = 1 then 'Yes' end as haseversexuallyactiveboth, case when didperformsexualfavours = 0 then 'No' when didperformsexualfavours = 1 then 'Yes' end as didperformsexualfavours, case when anytrouble = 0 then 'No' when anytrouble = 1 then 'Yes' end as anytrouble, case when hadanytalk = 0 then 'No' when hadanytalk = 1 then 'Yes' end as hadanytalk, case when gendernonconfirming = 0 then 'No' when gendernonconfirming = 1 then 'Yes' end as gendernonconfirming, case when anycriminalcharges = 0 then 'No' when anycriminalcharges = 1 then 'Yes' end as anycriminalcharges, anymentaldisability, disabilitylist, physicalsize, case when otherspecificinfo = 0 then 'No' when otherspecificinfo = 1 then 'Yes' end as otherspecificinfo, case when clinicianshared = 0 then 'No' when clinicianshared = 1 then 'Yes' end as clinicianshared, case when childoryouth = 0 then 'No' when childoryouth = 1 then 'Yes' end as childoryouth, case when howtoreportthreats = 0 then 'No' when howtoreportthreats = 1 then 'Yes' end as howtoreportthreats, case when movedtoprivateroom = 0 then 'No' when movedtoprivateroom = 1 then 'Yes' end as movedtoprivateroom, case when movedtoroomarea = 0 then 'No' when movedtoroomarea = 1 then 'Yes' end as movedtoroomarea, case when alternativebathroom = 0 then 'No' when alternativebathroom = 1 then 'Yes' end as alternativebathroom, case when educationalgroup = 0 then 'No' when educationalgroup = 1 then 'Yes' end as educationalgroup, case when developedsafetyplan = 0 then 'No' when developedsafetyplan = 1 then 'Yes' end as developedsafetyplan, case when increasedclinicalsessions = 0 then 'No' when increasedclinicalsessions = 1 then 'Yes' end as increasedclinicalsessions, case when mentalhealthservices = 0 then 'No' when mentalhealthservices = 0 then 'Yes' end as mentalhealthservices, case when closerstaffsupervision = 0 then 'No' when closerstaffsupervision = 1 then 'Yes' end as closerstaffsupervision, case when staffedwithffs = 0 then 'No' when staffedwithffs = 1 then 'Yes' end as staffedwithffs, case when otherhousing = 0 then 'No' when otherhousing = 1 then 'Yes' end as otherhousing, date_interviewed from uacportal.uac_initial_assessment where (isdeleted = 0 or isdeleted is null)

table.name: TABLEAU_PRS_REFERRALS_FY21
table.viewSql: select --count(*) prs.prs_id, prs.uac_program_id, prs.referral_id, prs.referring_facility_name, refstat.referral_status, case when prs_type = 0 then 'PRS-TVPRA' when prs_type = 1 then 'PRS' end prs_type, prs.provider_homestudy, hs_provider.homestudy_provider as homestudy_provider, spec.special_instructions, refreas.ref_reason, prs.referral_date, prs.planned_discharge_date, prs.acceptance_date, prs.exp_closure_date from (select * from uacportal.uac_post_release_service where date_created >= date '2020-10-01' ) prs left outer join uacportal.list_referral_status refstat on refstat.referral_status_id = prs.referral_status left outer join uacportal.list_homestudy_provider hs_provider on hs_provider.homestudy_provider_id = prs.provider_homestudy left outer join uacportal.list_ref_reason refreas on refreas.ref_reason_id = prs.reason_for_referral left outer join uacportal.list_hs_special_instr spec on spec.special_instr_id = prs.special_instructions

table.name: TABLEAU_RELEASE_REQUESTS_FY21
table.viewSql:
select --count(*) relreq.release_id, relreq.uac_program_id, case when relreq.type_of_release = 0 then 'Release to Program' when relreq.type_of_release = 1 then 'Release to Sponsor' end as type_of_release, case when relreq.type_of_release = 0 then relreq.program_name when relreq.type_of_release = 1 then spon.first_name || ' ' || spon.last_name end as released_to, relreq.sponsor_id, case when relreq.proof_of_relationship = 0 then 'No' when relreq.proof_of_relationship = 0 then 'Yes' end as proof_of_relationship, relreq.program_name, relreq.program_address1, relreq.program_address2, relreq.program_city, relreq.program_state, relreq.program_zipcode, relreq.is_urm_program, relreq.is_program_licensed, relreq.type_of_license, relreq.prog_agreed_to_orr_spnsr_cond, relreq.attorney_contacted, case when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 1 then 'Approve Straight Release' when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 2 then 'Approve with Post-Release Only Services' when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 3 then 'Approve Release Pending Completion of Conditions' when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 4 then 'Conduct Home Study' when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 5 then 'Deny Release' when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 6 then 'Conduct Home Study – TVPRA' when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 7 then 'Conduct Home Study – Discretionary' when relreq.case_worker_recommendation = 8 then 'Conduct Home Study – ORR Mandated' end as cm_recommendation, relreq.cw_recommendation_after_hs,
relreq.cw_cancellation_reason_id, case when relreq.cc_recommendation = 1 then 'Approve Straight Release' when relreq.cc_recommendation = 2 then 'Approve with Post-Release Only Services' when relreq.cc_recommendation = 3 then 'Approve Release Pending Completion of Conditions' when relreq.cc_recommendation = 4 then 'Conduct Home Study' when relreq.cc_recommendation = 5 then 'Deny Release' when relreq.cc_recommendation = 6 then 'Conduct Home Study – TVPRA' when relreq.cc_recommendation = 7 then 'Conduct Home Study – Discretionary' when relreq.cc_recommendation = 8 then 'Conduct Home Study – ORR Mandated' end as cc_recommendation, case when relreq.cc_recommendation_after_hs = 1 then 'Approve with Post-Release Services' when relreq.cc_recommendation_after_hs = 2 then 'Approve with Post-Release Services Pending Completion of Conditions' when relreq.cc_recommendation_after_hs = 3 then 'Recommendation Pending -Additional Information Needed' when relreq.cc_recommendation_after_hs = 4 then 'Deny Release' when relreq.cc_recommendation_after_hs = 5 then 'Approve with post release services – TVPRA' end as cc_recommendation_after_hs, relreq.cc_cancellation_reason_id, orrdec.orr_decision, relreq.orr_home_study_status, case when relreq.orr_decision_after_hs = 1 then 'Approve with Post-Release Services' when relreq.orr_decision_after_hs = 2 then 'Approve with Post-Release Services Pending Completion of Conditions' when relreq.orr_decision_after_hs = 3 then 'Remand' when relreq.orr_decision_after_hs = 4 then 'Deny Release' when relreq.orr_decision_after_hs = 5 then 'Approve with post release services – TVPRA' end as orr_decision_after_hs, relreq.release_approved_date, case when relreq.cw_recommendation_after_hs = 1 then 'Approve with post-release services' when relreq.cw_recommendation_after_hs = 2 then 'Approve with post-release services pending completion of conditions' when relreq.cw_recommendation_after_hs = 3 then 'Recommendation Pending -Additional Information Needed' when relreq.cw_recommendation_after_hs = 4 then 'Deny Release' when relreq.cw_recommendation_after_hs = 5 then 'Approve with post release services – TVPRA' end as cm_recommendation_after_hs, relreq.release_scheduled_date, relreq.next_sch_court_appearance, relreq.date_sponsor_notified, relreq.program_type from (select * from uacportal.uac_release_request where isdeleted is null or isdeleted = 0) relreq left outer join uacportal.list_orr_decision orrdec on orrdec.orr_decision_id = relreq.orr_decision left outer join uacportal.sponsor_info spon on spon.sponsor_id = relreq.sponsor_id

table.name: TABLEAU_RISK_ASSESSMENTS_FY21
table.viewSql: select --count(*) risk_assessment_id, date_created as date_completed, trunc(uptime) as last_updated, uac_program_id, case when roomassignmentsafe = 0 then 'No' when roomassignmentsafe = 1 then 'Yes' end as roomassignmentsafe, case when anyinappcomments = 0 then 'No' when anyinappcomments = 1 then 'Yes' end anyinappcomments, case when like_to_live_with = 0 then 'Housed with Girls' when like_to_live_with = 1 then 'Housed with Boys' when like_to_live_with = 2 then 'No Preference' end as like_to_live_with, case when tellsexualpreference = 0 then 'No' when tellsexualpreference = 1 then 'Yes' when tellsexualpreference = 2 then 'Decline to Answer' end as tellsexualpreference, case when isanythingthere = 0 then 'Not at this time' when isanythingthere = 1 then 'Yes' end isanythingthere, case when lotofcomments = 0 then 'No' when lotofcomments = 1 then 'Yes' when lotofcomments = 2 then 'Decline to Answer' end as lotofcomments, case when haseversexuallyactive = 0 then 'Decline to Answer' when haseversexuallyactive = 1 then 'Yes' when haseversexuallyactive = 2 then 'No' when haseversexuallyactive = 3 then 'Other' end as haseversexuallyactive, case when sexualactivity_type = 1 then 'With Males Only' when sexualactivity_type = 2 then 'With Females Only' when sexualactivity_type = 3 then 'With both Males and Females' when sexualactivity_type = 4 then 'Decline to Answer' end as sexualactivity_type, case when sexualactivity_consensual = 0 then 'No' when sexualactivity_consensual = 1 then 'Yes' when sexualactivity_consensual = 2 then 'Decline to Answer' end as sexualactivity_consensual, case when didperformsexualfavours = 0 then 'No' when didperformsexualfavours = 1 then 'Yes' when didperformsexualfavours = 2 then 'Decline to Answer' end as didperformsexualfavours, case when hadanytalk = 0 then 'No' when hadanytalk = 1 then 'Yes' when hadanytalk = 2 then 'Decline to Answer' end as hadanytalk, case when gendernonconfirming = 0 then 'No' when gendernonconfirming = 1 then 'Yes' end as gendernonconfirming, case when anycriminalcharges = 0 then 'No' when anycriminalcharges = 1 then 'Yes' end as anycriminalcharges, case when anymentaldisability = 0 then 'No' when anymentaldisability = 1 then 'Yes' when anymentaldisability = 2 then 'Suspected' end as anymentaldisability, case when disability_mental = 1 then 'Yes' end as disability_mental, case when physicalsize = 1 then 'Average' when physicalsize = 2 then 'Smaller than Average' when physicalsize = 3 then 'Larger than Average' end as physicalsize, case when otherspecificinfo = 0 then 'No' when otherspecificinfo = 1 then 'Yes' end as otherspecificinfo, case when clinicianshared = 1 then 'Yes' end as clinicianshared, case when childoryouth = 1 then 'Yes' end as childoryouth, case when howtoreportthreats = 1 then 'Yes' end as howtoreportthreats, case when movedtoprivateroom = 0 then 'No' when movedtoprivateroom = 1 then 'Yes' end as movedtoprivateroom, case when movedtoroomarea = 0 then 'No' when movedtoroomarea = 1 then 'Yes' end as movedtoroomarea, case when alternativebathroom = 1 then 'Yes' end as alternativebathroom, case when if_identify_as_transgender = 1 then 'Yes' end as if_identify_as_transgender, case when educationalgroup = 0 then 'No' when educationalgroup = 1 then 'Yes' end as educationalgroup, case when developedsafetyplan = 1 then 'Yes' end as developedsafetyplan, case when increasedclinicalsessions = 1 then 'Yes' end as increasedclinicalsessions, case when mentalhealthservices = 1 then 'Yes' end as mentalhealthservices, case when closerstaffsupervision = 1 then 'Yes' end as closerstaffsupervision, case when staffedwithffs = 1 then 'Yes' end as staffedwithffs, case when otherhousing = 1 then 'Yes' end as otherhousing, sign_date_of_translator, date_of_mental_health_service, case when medical_service = 1 then 'Yes' end as medical_service, date_of_medical_service, case when transgender_or_intersex = 1 then 'Yes' end as transgender_or_intersex, case when disability_physical = 1 then 'Yes' end as disability_physical, case when disability_developmental = 1 then 'Yes' end as disability_developmental, case when other_attachments = 1 then 'Yes' end as other_attachments, case when nospecificaction = 1 then 'Yes' end as nospecificaction from uacportal.uac_risk_assessment where (isdeleted is null or isdeleted = 0) and date_created >= date '2020-10-01'

table.name: TABLEAU_SIRS_FULL
table.viewSql:
with sircatmap as ( select catmap.sir_id, sircat.* from (select * from uacportal.uac_sir_category_map where isdeleted = 0 and addendum_id is null) catmap
inner join -- BEGIN: SIR Category/Sub-Category ( select cat1.category_id, cat1.description category, case when cat1.parent_id is null then 1 else 2 end as cat_level, cat1.parent_id, cat2.category_id subcategory_id, cat2.description subcategory from uacportal.uac_sir_category cat1 join uacportal.uac_sir_category cat2 on cat2.parent_id = cat1.category_id ) sircat on sircat.subcategory_id = catmap.category_id ),
sirs as ( -- BEGIN: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, case when sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, sir.sa_type_of_incident, sir.sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, sir.sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, sir.sa_were_other_uac_involved, sir.alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, case when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 0 then 'No' when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 1 then 'Yes' end as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
case when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 0 then 'No' when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 1 then 'Yes' end as cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is not null --<<< Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [2] Emergency SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'Emergency SIR' as sir_type, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then 'Other' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_mental_heath_hospitalization = 1 then 'Mental Health Emergency Requiring Hospitalization' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_death_in_care_provider is not null then 'Death of a UC in ORR Care' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_immediate_hospitalization = 1 then 'Medical Emergency' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' else sircatmap.category end as category, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then sir.abuse_neglect_type else sircatmap.subcategory end as sub_category, case when sircatmap.category = 'Behavioral Incidents that Threaten Immediate Safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.er_behaviour_threat_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' then sir.er_unauthorized_absence when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then sir.er_other_exp when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, null as alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 1 --<<< Emergency SIR ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left outer join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [2] Emergency SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [3] Other Categories of SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sircatmap.category as category, sircatmap.subcategory as sub_category, -- sir.abuse_neglect_type_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Past Abuse/Neglect Not in ORR Care' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Abuse In DHS Custody' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_dhs_cust_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Major Behavioral Incidents that threaten safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_mbi_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Incidents Involving Law Enforcement' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_iile_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Criminal History' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_ch_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then other_threats_to_uc_other_exp else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Pregnancy Related Issues' then sir.pregnancy_termination_exp end as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog1.program_name as care_provider_name, prog1.city as care_provider_city, prog1.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is null --<<< Not an Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0
left join uacportal.list_programs prog1 on prog1.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: SIR Category/Sub-Category -- END: [3] Other Categories of SIRs )
/***** BEGIN: Main Query *****/ select uac_program_id, event_id as "Event ID", event_type as "Event Type", date_of_event as "Date of Event", time_of_event as "Time of Event", event_date_created as "Event Date/Time Created", synopsis_of_event as "Synopsis of Event", sir_id as "SIR ID", sir_date_created as "SIR Date/Time Created", sir_type as "SIR Type",
category as "Category", sub_category as "Sub Category", other_specify as "Other, specify", er_death_in_cp_other as "Other Person (Specify)", pregnancy_termination_exp as "Pregnancy Related Issues (Describe)",
sa_type_of_incident as "Type of SA Incident", sa_type_of_allegation as "Type of SA Allegation", sa_type_of_allegation_specify as "Type of SA Allegation (Specify)", sa_how_uac_involved as "Role in SA Incident", sa_how_uac_involved_specify as "Role in SA Incident (Specify)", sa_were_other_uac_involved as "Were Other UAC Involved", alleged_perpetrator as "Alleged Perpetrator", alleged_perpetrator_other as "Alleged Perpetrator Other", sa_were_staff_present_at_inc as "Staff Present/Involved in SA Incident",
-- Incident Information incident_at_another_facility as "Incident at Another Facility", care_provider_name as "Care Provider Name", care_provider_city as "Care Provider City", care_provider_state as "Care Provider State", location_of_incident as "Location of Incident", school_area as "School Area", dhs_facility as "DHS Facility/Custody", dhs_facility_other as "DHS Facility/Custody (Specify)", location_of_incident_specify as "Location of Incident (Specify)", date_reported_to_care_provider as "Date Reported to Care Provider", to_char(date_reported_to_care_provider, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to Care Provider", date_reported_to_orr as "Date Reported to ORR", to_char(date_reported_to_orr, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to ORR",
-- Description of Incident (History) description_of_incident as "Full Description of Incident", uac_or_anyone_injured as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured", uac_or_anyone_injured_specify as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured (Specify)",
sa_action_for_victim as "Actions Taken For Victim", sa_action_for_allegedperp as "Actions Taken For Alleged Perpetrator", sa_action_for_indinvolved as "Follow-Up Regarding Inviduals Involved",
staff_response_intervention as "Staff Response and Intervention", follow_up_resolution as "Follow-Up and/or Resolution", updated_recommendations as "Recommendations",
-- Reporting to State Licensing reported_to_state_licensing as "Reported To SL", date_of_state_lic_report as "Date of Report (SL)", to_char(date_of_state_lic_report, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (SL)", was_state_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (SL)", date_notify_state_inci_invest as "Date Notified (SL)", state_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (SL)", progress_of_sl_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (SL)", state_incident_explain as "Explain (SL)", results_of_sl_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (SL)",
cps_different_from_state_lic as "CPS Different From State Licensing",
-- Reporting to CPS reported_to_cps as "Reported To CPS", date_reported_to_cps as "Date of Report (CPS)", to_char(date_reported_to_cps, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (CPS)", was_cps_incident_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (CPS)", date_notify_cps_inc_invest as "Date Notified (CPS)", cps_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (CPS)", progress_of_cps_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (CPS)", cps_incident_explain as "Explain (CPS)", results_of_cps_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (CPS)",
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforecement reported_to_law_enforcement as "Reported To LE", date_report_to_law_enforce as "Date of Report (LE)", to_char(date_report_to_law_enforce, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (LE)", le_officers_name as "Officer Name (LE)", le_officers_badge_number as "Officer Badge", was_le_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (LE)", date_notify_le_inc_invest as "Date Notified (LE)", le_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (LE)", progress_of_le_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (LE)", le_incident_explain as "Explain (LE)", results_of_le_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (LE)", reported_to_doj as "Reported To DOJ", date_reported_to_doj as "Date of Report (DOJ)", doj_report_notes as "Notes (DOJ)",
-- Other Notifications is_sir_for_runaway as "SIR For A Runaway"
from sirs /***** END: Main Query *****/

table.name: TABLEAU_SIRS_FULL_FY21
table.viewSql:
with sircatmap as ( select catmap.sir_id, sircat.* from (select * from uacportal.uac_sir_category_map where isdeleted = 0 and addendum_id is null) catmap
inner join -- BEGIN: SIR Category/Sub-Category ( select cat1.category_id, cat1.description category, case when cat1.parent_id is null then 1 else 2 end as cat_level, cat1.parent_id, cat2.category_id subcategory_id, cat2.description subcategory from uacportal.uac_sir_category cat1 join uacportal.uac_sir_category cat2 on cat2.parent_id = cat1.category_id ) sircat on sircat.subcategory_id = catmap.category_id ),
sirs as ( -- BEGIN: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, case when sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, sir.sa_type_of_incident, sir.sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, sir.sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, sir.sa_were_other_uac_involved, sir.alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, case when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 0 then 'No' when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 1 then 'Yes' end as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
case when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 0 then 'No' when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 1 then 'Yes' end as cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is not null --<<< Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [2] Emergency SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'Emergency SIR' as sir_type, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then 'Other' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_mental_heath_hospitalization = 1 then 'Mental Health Emergency Requiring Hospitalization' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_death_in_care_provider is not null then 'Death of a UC in ORR Care' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_immediate_hospitalization = 1 then 'Medical Emergency' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' else sircatmap.category end as category, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then sir.abuse_neglect_type else sircatmap.subcategory end as sub_category, case when sircatmap.category = 'Behavioral Incidents that Threaten Immediate Safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.er_behaviour_threat_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' then sir.er_unauthorized_absence when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then sir.er_other_exp when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, null as alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 1 --<<< Emergency SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left outer join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [2] Emergency SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [3] Other Categories of SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sircatmap.category as category, sircatmap.subcategory as sub_category, -- sir.abuse_neglect_type_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Past Abuse/Neglect Not in ORR Care' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Abuse In DHS Custody' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_dhs_cust_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Major Behavioral Incidents that threaten safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_mbi_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Incidents Involving Law Enforcement' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_iile_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Criminal History' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_ch_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then other_threats_to_uc_other_exp else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Pregnancy Related Issues' then sir.pregnancy_termination_exp end as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog1.program_name as care_provider_name, prog1.city as care_provider_city, prog1.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is null --<<< Not an Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0
left join uacportal.list_programs prog1 on prog1.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: SIR Category/Sub-Category -- END: [3] Other Categories of SIRs )
/***** BEGIN: Main Query *****/ select uac_program_id, event_id as "Event ID", event_type as "Event Type", date_of_event as "Date of Event", time_of_event as "Time of Event", event_date_created as "Event Date/Time Created", synopsis_of_event as "Synopsis of Event", sir_id as "SIR ID", sir_date_created as "SIR Date/Time Created", sir_type as "SIR Type",
category as "Category", sub_category as "Sub Category", other_specify as "Other, specify", er_death_in_cp_other as "Other Person (Specify)", pregnancy_termination_exp as "Pregnancy Related Issues (Describe)",
sa_type_of_incident as "Type of SA Incident", sa_type_of_allegation as "Type of SA Allegation", sa_type_of_allegation_specify as "Type of SA Allegation (Specify)", sa_how_uac_involved as "Role in SA Incident", sa_how_uac_involved_specify as "Role in SA Incident (Specify)", sa_were_other_uac_involved as "Were Other UAC Involved", alleged_perpetrator as "Alleged Perpetrator", alleged_perpetrator_other as "Alleged Perpetrator Other", sa_were_staff_present_at_inc as "Staff Present/Involved in SA Incident",
-- Incident Information incident_at_another_facility as "Incident at Another Facility", care_provider_name as "Care Provider Name", care_provider_city as "Care Provider City", care_provider_state as "Care Provider State", location_of_incident as "Location of Incident", school_area as "School Area", dhs_facility as "DHS Facility/Custody", dhs_facility_other as "DHS Facility/Custody (Specify)", location_of_incident_specify as "Location of Incident (Specify)", date_reported_to_care_provider as "Date Reported to Care Provider", to_char(date_reported_to_care_provider, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to Care Provider", date_reported_to_orr as "Date Reported to ORR", to_char(date_reported_to_orr, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to ORR",
-- Description of Incident (History) description_of_incident as "Full Description of Incident", uac_or_anyone_injured as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured", uac_or_anyone_injured_specify as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured (Specify)",
sa_action_for_victim as "Actions Taken For Victim", sa_action_for_allegedperp as "Actions Taken For Alleged Perpetrator", sa_action_for_indinvolved as "Follow-Up Regarding Inviduals Involved",
staff_response_intervention as "Staff Response and Intervention", follow_up_resolution as "Follow-Up and/or Resolution", updated_recommendations as "Recommendations",
-- Reporting to State Licensing reported_to_state_licensing as "Reported To SL", date_of_state_lic_report as "Date of Report (SL)", to_char(date_of_state_lic_report, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (SL)", was_state_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (SL)", date_notify_state_inci_invest as "Date Notified (SL)", state_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (SL)", progress_of_sl_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (SL)", state_incident_explain as "Explain (SL)", results_of_sl_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (SL)",
cps_different_from_state_lic as "CPS Different From State Licensing",
-- Reporting to CPS reported_to_cps as "Reported To CPS", date_reported_to_cps as "Date of Report (CPS)", to_char(date_reported_to_cps, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (CPS)", was_cps_incident_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (CPS)", date_notify_cps_inc_invest as "Date Notified (CPS)", cps_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (CPS)", progress_of_cps_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (CPS)", cps_incident_explain as "Explain (CPS)", results_of_cps_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (CPS)",
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforecement reported_to_law_enforcement as "Reported To LE", date_report_to_law_enforce as "Date of Report (LE)", to_char(date_report_to_law_enforce, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (LE)", le_officers_name as "Officer Name (LE)", le_officers_badge_number as "Officer Badge", was_le_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (LE)", date_notify_le_inc_invest as "Date Notified (LE)", le_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (LE)", progress_of_le_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (LE)", le_incident_explain as "Explain (LE)", results_of_le_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (LE)", reported_to_doj as "Reported To DOJ", date_reported_to_doj as "Date of Report (DOJ)", doj_report_notes as "Notes (DOJ)",
-- Other Notifications is_sir_for_runaway as "SIR For A Runaway"
from sirs /***** END: Main Query *****/

table.name: TABLEAU_SIRS_FY21
table.viewSql:
with sirs as ( -- BEGIN: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs (excluding Event info) select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sir.er_death_in_care_provider, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, sir.er_immediate_hospitalization, sir.er_other_exp, 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, null as other_specify, sir.pregnancy_termination_exp, sir.sa_type_of_incident, sir.sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_were_other_uac_involved, sir.alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, case when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 0 then 'No' when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 1 then 'Yes' end as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is not null --<<< Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs (excluding Event info)
union all
-- BEGIN: [2] Emergency SIRs (excluding Event info) select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'Emergency SIR' as sir_type, sir.er_death_in_care_provider, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, sir.er_immediate_hospitalization, sir.er_other_exp, null as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, null as other_specify, sir.pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, null as sa_how_uac_involved, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, null as alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 1 --<<< Emergency SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [2] Emergency SIRs (excluding Event info)
union all
-- BEGIN: [3] Other Categories of SIRs (excluding Event info) select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sir.er_death_in_care_provider, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, sir.er_immediate_hospitalization, sir.er_other_exp, sircat.category as category, sircat.subcategory as sub_category, case when sircat.category = 'Past Abuse/Neglect Not in ORR Care' and sircat.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_other_exp when sircat.category = 'Abuse In DHS Custody' and sircat.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_dhs_cust_other_exp when sircat.category = 'Major Behavioral Incidents that threaten safety' and sircat.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_mbi_other_exp when sircat.category = 'Incidents Involving Law Enforcement' and sircat.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_iile_other_exp when sircat.category = 'Criminal History' and sircat.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_ch_other_exp when sircat.category = 'Other' and sircat.subcategory = 'Other' then other_threats_to_uc_other_exp else null end as other_specify, sir.pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, null as sa_how_uac_involved, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog1.program_name as care_provider_name, prog1.city as care_provider_city, prog1.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is null --<<< Not an Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir
inner join (select * from uacportal.uac_sir_category_map where isdeleted = 0 and addendum_id is null) catmap on catmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id inner join -- BEGIN: SIR Category/Sub-Category ( select cat1.category_id, cat1.description category, case when cat1.parent_id is null then 1 else 2 end as cat_level, cat1.parent_id, cat2.category_id subcategory_id, cat2.description subcategory from uacportal.uac_sir_category cat1 join uacportal.uac_sir_category cat2 on cat2.parent_id = cat1.category_id ) sircat on sircat.subcategory_id = catmap.category_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0
left join uacportal.list_programs prog1 on prog1.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: SIR Category/Sub-Category -- END: [3] Other Categories of SIRs (excluding Event info) )
/***** BEGIN: Main Query *****/ select uac_program_id, event_id as "Event ID", event_type as "Event Type", date_of_event as "Date of Event", time_of_event as "Time of Event", event_date_created as "Event Date/Time Created", sir_id as "SIR ID", sir_date_created as "SIR Date/Time Created", sir_type as "SIR Type", category as "Category", sub_category as "Sub Category", other_specify as "Other, specify", sa_type_of_incident as "Type of SA Incident", sa_type_of_allegation as "Type of SA Allegation", sa_how_uac_involved as "Role in SA Incident", sa_were_other_uac_involved as "Were Other UAC Involved", alleged_perpetrator as "Alleged Perpetrator", alleged_perpetrator_other as "Alleged Perpetrator (Other, specify)", sa_were_staff_present_at_inc as "Staff Present/Involved in SA Incident", incident_at_another_facility as "Incident at Another Facility", care_provider_name as "Care Provider Name", care_provider_city as "Care Provider City", care_provider_state as "Care Provider State", location_of_incident as "Location of Incident", location_of_incident_specify as "Location of Incident (Other, specify)", date_reported_to_care_provider as "Date Reported to Care Provider", to_char(date_reported_to_care_provider, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to Care Provider", date_reported_to_orr as "Date Reported to ORR", to_char(date_reported_to_orr, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to ORR", description_of_incident as "Description of Incident", uac_or_anyone_injured as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured", uac_or_anyone_injured_specify as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured (specify)", staff_response_intervention as "Staff Response and Intervention", follow_up_resolution as "Follow-up and/or Resolution", updated_recommendations as "Recommendations",
-- Reporting to State Licensing reported_to_state_licensing as "Reported To SL", date_of_state_lic_report as "Date of Report (SL)", to_char(date_of_state_lic_report, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (SL)", was_state_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (SL)", date_notify_state_inci_invest as "Date Notified (SL)", state_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (SL)", state_incident_explain as "Explain (SL)", results_of_sl_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (SL)",
cps_different_from_state_lic as "CPS Different From State Licensing",
-- Reporting to CPS reported_to_cps as "Reported To CPS", date_reported_to_cps as "Date of Report (CPS)", to_char(date_reported_to_cps, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (CPS)", was_cps_incident_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (CPS)", date_notify_cps_inc_invest as "Date Notified (CPS)", cps_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (CPS)", cps_incident_explain as "Explain (CPS)", results_of_cps_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (CPS)",
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforecement reported_to_law_enforcement as "Reported To LE", date_report_to_law_enforce as "Date of Report (LE)", to_char(date_report_to_law_enforce, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (LE)", le_officers_name as "Officer Name", le_officers_badge_number as "Officer Badge", was_le_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (LE)", date_notify_le_inc_invest as "Date Notified (LE)", le_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (LE)", le_incident_explain as "Explain (LE)", results_of_le_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (LE)"
from sirs /***** END: Main Query *****/

table.name: TABLEAU_SIRS_LEAN
table.viewSql:
with sircatmap as ( select catmap.sir_id, sircat.* from (select * from uacportal.uac_sir_category_map where isdeleted = 0 and addendum_id is null) catmap
inner join -- BEGIN: SIR Category/Sub-Category ( select cat1.category_id, cat1.description category, case when cat1.parent_id is null then 1 else 2 end as cat_level, cat1.parent_id, cat2.category_id subcategory_id, cat2.description subcategory from uacportal.uac_sir_category cat1 join uacportal.uac_sir_category cat2 on cat2.parent_id = cat1.category_id ) sircat on sircat.subcategory_id = catmap.category_id ),
sirs as ( -- BEGIN: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, case when sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, sir.sa_type_of_incident, sir.sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_were_other_uac_involved, sir.alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, case when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 0 then 'No' when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 1 then 'Yes' end as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
case when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 0 then 'No' when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 1 then 'Yes' end as cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is not null --<<< Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [2] Emergency SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'Emergency SIR' as sir_type, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then 'Other' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_mental_heath_hospitalization = 1 then 'Mental Health Emergency Requiring Hospitalization' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_death_in_care_provider is not null then 'Death of a UC in ORR Care' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_immediate_hospitalization = 1 then 'Medical Emergency' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' else sircatmap.category end as category, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then sir.abuse_neglect_type else sircatmap.subcategory end as sub_category, case when sircatmap.category = 'Behavioral Incidents that Threaten Immediate Safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.er_behaviour_threat_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' then sir.er_unauthorized_absence when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then sir.er_other_exp when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, null as sa_how_uac_involved, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, null as alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 1 --<<< Emergency SIR ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left outer join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [2] Emergency SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [3] Other Categories of SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sircatmap.category as category, sircatmap.subcategory as sub_category, -- sir.abuse_neglect_type_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Past Abuse/Neglect Not in ORR Care' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Abuse In DHS Custody' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_dhs_cust_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Major Behavioral Incidents that threaten safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_mbi_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Incidents Involving Law Enforcement' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_iile_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Criminal History' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_ch_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then other_threats_to_uc_other_exp else
