null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Pregnancy Related Issues' then sir.pregnancy_termination_exp end as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, null as sa_how_uac_involved, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog1.program_name as care_provider_name, prog1.city as care_provider_city, prog1.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is null --<<< Not an Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0
left join uacportal.list_programs prog1 on prog1.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: SIR Category/Sub-Category -- END: [3] Other Categories of SIRs )
/***** BEGIN: Main Query *****/ select uac_program_id, event_id as "Event ID", event_type as "Event Type", date_of_event as "Date of Event", time_of_event as "Time of Event", event_date_created as "Event Date/Time Created", synopsis_of_event as "Synopsis of Event", sir_id as "SIR ID", sir_date_created as "SIR Date/Time Created", sir_type as "SIR Type", category as "Category", sub_category as "Sub Category", sa_type_of_incident as "Type of SA Incident", sa_type_of_allegation as "Type of SA Allegation", sa_how_uac_involved as "Role in SA Incident", sa_were_other_uac_involved as "Were Other UAC Involved", alleged_perpetrator as "Alleged Perpetrator", sa_were_staff_present_at_inc as "Staff Present/Involved in SA Incident", incident_at_another_facility as "Incident at Another Facility", care_provider_name as "Care Provider Name", care_provider_city as "Care Provider City", care_provider_state as "Care Provider State", location_of_incident as "Location of Incident", date_reported_to_care_provider as "Date Reported to Care Provider", to_char(date_reported_to_care_provider, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to Care Provider", date_reported_to_orr as "Date Reported to ORR", to_char(date_reported_to_orr, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to ORR", uac_or_anyone_injured as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured",
-- Reporting to State Licensing reported_to_state_licensing as "Reported To SL", date_of_state_lic_report as "Date of Report (SL)", to_char(date_of_state_lic_report, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (SL)", was_state_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (SL)", date_notify_state_inci_invest as "Date Notified (SL)",
cps_different_from_state_lic as "CPS Different From State Licensing",
-- Reporting to CPS reported_to_cps as "Reported To CPS", date_reported_to_cps as "Date of Report (CPS)", to_char(date_reported_to_cps, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (CPS)", was_cps_incident_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (CPS)", date_notify_cps_inc_invest as "Date Notified (CPS)",
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforecement reported_to_law_enforcement as "Reported To LE", date_report_to_law_enforce as "Date of Report (LE)", to_char(date_report_to_law_enforce, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (LE)", was_le_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (LE)", date_notify_le_inc_invest as "Date Notified (LE)", reported_to_doj as "Reported To DOJ", date_reported_to_doj as "Date of Report (DOJ)",
-- Other Notifications is_sir_for_runaway as "SIR For A Runaway"
from sirs /***** END: Main Query *****/

table.name: TABLEAU_SIRS_LEAN_FY21
table.viewSql:
with sircatmap as ( select catmap.sir_id, sircat.* from (select * from uacportal.uac_sir_category_map where isdeleted = 0 and addendum_id is null) catmap
inner join -- BEGIN: SIR Category/Sub-Category ( select cat1.category_id, cat1.description category, case when cat1.parent_id is null then 1 else 2 end as cat_level, cat1.parent_id, cat2.category_id subcategory_id, cat2.description subcategory from uacportal.uac_sir_category cat1 join uacportal.uac_sir_category cat2 on cat2.parent_id = cat1.category_id ) sircat on sircat.subcategory_id = catmap.category_id ),
sirs as ( -- BEGIN: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, case when sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, sir.sa_type_of_incident, sir.sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_were_other_uac_involved, sir.alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, case when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 0 then 'No' when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 1 then 'Yes' end as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
case when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 0 then 'No' when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 1 then 'Yes' end as cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is not null --<<< Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [2] Emergency SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'Emergency SIR' as sir_type, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then 'Other' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_mental_heath_hospitalization = 1 then 'Mental Health Emergency Requiring Hospitalization' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_death_in_care_provider is not null then 'Death of a UC in ORR Care' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_immediate_hospitalization = 1 then 'Medical Emergency' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' else sircatmap.category end as category, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then sir.abuse_neglect_type else sircatmap.subcategory end as sub_category, case when sircatmap.category = 'Behavioral Incidents that Threaten Immediate Safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.er_behaviour_threat_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' then sir.er_unauthorized_absence when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then sir.er_other_exp when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, null as sa_how_uac_involved, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, null as alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 1 --<<< Emergency SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left outer join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [2] Emergency SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [3] Other Categories of SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sircatmap.category as category, sircatmap.subcategory as sub_category, -- sir.abuse_neglect_type_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Past Abuse/Neglect Not in ORR Care' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Abuse In DHS Custody' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_dhs_cust_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Major Behavioral Incidents that threaten safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_mbi_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Incidents Involving Law Enforcement' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_iile_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Criminal History' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_ch_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then other_threats_to_uc_other_exp else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Pregnancy Related Issues' then sir.pregnancy_termination_exp end as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, null as sa_how_uac_involved, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog1.program_name as care_provider_name, prog1.city as care_provider_city, prog1.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and (addendum_id is null or addendum_id = 0) and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is null --<<< Not an Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0
left join uacportal.list_programs prog1 on prog1.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: SIR Category/Sub-Category -- END: [3] Other Categories of SIRs )
/***** BEGIN: Main Query *****/ select uac_program_id, event_id as "Event ID", event_type as "Event Type", date_of_event as "Date of Event", time_of_event as "Time of Event", event_date_created as "Event Date/Time Created", synopsis_of_event as "Synopsis of Event", sir_id as "SIR ID", sir_date_created as "SIR Date/Time Created", sir_type as "SIR Type", category as "Category", sub_category as "Sub Category", sa_type_of_incident as "Type of SA Incident", sa_type_of_allegation as "Type of SA Allegation", sa_how_uac_involved as "Role in SA Incident", sa_were_other_uac_involved as "Were Other UAC Involved", alleged_perpetrator as "Alleged Perpetrator", sa_were_staff_present_at_inc as "Staff Present/Involved in SA Incident", incident_at_another_facility as "Incident at Another Facility", care_provider_name as "Care Provider Name", care_provider_city as "Care Provider City", care_provider_state as "Care Provider State", location_of_incident as "Location of Incident", date_reported_to_care_provider as "Date Reported to Care Provider", to_char(date_reported_to_care_provider, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to Care Provider", date_reported_to_orr as "Date Reported to ORR", to_char(date_reported_to_orr, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to ORR", uac_or_anyone_injured as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured",
-- Reporting to State Licensing reported_to_state_licensing as "Reported To SL", date_of_state_lic_report as "Date of Report (SL)", to_char(date_of_state_lic_report, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (SL)", was_state_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (SL)", date_notify_state_inci_invest as "Date Notified (SL)",
cps_different_from_state_lic as "CPS Different From State Licensing",
-- Reporting to CPS reported_to_cps as "Reported To CPS", date_reported_to_cps as "Date of Report (CPS)", to_char(date_reported_to_cps, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (CPS)", was_cps_incident_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (CPS)", date_notify_cps_inc_invest as "Date Notified (CPS)",
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforecement reported_to_law_enforcement as "Reported To LE", date_report_to_law_enforce as "Date of Report (LE)", to_char(date_report_to_law_enforce, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (LE)", was_le_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (LE)", date_notify_le_inc_invest as "Date Notified (LE)", reported_to_doj as "Reported To DOJ", date_reported_to_doj as "Date of Report (DOJ)",
-- Other Notifications is_sir_for_runaway as "SIR For A Runaway"
from sirs /***** END: Main Query *****/

table.name: TABLEAU_SIRS_WITH_ADDENDA_FULL
table.viewSql:
with sircatmap as ( select catmap.sir_id, sircat.* from (select * from uacportal.uac_sir_category_map where isdeleted = 0 and addendum_id is null) catmap
inner join -- BEGIN: SIR Category/Sub-Category ( select cat1.category_id, cat1.description category, case when cat1.parent_id is null then 1 else 2 end as cat_level, cat1.parent_id, cat2.category_id subcategory_id, cat2.description subcategory from uacportal.uac_sir_category cat1 join uacportal.uac_sir_category cat2 on cat2.parent_id = cat1.category_id ) sircat on sircat.subcategory_id = catmap.category_id ),
sirs_with_addenda as ( -- BEGIN: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, case when sir.addendum_id = 1 then 'Yes' when sir.addendum_id = 0 or sir.addendum_id is null then 'No' end as addendum, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, case when sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, sir.sa_type_of_incident, sir.sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, sir.sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, sir.sa_were_other_uac_involved, sir.alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, case when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 0 then 'No' when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 1 then 'Yes' end as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
case when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 0 then 'No' when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 1 then 'Yes' end as cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is not null --<<< Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [2] Emergency SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, case when sir.addendum_id = 1 then 'Yes' when sir.addendum_id = 0 or sir.addendum_id is null then 'No' end as addendum, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'Emergency SIR' as sir_type, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then 'Other' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_mental_heath_hospitalization = 1 then 'Mental Health Emergency Requiring Hospitalization' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_death_in_care_provider is not null then 'Death of a UC in ORR Care' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_immediate_hospitalization = 1 then 'Medical Emergency' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' else sircatmap.category end as category, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then sir.abuse_neglect_type else sircatmap.subcategory end as sub_category, case when sircatmap.category = 'Behavioral Incidents that Threaten Immediate Safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.er_behaviour_threat_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' then sir.er_unauthorized_absence when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then sir.er_other_exp when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, null as alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and sir_type_id = 1 --<<< Emergency SIR ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left outer join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [2] Emergency SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [3] Other Categories of SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, case when sir.addendum_id = 1 then 'Yes' when sir.addendum_id = 0 or sir.addendum_id is null then 'No' end as addendum, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sircatmap.category as category, sircatmap.subcategory as sub_category, -- sir.abuse_neglect_type_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Past Abuse/Neglect Not in ORR Care' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Abuse In DHS Custody' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_dhs_cust_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Major Behavioral Incidents that threaten safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_mbi_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Incidents Involving Law Enforcement' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_iile_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Criminal History' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_ch_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then other_threats_to_uc_other_exp else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Pregnancy Related Issues' then sir.pregnancy_termination_exp end as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog1.program_name as care_provider_name, prog1.city as care_provider_city, prog1.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is null --<<< Not an Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0
left join uacportal.list_programs prog1 on prog1.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: SIR Category/Sub-Category -- END: [3] Other Categories of SIRs )
/***** BEGIN: Main Query *****/ select uac_program_id, event_id as "Event ID", event_type as "Event Type", date_of_event as "Date of Event", time_of_event as "Time of Event", event_date_created as "Event Date/Time Created", synopsis_of_event as "Synopsis of Event", sir_id as "SIR ID", uac_sir_id, addendum as "Addendum", sir_date_created as "SIR Date/Time Created", sir_type as "SIR Type",
category as "Category", sub_category as "Sub Category", other_specify as "Other, specify", er_death_in_cp_other as "Other Person (Specify)", pregnancy_termination_exp as "Pregnancy Related Issues (Describe)",
sa_type_of_incident as "Type of SA Incident", sa_type_of_allegation as "Type of SA Allegation", sa_type_of_allegation_specify as "Type of SA Allegation (Specify)", sa_how_uac_involved as "Role in SA Incident", sa_how_uac_involved_specify as "Role in SA Incident (Specify)", sa_were_other_uac_involved as "Were Other UAC Involved", alleged_perpetrator as "Alleged Perpetrator", alleged_perpetrator_other as "Alleged Perpetrator Other", sa_were_staff_present_at_inc as "Staff Present/Involved in SA Incident",
-- Incident Information incident_at_another_facility as "Incident at Another Facility", care_provider_name as "Care Provider Name", care_provider_city as "Care Provider City", care_provider_state as "Care Provider State", location_of_incident as "Location of Incident", school_area as "School Area", dhs_facility as "DHS Facility/Custody", dhs_facility_other as "DHS Facility/Custody (Specify)", location_of_incident_specify as "Location of Incident (Specify)", date_reported_to_care_provider as "Date Reported to Care Provider", to_char(date_reported_to_care_provider, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to Care Provider", date_reported_to_orr as "Date Reported to ORR", to_char(date_reported_to_orr, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to ORR",
-- Description of Incident (History) description_of_incident as "Full Description of Incident", uac_or_anyone_injured as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured", uac_or_anyone_injured_specify as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured (Specify)",
sa_action_for_victim as "Actions Taken For Victim", sa_action_for_allegedperp as "Actions Taken For Alleged Perpetrator", sa_action_for_indinvolved as "Follow-Up Regarding Inviduals Involved",
staff_response_intervention as "Staff Response and Intervention", follow_up_resolution as "Follow-Up and/or Resolution", updated_recommendations as "Recommendations",
-- Reporting to State Licensing reported_to_state_licensing as "Reported To SL", date_of_state_lic_report as "Date of Report (SL)", to_char(date_of_state_lic_report, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (SL)", was_state_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (SL)", date_notify_state_inci_invest as "Date Notified (SL)", state_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (SL)", progress_of_sl_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (SL)", state_incident_explain as "Explain (SL)", results_of_sl_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (SL)",
cps_different_from_state_lic as "CPS Different From State Licensing",
-- Reporting to CPS reported_to_cps as "Reported To CPS", date_reported_to_cps as "Date of Report (CPS)", to_char(date_reported_to_cps, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (CPS)", was_cps_incident_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (CPS)", date_notify_cps_inc_invest as "Date Notified (CPS)", cps_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (CPS)", progress_of_cps_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (CPS)", cps_incident_explain as "Explain (CPS)", results_of_cps_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (CPS)",
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforecement reported_to_law_enforcement as "Reported To LE", date_report_to_law_enforce as "Date of Report (LE)", to_char(date_report_to_law_enforce, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (LE)", le_officers_name as "Officer Name (LE)", le_officers_badge_number as "Officer Badge", was_le_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (LE)", date_notify_le_inc_invest as "Date Notified (LE)", le_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (LE)", progress_of_le_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (LE)", le_incident_explain as "Explain (LE)", results_of_le_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (LE)", reported_to_doj as "Reported To DOJ", date_reported_to_doj as "Date of Report (DOJ)", doj_report_notes as "Notes (DOJ)",
-- Other Notifications is_sir_for_runaway as "SIR For A Runaway"
from sirs_with_addenda /***** END: Main Query *****/

table.name: TABLEAU_SIRS_WITH_ADDENDA_FULL_FY21
table.viewSql:
with sircatmap as ( select catmap.sir_id, sircat.* from (select * from uacportal.uac_sir_category_map where isdeleted = 0 and addendum_id is null) catmap
inner join -- BEGIN: SIR Category/Sub-Category ( select cat1.category_id, cat1.description category, case when cat1.parent_id is null then 1 else 2 end as cat_level, cat1.parent_id, cat2.category_id subcategory_id, cat2.description subcategory from uacportal.uac_sir_category cat1 join uacportal.uac_sir_category cat2 on cat2.parent_id = cat1.category_id ) sircat on sircat.subcategory_id = catmap.category_id ),
sirs_with_addenda as ( -- BEGIN: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, case when sir.addendum_id = 1 then 'Yes' when sir.addendum_id = 0 or sir.addendum_id is null then 'No' end as addendum, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' as category, sir.abuse_neglect_type as sub_category, case when sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, sir.sa_type_of_incident, sir.sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, sir.sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, sir.sa_were_other_uac_involved, sir.alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, case when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 0 then 'No' when sir.sa_were_staff_present_at_inc = 1 then 'Yes' end as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
case when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 0 then 'No' when sir.cps_different_from_state_lic = 1 then 'Yes' end as cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is not null --<<< Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [1] Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [2] Emergency SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, case when sir.addendum_id = 1 then 'Yes' when sir.addendum_id = 0 or sir.addendum_id is null then 'No' end as addendum, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'Emergency SIR' as sir_type, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then 'Other' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_mental_heath_hospitalization = 1 then 'Mental Health Emergency Requiring Hospitalization' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_death_in_care_provider is not null then 'Death of a UC in ORR Care' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_immediate_hospitalization = 1 then 'Medical Emergency' when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then 'Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care' else sircatmap.category end as category, case when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type is not null then sir.abuse_neglect_type else sircatmap.subcategory end as sub_category, case when sircatmap.category = 'Behavioral Incidents that Threaten Immediate Safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.er_behaviour_threat_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' then sir.er_unauthorized_absence when sircatmap.category is null and sir.er_other_exp is not null then sir.er_other_exp when sircatmap.category is null and sir.abuse_neglect_type = 'Other Abuse' then sir.abuse_neglect_type_other else null end as other_specify, sir.er_death_in_cp_other, null as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, null as alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog.program_name as care_provider_name, prog.city as care_provider_city, prog.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and sir_type_id = 1 --<<< Emergency SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0 left outer join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: [2] Emergency SIRs
union all
-- BEGIN: [3] Other Categories of SIRs select sir.uac_program_id, sir.event_id, sir.event_type, event.date_of_event, event.time_of_event, event.date_created as event_date_created, event.synopsis_of_event, sir.sir_id, sir.uac_sir_id, case when sir.addendum_id = 1 then 'Yes' when sir.addendum_id = 0 or sir.addendum_id is null then 'No' end as addendum, sir.date_created as sir_date_created, 'SIR' as sir_type, sircatmap.category as category, sircatmap.subcategory as sub_category, -- sir.abuse_neglect_type_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Past Abuse/Neglect Not in ORR Care' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Abuse In DHS Custody' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_dhs_cust_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Major Behavioral Incidents that threaten safety' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_mbi_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Incidents Involving Law Enforcement' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_iile_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Criminal History' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then sir.past_abuse_ch_other_exp when sircatmap.category = 'Other' and sircatmap.subcategory = 'Other' then other_threats_to_uc_other_exp else null end as other_specify, null as er_death_in_cp_other, case when sircatmap.category = 'Pregnancy Related Issues' then sir.pregnancy_termination_exp end as pregnancy_termination_exp, null as sa_type_of_incident, null as sa_type_of_allegation, sir.sa_type_of_allegation_specify, null as sa_how_uac_involved, sir.sa_how_uac_involved_specify, null as sa_were_other_uac_involved, null as alleged_perpetrator, sir.alleged_perpetrator_other, null as sa_were_staff_present_at_inc, case when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 0 then 'No' when sir.incident_at_another_facility = 1 then 'Yes' end as incident_at_another_facility, prog1.program_name as care_provider_name, prog1.city as care_provider_city, prog1.state as care_provider_state, sir.location_of_incident, sir.school_area, sir.dhs_facility, sir.dhs_facility_other, sir.location_of_incident_specify, sir.date_reported_to_care_provider, sir.date_reported_to_orr, sir.description_of_incident, case when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 0 then 'No' when sir.uac_or_anyone_injured = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_or_anyone_injured, sir.uac_or_anyone_injured_specify, sir.staff_response_intervention, sir.sa_action_for_victim, sir.sa_action_for_allegedperp, sir.sa_action_for_indinvolved, sir.follow_up_resolution, sir.updated_recommendations,
-- Reporting to State Licensing case when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_state_licensing = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_state_licensing, sir.date_of_state_lic_report, case when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_state_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_state_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_state_inci_invest, sir.state_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_sl_investigation, sir.state_incident_explain, sir.results_of_sl_investigation,
sir.cps_different_from_state_lic,
-- Reporting to CPS case when sir.reported_to_cps = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_cps = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_cps, sir.date_reported_to_cps, case when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_cps_incident_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_cps_incident_investigated, sir.date_notify_cps_inc_invest, sir.cps_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_cps_investigation, sir.cps_incident_explain, sir.results_of_cps_investigation,
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforcement case when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 0 then 'No' when sir.reported_to_law_enforcement = 1 then 'Yes' end as reported_to_law_enforcement, sir.date_report_to_law_enforce, sir.le_officers_name, sir.le_officers_badge_number, case when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 0 then 'No' when sir.was_le_inc_investigated = 1 then 'Yes' end as was_le_inc_investigated, sir.date_notify_le_inc_invest, sir.le_case_confirmation_number, sir.progress_of_le_investigation, sir.le_incident_explain, sir.results_of_le_investigation, sir.reported_to_doj, sir.date_reported_to_doj, sir.doj_report_notes, case when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 0 then 'No' when sir.is_sir_for_runaway = 1 then 'Yes' end as is_sir_for_runaway
from ( select * from uacportal.uac_sir_new where isdeleted = 0 and sir_type_id = 2 --<<< Standard SIR and abuse_neglect_type is null --<<< Not an Abuse/Neglect in ORR Care SIR and date_created >= date '2020-10-01' --<<< FY21 data only ) sir
left outer join sircatmap on sircatmap.sir_id = sir.sir_id
left outer join uacportal.uac_sir_event event on event.event_id = sir.event_id and event.isdeleted = 0
left join uacportal.list_programs prog1 on prog1.program_id = sir.care_provider_name -- END: SIR Category/Sub-Category -- END: [3] Other Categories of SIRs )
/***** BEGIN: Main Query *****/ select uac_program_id, event_id as "Event ID", event_type as "Event Type", date_of_event as "Date of Event", time_of_event as "Time of Event", event_date_created as "Event Date/Time Created", synopsis_of_event as "Synopsis of Event", sir_id as "SIR ID", uac_sir_id, addendum as "Addendum", sir_date_created as "SIR Date/Time Created", sir_type as "SIR Type",
category as "Category", sub_category as "Sub Category", other_specify as "Other, specify", er_death_in_cp_other as "Other Person (Specify)", pregnancy_termination_exp as "Pregnancy Related Issues (Describe)",
sa_type_of_incident as "Type of SA Incident", sa_type_of_allegation as "Type of SA Allegation", sa_type_of_allegation_specify as "Type of SA Allegation (Specify)", sa_how_uac_involved as "Role in SA Incident", sa_how_uac_involved_specify as "Role in SA Incident (Specify)", sa_were_other_uac_involved as "Were Other UAC Involved", alleged_perpetrator as "Alleged Perpetrator", alleged_perpetrator_other as "Alleged Perpetrator Other", sa_were_staff_present_at_inc as "Staff Present/Involved in SA Incident",
-- Incident Information incident_at_another_facility as "Incident at Another Facility", care_provider_name as "Care Provider Name", care_provider_city as "Care Provider City", care_provider_state as "Care Provider State", location_of_incident as "Location of Incident", school_area as "School Area", dhs_facility as "DHS Facility/Custody", dhs_facility_other as "DHS Facility/Custody (Specify)", location_of_incident_specify as "Location of Incident (Specify)", date_reported_to_care_provider as "Date Reported to Care Provider", to_char(date_reported_to_care_provider, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to Care Provider", date_reported_to_orr as "Date Reported to ORR", to_char(date_reported_to_orr, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time Reported to ORR",
-- Description of Incident (History) description_of_incident as "Full Description of Incident", uac_or_anyone_injured as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured", uac_or_anyone_injured_specify as "UAC/Anyone Else Injured (Specify)",
sa_action_for_victim as "Actions Taken For Victim", sa_action_for_allegedperp as "Actions Taken For Alleged Perpetrator", sa_action_for_indinvolved as "Follow-Up Regarding Inviduals Involved",
staff_response_intervention as "Staff Response and Intervention", follow_up_resolution as "Follow-Up and/or Resolution", updated_recommendations as "Recommendations",
-- Reporting to State Licensing reported_to_state_licensing as "Reported To SL", date_of_state_lic_report as "Date of Report (SL)", to_char(date_of_state_lic_report, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (SL)", was_state_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (SL)", date_notify_state_inci_invest as "Date Notified (SL)", state_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (SL)", progress_of_sl_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (SL)", state_incident_explain as "Explain (SL)", results_of_sl_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (SL)",
cps_different_from_state_lic as "CPS Different From State Licensing",
-- Reporting to CPS reported_to_cps as "Reported To CPS", date_reported_to_cps as "Date of Report (CPS)", to_char(date_reported_to_cps, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (CPS)", was_cps_incident_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (CPS)", date_notify_cps_inc_invest as "Date Notified (CPS)", cps_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (CPS)", progress_of_cps_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (CPS)", cps_incident_explain as "Explain (CPS)", results_of_cps_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (CPS)",
-- Reporting to Local Law Enforecement reported_to_law_enforcement as "Reported To LE", date_report_to_law_enforce as "Date of Report (LE)", to_char(date_report_to_law_enforce, 'HH:MI AM') as "Time of Report (LE)", le_officers_name as "Officer Name (LE)", le_officers_badge_number as "Officer Badge", was_le_inc_investigated as "Was the Incident Investigated (LE)", date_notify_le_inc_invest as "Date Notified (LE)", le_case_confirmation_number as "Case/Confirmation Number (LE)", progress_of_le_investigation as "Progress of Investigation (LE)", le_incident_explain as "Explain (LE)", results_of_le_investigation as "Results/Findings of Investigation (LE)", reported_to_doj as "Reported To DOJ", date_reported_to_doj as "Date of Report (DOJ)", doj_report_notes as "Notes (DOJ)",
-- Other Notifications is_sir_for_runaway as "SIR For A Runaway"
from sirs_with_addenda /***** END: Main Query *****/

table.name: TABLEAU_SPONSOR_APPLICATIONS_FY21
table.viewSql:
with sponsor as ( select --count(*) spon.sponsor_id, spon.city as sponsor_city_orig, spon.state as sponsor_state_orig, spon.zip_code as sponsor_zipcode_orig, spon.cob as sponsor_cob, spon.cor, spon.marriage_status, spon.gender as sponsor_gender, legal.legal_status, relat.relationship as sponsor_relationship_to_uac_orig, relat.sponsor_category as sponsor_category_orig, case when spon.household_has_disease = 0 then 'No' when spon.household_has_disease = 1 then 'Yes' end as household_has_disease, case when spon.household_has_criminal_hist = 0 then 'No' when spon.household_has_criminal_hist = 1 then 'Yes' end as household_has_criminal_hist, spon.p_counter, spon.a_counter, spon.flag, spon.flag_address from uacportal.sponsor_info spon left outer join uacportal.list_legal_status legal on legal.legal_status_id = spon.legal_status_id left outer join (select * from uacportal.list_relationship where isactive = 1) relat on relat.relationship_id = spon.sponsor_relationship_to_uac ),
uc_sponsor_list as ( select --count(*) uacspon.uac_id, uacspon.sponsor_id, uacspon.current_sponsor, uacspon.sponsor_city, uacspon.sponsor_state, uacspon.sponsor_zipcode, relat.relationship as sponsor_relationship_to_uac, relat.sponsor_category, uacspon.date_assessment, uacspon.date_application_sent, uacspon.date_application_received, uacspon.date_identity, uacspon.date_address, uacspon.date_relationship_proof from uacportal.uac_sponsor_list uacspon left outer join (select * from uacportal.list_relationship where isactive = 1) relat on relat.relationship_id = uacspon.sponsor_relationship_to_uac )
select --count(*) uacspon."UAC_ID",uacspon."SPONSOR_ID",uacspon."CURRENT_SPONSOR",uacspon."SPONSOR_CITY",uacspon."SPONSOR_STATE",uacspon."SPONSOR_ZIPCODE",uacspon."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC",uacspon."SPONSOR_CATEGORY",uacspon."DATE_ASSESSMENT",uacspon."DATE_APPLICATION_SENT",uacspon."DATE_APPLICATION_RECEIVED",uacspon."DATE_IDENTITY",uacspon."DATE_ADDRESS",uacspon."DATE_RELATIONSHIP_PROOF", sponsor.sponsor_city_orig, sponsor.sponsor_state_orig, sponsor.sponsor_zipcode_orig, sponsor.sponsor_cob, sponsor.cor, sponsor.marriage_status, sponsor.sponsor_gender, sponsor.legal_status, sponsor.sponsor_relationship_to_uac_orig, sponsor.sponsor_category_orig, sponsor.household_has_disease, sponsor.household_has_criminal_hist, sponsor.p_counter, sponsor.a_counter, sponsor.flag, sponsor.flag_address from uc_sponsor_list uacspon inner join (select * from uacportal.uac_info where uac_status in ('PENDING', 'ENROUTE', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'ADMITTED', 'DISCHARGED') and date_orr_approved >= date '2020-10-01') uac on uac.uac_id = uacspon.uac_id inner join sponsor on sponsor.sponsor_id = uacspon.sponsor_id

table.name: TABLEAU_TRANSFER_REQUESTS_FY21
table.viewSql: select --count(*) tranreq.transfer_request_id, tranreq.uac_program_id, tranreq.height, tranreq.weight, progtype.program_type as requested_program_type, tranreq.date_requested, tranreq.requesting_party, case when tranreq.concur_with_requesting_party = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.concur_with_requesting_party = 1 then 'Yes' end as concur_with_requesting_party, progtype1.program_type as recommended_program_type, tranreq.date_recommended, case when tranreq.standard_placement = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.standard_placement = 1 then 'Yes' end as standard_placement, case when tranreq.convicted_as_adult = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.convicted_as_adult = 1 then 'Yes' end convicted_as_adult, case when tranreq.adjudicated_delinquent = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.adjudicated_delinquent = 1 then 'Yes' end as adjudicated_delinquent, case when tranreq.criminal_charges = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.criminal_charges = 1 then 'Yes' end as criminal_charges, case when tranreq.chargeable = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.chargeable = 1 then 'Yes' end as chargeable, case when tranreq.provide_less_restrictive = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.provide_less_restrictive = 1 then 'Yes' end as provide_less_restrictive, case when tranreq.provide_more_restrictive = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.provide_more_restrictive = 1 then 'Yes' end as provide_more_restrictive, case when tranreq.minor_medical_health = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.minor_medical_health = 1 then 'Yes' end as minor_medical_health, case when tranreq.minor_mental_health = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.minor_mental_health = 1 then 'Yes' end as minor_mental_health, case when tranreq.violent_behavior = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.violent_behavior = 1 then 'Yes' end as violent_behavior, case when tranreq.disruptive_behavior = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.disruptive_behavior = 1 then 'Yes' end as disruptive_behavior, case when tranreq.minors_safety = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.minors_safety = 1 then 'Yes' end as minors_safety, case when tranreq.flight_risk = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.flight_risk = 1 then 'Yes' end as flight_risk, case when tranreq.emergency_influx = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.emergency_influx = 1 then 'Yes' end as emergency_influx, case when tranreq.minor_attorney_contacted = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.minor_attorney_contacted = 1 then 'Yes' end as minor_attorney_contacted, case when tranreq.pregnancy = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.pregnancy = 1 then 'Yes' end as pregnancy, case when tranreq.injury = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.injury = 1 then 'Yes' end as injury, case when tranreq.illness = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.illness = 1 then 'Yes' end as illness, case when tranreq.nondiagnosed_illness_wo_drug = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.nondiagnosed_illness_wo_drug = 1 then 'Yes' end as nondiagnosed_illness_wo_drug, case when tranreq.nondiagnosed_illness_with_drug = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.nondiagnosed_illness_with_drug = 1 then 'Yes' end as nondiagnosed_illness_with_drug, case when tranreq.diagnosed_illness_wo_drug = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.diagnosed_illness_wo_drug = 1 then 'Yes' end as diagnosed_illness_wo_drug, case when tranreq.diagnosed_illness_with_drug = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.diagnosed_illness_with_drug = 1 then 'Yes' end as diagnosed_illness_with_drug, case when tranreq.non_violent_conviction = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.non_violent_conviction = 1 then 'Yes' end as non_violent_conviction, case when tranreq.non_violent_charge = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.non_violent_charge = 1 then 'Yes' end as non_violent_charge, case when tranreq.charges_dropped = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.charges_dropped = 1 then 'Yes' end as charges_dropped, case when tranreq.case_worker_suggests_trnsf = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.case_worker_suggests_trnsf = 1 then 'Yes' end as case_worker_suggests_trnsf, prog.program_name as proposed_program_name, tranreq.date_cw_comments, tranreq.orr_decision, tranreq.date_of_decision, case when tranreq.packet_completed = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.packet_completed = 1 then 'Yes' end as packet_completed, case when tranreq.request_type = 1 then 'Change of Address' when tranreq.request_type = 2 then 'Change of Venue' end as request_type, tranreq.trnsf_sch_date, tranreq.next_schdate_court_appearance, case when tranreq.orr_decided_relocate = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.orr_decided_relocate = 1 then 'Yes' end as orr_decided_relocate, case when tranreq.uac_has_special_needs = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.uac_has_special_needs = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_has_special_needs, case when tranreq.other_orr = 0 then 'No' when tranreq.other_orr = 1 then 'Yes' end as other_orr, tranreq.departure_date, tranreq.departure_time, tranreq.arrival_date, tranreq.arrival_time from (select * from uacportal.uac_transfer_request where (isdeleted is null or isdeleted = 0)) tranreq left outer join uacportal.list_program_type progtype on progtype.program_type_id = tranreq.requested_program_type left outer join uacportal.list_program_type progtype1 on progtype1.program_type_id = tranreq.recommended_program_type left outer join uacportal.list_programs prog on prog.program_id = tranreq.proposed_program_id

table.name: TABLEAU_UC_ASSESSMENTS_FY21
table.viewSql: select --count(*) asmt.uac_assessment_id, asmt.uac_program_id, asmt.date_of_intake, asmt.los, case when asmt.been_in_us_before = 0 then 'No' when asmt.been_in_us_before = 1 then 'Yes' end as been_in_us_before, asmt.lasttime_to_be_in_us, case when asmt.has_family_in_hc = 0 then 'No' when asmt.has_family_in_hc = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_family_in_hc, case when asmt.has_family_in_us = 0 then 'No' when asmt.has_family_in_us = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_family_in_us, case when asmt.marriage_stus = 0 then 'No' when asmt.marriage_stus = 1 then 'Yes' end as married, case when asmt.has_children = 0 then 'No' when asmt.has_children = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_children, case when asmt.hurt_by_someone = 0 then 'No' when asmt.hurt_by_someone = 1 then 'Yes' end as hurt_by_someone, case when asmt.have_been_in_hospital_by_hurt = 0 then 'No' when asmt.have_been_in_hospital_by_hurt = 1 then 'Yes' end as have_been_in_hospital_by_hurt, case when asmt.know_your_right_provided = 0 then 'No' when asmt.know_your_right_provided = 1 then 'Yes' end as know_your_right_provided, case when asmt.legal_screening_completed = 0 then 'No' when asmt.legal_screening_completed = 1 then 'Yes' end as legal_screening_completed, case when asmt.legal_relief_identified = 0 then 'No' when asmt.legal_relief_identified = 1 then 'Yes' end as legal_relief_identified, case when asmt.has_criminal_history = 0 then 'No' when asmt.has_criminal_history = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_criminal_history, case when asmt.attitude = 0 then 'Calm and Cooperative' when asmt.attitude = 1 then 'Other' end as attitude, case when asmt.behavior = 0 then 'No Unusual Movements or Psychomotor Changes' when asmt.behavior = 1 then 'Other' end as behavior, case when asmt.speech = 0 then 'Normal Rate/Tone/Volume' when asmt.speech = 1 then 'Other' end as speech, case when asmt.affect = 1 then 'Reactive and Mood Congruent' when asmt.affect = 2 then 'Labile' when asmt.affect = 3 then 'Tearful' when asmt.affect = 4 then 'Blunted' when asmt.affect = 5 then 'Normal' when asmt.affect = 6 then 'Depressed' when asmt.affect = 7 then 'Constricted' when asmt.affect = 8 then 'Flat' when asmt.affect = 9 then 'Other' end as affect, case when asmt.mood = 1 then 'Euthymic' when asmt.mood = 2 then 'Irritable' when asmt.mood = 3 then 'Elevated' when asmt.mood = 4 then 'Anxious' when asmt.mood = 5 then 'Depressed' when asmt.mood = 6 then 'Other' end as mood, case when asmt.thought_process = 1 then 'Goal-oriented and Logical' when asmt.thought_process = 2 then 'Disorganized' when asmt.thought_process = 3 then 'Other' end as thought_process, case when asmt.suicidal_ideation = 1 then 'None' when asmt.suicidal_ideation = 2 then 'Passive' when asmt.suicidal_ideation = 3 then 'Active' end as suicidal_ideation, case when asmt.si_plan = 0 then 'No' when asmt.si_plan = 1 then 'Yes' end as si_plan, case when asmt.si_intent = 0 then 'No' when asmt.si_intent = 1 then 'Yes' end as si_intent, case when asmt.si_means = 0 then 'No' when asmt.si_means = 1 then 'Yes' end as si_means, case when asmt.homicidal_ideation = 1 then 'None' when asmt.homicidal_ideation = 2 then 'Passive' when asmt.homicidal_ideation = 3 then 'Active' end as homicidal_ideation, case when asmt.hi_plan = 0 then 'No' when asmt.hi_plan = 1 then 'Yes' end as hi_plan, case when asmt.hi_intent = 0 then 'No' when asmt.hi_intent = 1 then 'Yes' end as hi_intent, case when asmt.hi_means = 0 then 'No' when asmt.hi_means = 1 then 'Yes' end as hi_means, case when asmt.thought_content = 1 then 'Delusions' when asmt.thought_content = 2 then 'Obsessions/Compulsions' when asmt.thought_content = 3 then 'Phobias' when asmt.thought_content = 4 then 'Other' end as thought_content, case when asmt.perception = 0 then 'No Hallucinations or Delusions During Interview' when asmt.perception = 1 then 'Other' end as perception, case when asmt.orientation_time = 1 then 'Yes' end as orientation_time, case when asmt.orientation_place = 1 then 'Yes' end as orientation_place, case when asmt.orientation_person = 1 then 'Yes' end as orientation_person, case when asmt.orientation_self = 1 then 'Yes' end as orientation_self, case when asmt.insight_judgment = 1 then 'Good' when asmt.insight_judgment = 2 then 'Fair' when asmt.insight_judgment = 3 then 'Poor' end as insight_judgment, case when asmt.talked_emotianal_problem = 0 then 'No' when asmt.talked_emotianal_problem = 1 then 'Yes' end as talked_emotional_problem, case when asmt.felt_need_help = 0 then 'No' when asmt.felt_need_help = 1 then 'Yes' end as felt_need_help, case when asmt.advised_to_take_med = 0 then 'No' when asmt.advised_to_take_med = 1 then 'Yes' end as advised_to_take_med, case when asmt.seen_er_or_hospitalised = 0 then 'No' when asmt.seen_er_or_hospitalised = 1 then 'Yes' end as seen_er_or_hospitalised, case when asmt.heard_voises = 0 then 'No' when asmt.heard_voises = 1 then 'Yes' end as heard_voices, case when asmt.have_depressed = 0 then 'No' when asmt.have_depressed = 1 then 'Yes' end as have_depressed, case when asmt.attemp_to_kill_yourself = 0 then 'No' when asmt.attemp_to_kill_yourself = 1 then 'Yes' end as attemp_to_kill_yourself, case when asmt.had_nightmares = 0 then 'No' when asmt.had_nightmares = 1 then 'Yes' end as had_nightmares, case when asmt.urge_or_impulse = 0 then 'No' when asmt.urge_or_impulse = 1 then 'Yes' end as urge_or_impulse, case when asmt.arrangement_change = 0 then 'No' when asmt.arrangement_change = 1 then 'Yes' end as arrangement_change, case when asmt.family_owe_money_for_journey = 0 then 'No' when asmt.family_owe_money_for_journey = 1 then 'Yes' end as family_owe_money_for_journey, asmt.owe_howmuch_money, case when asmt.uac_family_threatened = 0 then 'No' when asmt.uac_family_threatened = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_family_threatened, case when asmt.physically_harmed = 0 then 'No' when asmt.physically_harmed = 1 then 'Yes' end as physically_harmed, case when asmt.someone_physically_harmed = 0 then 'No' when asmt.someone_physically_harmed = 1 then 'Yes' end as someone_physically_harmed, case when asmt.held_against_will = 0 then 'No' when asmt.held_against_will = 1 then 'Yes' end as held_against_will, case when asmt.anything_bad_happened = 0 then 'No' when asmt.anything_bad_happened = 1 then 'Yes' end as anything_bad_happened, case when asmt.someone_controlled_document = 0 then 'No' when asmt.someone_controlled_document = 1 then 'Yes' end as someone_controlled_document, case when asmt.threaten_to_report = 0 then 'No' when asmt.threaten_to_report = 1 then 'Yes' end as threaten_to_report, case when asmt.worried_tobe_found = 0 then 'No' when asmt.worried_tobe_found = 1 then 'Yes' end as worried_tobe_found, case when asmt.perform_anywork = 0 then 'No' when asmt.perform_anywork = 1 then 'Yes' end as perform_anywork, case when asmt.had_debt = 0 then 'No' when asmt.had_debt = 1 then 'Yes' end as had_debt, case when asmt.debt_amount_increase = 0 then 'No' when asmt.debt_amount_increase = 1 then 'Yes' end as debt_amount_increase, case when asmt.thearetened_pay_forjourney = 0 then 'No' when asmt.thearetened_pay_forjourney = 1 then 'Yes' end as threatened_pay_forjourney, case when asmt.did_what_didnt_wantto = 0 then 'No' when asmt.did_what_didnt_wantto = 1 then 'Yes' end as did_what_didnt_wantto, case when asmt.expenses_takenof_thepay = 0 then 'No' when asmt.expenses_takenof_thepay = 1 then 'Yes' end as expenses_takenof_thepay, case when asmt.asked_tobe_naked = 0 then 'No' when asmt.asked_tobe_naked = 0 then 'Yes' end as asked_tobe_naked, case when asmt.someone_payed_for = 0 then 'No' when asmt.someone_payed_for = 1 then 'Yes' end as someone_paid_for, case when asmt.asked_to_take_pics = 0 then 'No' when asmt.asked_to_take_pics = 1 then 'Yes' end as asked_to_take_pics, case when asmt.asked_sexual_acts = 0 then 'No' when asmt.asked_sexual_acts = 1 then 'Yes' end as asked_sexual_acts, case when asmt.promise_for_sexual_acts = 0 then 'No' when asmt.promise_for_sexual_acts = 1 then 'Yes' end as promise_for_sexual_acts, case when asmt.trafficking_concern = 0 then 'No' when asmt.trafficking_concern = 1 then 'Yes' end as trafficking_concern, asmt.trafficing_referal, case when asmt.substance_abuse_concerns = 0 then 'No' when asmt.substance_abuse_concerns = 1 then 'Yes' end as substance_abuse_concerns, case when asmt.domistic_violence_concerns = 0 then 'No' when asmt.domistic_violence_concerns = 1 then 'Yes' end as domestic_violence_concerns, case when asmt.child_abuse_concerns = 0 then 'No' when asmt.child_abuse_concerns = 1 then 'Yes' end as child_abuse_concerns, case when asmt.mental_health_issues = 0 then 'No' when asmt.mental_health_issues = 1 then 'Yes' end as mental_health_issues, case when asmt.sponsor_family_support = 0 then 'No' when asmt.sponsor_family_support = 1 then 'Yes' end as sponsor_family_support, case when asmt.sponsor_identified_needs = 0 then 'No' when asmt.sponsor_identified_needs = 1 then 'Yes' end as sponsor_identified_needs, case when asmt.sponsor_financial_needs = 0 then 'No' when asmt.sponsor_financial_needs = 1 then 'Yes' end as sponsor_financial_needs, case when asmt.sponsor_hosing = 0 then 'No' when asmt.sponsor_hosing = 1 then 'Yes' end as sponsor_housing, case when asmt.sponsor_has_criminal_hist = 0 then 'No' when asmt.sponsor_has_criminal_hist = 1 then 'Yes' end as sponsor_has_criminal_hist, case when asmt.parent_child_relational_issue = 0 then 'No' when asmt.parent_child_relational_issue = 1 then 'Yes' end as parent_child_relational_issue, case when asmt.sponsor_order_of_removal = 0 then 'No' when asmt.sponsor_order_of_removal = 1 then 'Yes' end as sponsor_order_of_removal, asmt.spnsr_order_of_removal_date, case when asmt.other_uacs_sponsored = 0 then 'No' when asmt.other_uacs_sponsored = 0 then 'Yes' end as other_uacs_sponsored, case when asmt.trafficking_in_persons = 0 then 'No' when asmt.trafficking_in_persons = 1 then 'Yes' end as trafficking_in_persons, asmt.date_eligibility_letter_issued, case when asmt.child_disability_act = 0 then 'No' when asmt.child_disability_act = 1 then 'Yes' end as child_disability_act, case when asmt.victim_of_physex_abuse = 0 then 'No' when asmt.victim_of_physex_abuse = 1 then 'Yes' end as victim_of_physex_abuse, case when asmt.sponsor_risk_to_uac = 0 then 'No' when asmt.sponsor_risk_to_uac = 1 then 'Yes' end as sponsor_risk_to_uac, asmt.signature_date, case when asmt.feel_unwell = 0 then 'No' when asmt.feel_unwell = 1 then 'Yes' end as feel_unwell, case when asmt.memory_shortterm = 1 then 'Yes' end as memory_shortterm, case when asmt.memory_longterm = 1 then 'Yes' end as memory_longterm, case when asmt.memory_distractable = 1 then 'Yes' end as memory_distractable, case when asmt.someone_payed_for_pic = 0 then 'No' when asmt.someone_payed_for_pic = 1 then 'Yes' end as someone_payed_for_pic, asmt.city_of_origin, case when asmt.child_mention_us_policy = 0 then 'No' when asmt.child_mention_us_policy = 1 then 'Yes' end as child_mention_us_policy, case when asmt.child_mention_us_eco = 0 then 'No' when asmt.child_mention_us_eco = 1 then 'Yes' end as child_mention_us_eco, asmt.the_date_left_home_country, case when asmt.ff_paid_for_this_trip = 1 then 'Yes' when asmt.ff_paid_for_this_trip = 2 then 'No' end as ff_paid_for_this_trip, case when asmt.notice_to_appear_filed = 0 then 'No' when asmt.notice_to_appear_filed = 1 then 'Yes' end as
