notice_to_appear_filed, asmt.notice_to_appear_filed_date, case when asmt.scheduled_for_hearing = 0 then 'No' when asmt.scheduled_for_hearing = 1 then 'Yes' end as scheduled_for_hearing, asmt.scheduled_for_hearing_date, asmt.hearing_city, asmt.hearing_state, outcome.hearing_outcome, case when asmt.has_attorney = 0 then 'No' when asmt.has_attorney = 1 then 'Yes' end as has_attorney, asmt.date_of_meeting from (select * from uacportal.uac_assessment where (isdeleted = 0 or isdeleted is null) and date_created >= date '2020-10-01') asmt left outer join uacportal.list_hearing_outcome outcome on outcome.hearing_outcome_id = asmt.hearing_outcome

table.name: TABLEAU_UC_PROGRAMS_FY21
table.viewSql:
with uac as ( select uac.uac_id, uac.alien_no, -----------------<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<< DELETE! uac.uac_status, uac.gender, uac.dob, uac.cob, case when uac.uac_health_concern = 0 then 'No' when uac.uac_health_concern = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_health_concern, case when uac.uac_criminal_charge = 0 then 'No' when uac.uac_criminal_charge = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_criminal_charge, case when uac.foot_guide = 0 then 'No' when uac.foot_guide = 0 then 'Yes' end as foot_guide, case when uac.uac_separated_from_parents = 0 then 'No' when uac.uac_separated_from_parents = 1 then 'Yes' end as uac_separated_from_parents, case when uac.related_to_other_uc = 0 then 'No' when uac.related_to_other_uc = 1 then 'Yes' end as related_to_other_uc, case when uac.reviewed_by_orr = 1 then 'Yes' end as reviewed_by_orr,
-- UC Apprehension Information uac.familygroup, uac.uac_flag, uac.relationship_grp_id,
-- Apprehension and Transfer Information dhsoff.ice_cbp_type, dhs.agency as referring_agency, dhsoff.description as referring_sector, uac.referral_date, uac.date_orr_approved as orr_placement_date,
entry.maner_of_entry, uac.city_of_entry, uac.state_of_entry, uac.date_of_entry,
uac.city_of_apprehension, uac.state_of_apprehension, uac.date_of_apprehension,
uac.city_of_current_location, uac.date_of_current_location,
-- Medical/Mental Health Information case when uac.pregnancy = 1 then 'Yes' end as pregnancy, case when uac.injury = 1 then 'Yes' end as injury, case when uac.illness = 1 then 'Yes' end as illness, case when uac.hc_other = 1 then 'Yes' end as hc_other, case when uac.hc_ergent_condition = 1 then 'Yes' end as hc_ergent_condition,
-- Gang Affiliation case when uac.known_gang_affiliation = 0 then 'No' when uac.known_gang_affiliation = 1 then 'Yes' when uac.known_gang_affiliation = 2 then 'Suspect' when uac.known_gang_affiliation = 3 then 'Unknown' end as known_gang_affiliation, uac.name_of_gang, -- case -- when gang.determination_id = 1 then 'Self-Admission of UAC' -- when gang.determination_id = 2 then 'Gang Tattoos' -- when gang.determination_id = 3 then 'Gang Affiliation Summary' -- end as gang_determined_by,
-- Detention Facility Information case when uac.detention_type_of_facility = 1 then 'Adult Detention' when uac.detention_type_of_facility = 2 then 'Juvenile Detention' end as detention_type_of_facility, uac.facility_name as detention_facility_name, uac.facility_admission_date as detention_facility_admission_date, uac.facility_discharged_date as detention_facility_discharged_date,
-- Not found on UI??? uac.uac_fast_status from (select * from uacportal.uac_info where uac_status in ('PENDING', 'ENROUTE', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'ADMITTED', 'DISCHARGED') and date_orr_approved >= date '2020-10-01') uac left outer join uacportal.list_ice_cbp dhsoff on dhsoff.ice_cbp_id = uac.referring_office left outer join uacportal.list_referring_agency dhs on dhs.agency_id = uac.referring_agency left outer join uacportal.list_manner_of_entry entry on entry.me_id = uac.manner_of_entry -- left outer join uacportal.uac_gang_determination_by gang on gang.uac_id = uac.uac_id ),
admission as ( select uac.*, uacprog.uac_program_id, uacprog.program_id, uacprog.date_referred, case when uacprog.bio_verified = 0 then 'No' when uacprog.bio_verified = 1 then 'Yes' end bio_verified, uacprog.date_admitted, min(uacprog.date_admitted) over(partition by uac.uac_id) as date_admitted_first, uacprog.current_status, uacprog.date_discharged as discharge_date_prog, max(uacprog.date_discharged) over(partition by uac.uac_id) as discharge_date_prog_last, floor(uacprog.date_discharged - uacprog.date_admitted) as los, floor(max(nvl(date_discharged, sysdate)) over(partition by uac.uac_id) - uac.orr_placement_date) as loc from uac left outer join uacportal.uac_program_info uacprog on uacprog.uac_id = uac.uac_id ),
discharge as ( select exit.program_exit_id, exit.uac_program_id, exit.date_of_discharge as discharge_date_exit, dtype.discharge_type from uacportal.uac_program_exit exit left outer join uacportal.list_discharge_type dtype on dtype.discharge_type_id = exit.type_of_discharge ),
program as ( select prog.program_id, prog.program_name, progtype.program_type, prog.address as program_address, prog.city as program_city, prog.state as program_state, prog.zipcode as program_zipcode, prog.isactive as program_isactive from uacportal.list_programs prog left outer join uacportal.list_program_type progtype on progtype.program_type_id = prog.program_type_id )
select --count(*) admission."UAC_ID",admission."ALIEN_NO",admission."UAC_STATUS",admission."GENDER",admission."DOB",admission."COB",admission."UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN",admission."UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE",admission."FOOT_GUIDE",admission."UAC_SEPARATED_FROM_PARENTS",admission."RELATED_TO_OTHER_UC",admission."REVIEWED_BY_ORR",admission."FAMILYGROUP",admission."UAC_FLAG",admission."RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID",admission."ICE_CBP_TYPE",admission."REFERRING_AGENCY",admission."REFERRING_SECTOR",admission."REFERRAL_DATE",admission."ORR_PLACEMENT_DATE",admission."MANER_OF_ENTRY",admission."CITY_OF_ENTRY",admission."STATE_OF_ENTRY",admission."DATE_OF_ENTRY",admission."CITY_OF_APPREHENSION",admission."STATE_OF_APPREHENSION",admission."DATE_OF_APPREHENSION",admission."CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION",admission."DATE_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION",admission."PREGNANCY",admission."INJURY",admission."ILLNESS",admission."HC_OTHER",admission."HC_ERGENT_CONDITION",admission."KNOWN_GANG_AFFILIATION",admission."NAME_OF_GANG",admission."DETENTION_TYPE_OF_FACILITY",admission."DETENTION_FACILITY_NAME",admission."DETENTION_FACILITY_ADMISSION_DATE",admission."DETENTION_FACILITY_DISCHARGED_DATE",admission."UAC_FAST_STATUS",admission."UAC_PROGRAM_ID",admission."PROGRAM_ID",admission."DATE_REFERRED",admission."BIO_VERIFIED",admission."DATE_ADMITTED",admission."DATE_ADMITTED_FIRST",admission."CURRENT_STATUS",admission."DISCHARGE_DATE_PROG",admission."DISCHARGE_DATE_PROG_LAST",admission."LOS",admission."LOC", discharge.program_exit_id, --<<< Keeping this column to show that duplicate exit records are still uniquely identified by a PK discharge.discharge_date_exit, discharge.discharge_type, program.program_name, program.program_type, program.program_address, program.program_city, program.program_state, program.program_zipcode, program.program_isactive from admission left outer join program on program.program_id = admission.program_id left outer join discharge on discharge.uac_program_id = admission.uac_program_id

table.name: TABLEV
table.viewSql: SELECT VIEW_NAME, TEXT FROM USER_VIEWS

table.name: TEMP1
table.viewSql: Select Distinct A.First_Name, A.Last_Name, A.Alien_No, A.DOB, A.UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, K.PROGRAM_NAME as Receiving_Program, G.PROGRAM_NAME as Referring_PROGRAM, C.DATE_OF_DECISION TRANSFER_DATE, C.CASE_WORKER as CASE_MANAGER, C.ORR_DECISION_MAKER_NAME ORR_REVIEWER,TO_CHAR(D.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as INITIAL_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(E.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as UAC_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(F.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as UAC_RISK_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(H.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as ISP_DATE From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID And A.UAC_STATUS = B.CURRENT_STATUS Left Join UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST C On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID And nvl(C.ISDELETED,0) = 0 Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID,UPTIME From UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID,UPTIME From UAC_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) E On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID,UPTIME From UAC_RISK_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) F On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID, UPTIME From UAC_INDIVIDUAL_SERVICE_PLAN Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) H On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS G On B.PROGRAM_ID = G.PROGRAM_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS K On C.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID = K.PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST L On L.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID And nvl(L.ISDELETED,0) = 0 Where A.DOB between Add_Months(Sysdate,-204) and Add_Months(sysdate, -156) And G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = 5 And L.CC_RECOMMENDATION <> 6 And Exists(Select 1 from UAC_SPONSOR_LIST Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And CURRENT_SPONSOR=1)

table.name: TEMP1_1
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, F.PROGRAM_ID, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED AS DATE_DISCHARGED_TEMP, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE, k.initial_intakes_id, l.CONCERN_ID
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT K ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = K.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_MEDICAL_CONCERN L ON K.initial_intakes_id = L.initial_intakes_id where Gender='F' and B.DATE_ADMITTED BETWEEN TO_DATE('10/01/2014', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND TO_DATE('01/01/2016', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND l.CONCERN_ID='7' and l.YES_NO='1'

table.name: TEMP1_2
table.viewSql: Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ALIEN_NO, Case When CURRENT_STATUS is null Then A.UAC_STATUS Else B.CURRENT_STATUS End as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, '' as APPROVED_FIELD_OFFICE, '' as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, C.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, E.DISCHARGE_TYPE From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE E On D.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = E.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID Where C.PROGRAM_ID='239'

table.name: TEMP1_3
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.SPONSOR_ID, A.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE, A.ADDRESS, A.CITY, A.STATE, A.ZIP_CODE, A.PHONE, B.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST, B.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST, B.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, B.SSN, B.ALIEN_NO AS SPONSOR_ALIEN_NUM, B.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS2, B.STATE AS STATE2, B.ZIP_CODE AS ZIP, B.DOB AS SPONSOR_DOB, B.COB AS SPONSOR_COB, B.COR, B.MARRIAGE_STATUS, B.HOME_PHONE, C.LEGAL_STATUS, D.RELATIONSHIP, E.UAC_ID, F.ALIEN_NO, F.FIRST_NAME, TO_CHAR(F.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, F.COB, F.UAC_STATUS, F.GENDER, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, TO_CHAR(I.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, H.DATE_DISCHARGED AS DATE_DISCHARGED_TEMP, J.PROGRAM_NAME, K.PROGRAM_TYPE FROM UAC_DISCHARGE_NOTIFICATION A LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO B ON A.SPONSOR_ID = B.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_LEGAL_STATUS C ON B.LEGAL_STATUS_ID = C.LEGAL_STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP D ON B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = D.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST E ON A.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_INFO F ON E.UAC_ID = F.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT G ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = G.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO H ON E.UAC_ID = H.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT I ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = I.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS J ON H.PROGRAM_ID = J.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE K ON J.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=K.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID WHERE A.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE='3'

table.name: TEMP2
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.GENDER, A.UAC_STATUS, B.CURRENT_STATUS, F.PROGRAM_ID, F.STATE, F.CITY, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.ISACTIVE AS PROGRAM_STATUS
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID
WHERE B.CURRENT_STATUS in ('ADMITTED', 'ENROUTE','IN-TRANSFER') and f.program_id in ('77','81','104')

table.name: TEMP2_1
table.viewSql: SELECT B.CURRENT_STATUS,f.Sponsor_id,F.FIRST_NAME as SPONSOR_FIRST, F.LAST_NAME as SPONSOR_LAST, D.CURRENT_SPONSOR,A."UAC_ID",A."ALIEN_NO",A."FIRST_NAME",A."LAST_NAME",A."AKA",A."DOB",A."COB" FROM UACPORTAL.UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UACPORTAL.UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UACPORTAL.LIST_PROGRAMS C ON B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UACPORTAL.UAC_SPONSOR_LIST D ON A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UACPORTAL.SPONSOR_INFO F ON D.SPONSOR_ID = F.SPONSOR_ID where D.CURRENT_SPONSOR='1'

table.name: TEMP3
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, A.CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.SPECIFY_CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.REFERRING_OFFICE, A.NOTIFICATION_CITY, A.SPECIFY_NOT_CITY, A.NOTIFICATION_STATE, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.PREGNANCY, A.INJURY, A.ILLNESS, A.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, A.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.ORR_COMMENTS, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, C.UAC_RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR, F.PROGRAM_ID, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID where sponsor_address like '%Windswept%'

table.name: TEMP4
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.SIR_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.DATE_OF_INCIDENT, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_REPORTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REPORTED, A.LOCATION_OF_INCIDENT, A.ABUSE_PERPETRATOR_ID, A.RUNAWAY, A.RUNAWAY_RISK, A.ABSENSE_OF_UAC, SUBSTR ( A.WITNESSES,1,250) AS WITNESS, SUBSTR (A.RESOLUTION,1,250) AS RESOL, SUBSTR (A.RECOMMENDATIONS ,1,250) AS RECOMM, A.INFO_RELEASED_TO_MEDIA, A.JURISDICTION_NAME, A.JURISDICTION_PHONE, A.JURISDICTION_TITLE, A.CONTACT_NAME, A.CONTACT_PHONE, A.CONTACT_TITLE, A.FILER_NAME, A.FILER_PHONE, A.FILER_TITLE, A.SUPERVISOR_NAME, SUBSTR ( A.SUPERVISOR_NOTE,1,250) AS SUPVR_NOTE, A.SUPERVISOR_PHONE, A.SUPERVISOR_TITLE, SUBSTR ( A.SIR_ADDENDUM_NOTE,1,250) AS ADDENDUM_NOTE, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_CREATED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_CREATED, A.USER_CREATED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.AKA, TO_CHAR (C.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, C.COB, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, C.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, C.PREGNANCY, C.INJURY, C.ILLNESS, C.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, C.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, C.UAC_STATUS, GENDER, D.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_ID, D.ISACTIVE, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID, G.ABUSE_TYPE, H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID, I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE, J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID, K.INCIDENT_TYPE, L.BEHAVIOR_ID, M.BEHAVIOR, SUBSTR (A.SYNOPSIS_OF_INCIDENT,1,250) AS SYPNO, SUBSTR (A.STAFF_RESPONSES,1,250) AS STAFF_RESP FROM UAC_SIR A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS F ON F.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS G ON G.ABUSE_TYPE_ID = F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUES H ON H.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_SIR_MM_ISSUES I ON I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID = H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES J ON J.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES K ON K.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID = J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_UAC_BEHAVIOR L ON L.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_UAC_BEHAVIOR M ON M.BEHAVIOR_ID = L.BEHAVIOR_ID
WHERE A.ISDELETED <>'1'

table.name: TEMP5
table.viewSql: SELECT A.ALIEN_NO, A.DOB, A.COB, A.GENDER, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.CITY_OF_APPREHENSION, A.STATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, D.PROGRAM_NAME, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE, F.UAC_ARRIVAL_DATE, F.DATE_DEPARTURE_COR, G.LOCATION_APPREHENDED, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, G.THE_DATE_LEFT_HOME_COUNTRY, G.THE_LENGTH_OF_THE_TRIP, K.IMMUNE_TYPE_ID, K.IMMUNE_DATE1, K.IMMUNE_DATE2, K.IMMUNE_DATE3, K.IMMUNE_DATE4, K.IMMUNE_DATE5 FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT F ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_ASSESSMENT G ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = G.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_IMMUNIZATION K ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = K.UAC_PROGRAM_ID

table.name: TEMP6
table.viewSql:
Select a.sir_id,a.event_id,sir_type_id,a.DATE_created,a.addendum_id,a.uac_program_id, b.uac_id, b.program_id, C.ALIEN_NO, a.ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE, a.ALLEGED_PERPETRATOR, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.PROGRAM_NAME, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, A.ISDELETED
FROM UAC_sir_new A left join uac_program_info b on a.uac_program_id=b.uac_program_id LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID
where A.ISDELETED<>'1' and a.DATE_created > TO_DATE('10/01/2016', 'mm/dd/yyyy') order by a.date_created

table.name: TEMP7
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, F.PROGRAM_ID, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED AS DATE_DISCHARGED_TEMP, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE, D.FLAG, D.FLAG_NOTE, D.FLAG_ADDRESS, D.FLAG_ADDRESS_NOTE
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID

table.name: TEMP8
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, F.PROGRAM_ID, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED AS DATE_DISCHARGED_TEMP, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID

table.name: TEMP9
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, F.PROGRAM_ID, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED AS DATE_DISCHARGED_TEMP, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE, A.USER_CREATED, A.DATE_CREATED, A.UPUSER, A.UPTIME FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID where a.uac_id='540190'

table.name: TEMP_3_ENR1
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS REFERRAL_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS ORR_PLACEMENT_DATE, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID WHERE C.CURRENT_SPONSOR='1'

table.name: TEMP_3_ENR2
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID WHERE C.CURRENT_SPONSOR='1' AND H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE > TO_DATE('02/15/2016', 'MM/DD/YYYY')

table.name: TEMPORARY1
table.viewSql: Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ALIEN_NO, Case When CURRENT_STATUS is null Then A.UAC_STATUS Else B.CURRENT_STATUS End as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, '' as APPROVED_FIELD_OFFICE, '' as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, C.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, E.DISCHARGE_TYPE From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE E On D.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = E.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID Where C.PROGRAM_ID='239' and Alien_no='209232384'

table.name: V_15DAY_ENROUTE
table.viewSql:
SELECT DISTINCT UI.UAC_ID, UI.ALIEN_NO, UI.FIRST_NAME, UI.LAST_NAME, UI.DOB, UI.COB, UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_INFO UI ON UPI.UAC_ID = UI.UAC_ID --WHERE UPPER(UPI.CURRENT_STATUS) = 'ENROUTE' AND UPPER(UI.FIRST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND UPPER(UI.LAST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND DateDiff('Day',UPI.DATE_CREATED,sysdate) > 7; WHERE UPPER(UPI.CURRENT_STATUS) = 'ENROUTE' AND UPPER(UI.FIRST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND UPPER(UI.LAST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND DateDiff('Day',UPI.DATE_CREATED,sysdate) > (SELECT to_number(PARAM_VALUE) from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS where PARAM_NAME = 'CANCEL_ENROUTE_PERIOD') --Make sure to exclude UAC's that are being transfered i.e have more than 1 program AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT UPI2.UAC_ID, COUNT(UPI2.UAC_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI2 GROUP BY UPI2.UAC_ID HAVING COUNT(UPI2.UAC_ID) > 1 ORDER BY UAC_ID) UPI3 WHERE UPI3.UAC_ID = UPI.UAC_ID
)

table.name: V_ADRIANA_DATE_TIME_PROG_EXIT
table.viewSql: SELECT H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE AS EXIT_TYPE, J.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE AS DF_DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H LEFT JOIN UAC_DISCHARGE_NOTIFICATION J ON H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = J.UAC_PROGRAM_ID WHERE H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE BETWEEN TO_DATE('10/01/2015', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND TO_DATE('10/31/2015', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND J.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE='3' AND H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE='3'

table.name: V_ADRIANA_SPONSOR_SEARCH_SI
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, A.CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.SPECIFY_CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.REFERRING_OFFICE, A.NOTIFICATION_CITY, A.SPECIFY_NOT_CITY, A.NOTIFICATION_STATE, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.PREGNANCY, A.INJURY, A.ILLNESS, A.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, A.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.ORR_COMMENTS, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, C.UAC_RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR, F.PROGRAM_ID, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID WHERE D.SPONSOR_ID in (67451,67466,67488,67601,88165,88191,88208,88242,88352,88366,501560,505286,526029,534981,535733,542484,548517)

table.name: V_ADRIANA_SPONSOR_SEARCH_SL
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, A.CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.SPECIFY_CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.REFERRING_OFFICE, A.NOTIFICATION_CITY, A.SPECIFY_NOT_CITY, A.NOTIFICATION_STATE, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.PREGNANCY, A.INJURY, A.ILLNESS, A.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, A.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.ORR_COMMENTS, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, C.UAC_RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR, F.PROGRAM_ID, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, C.SPONSOR_CITY, C.SPONSOR_STATE, C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, D.HOME_PHONE AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID WHERE A.UAC_ID in (67402,502426,522423,536088,541404,536503,542602,548376,548371,547534)

table.name: V_ASSESSMENT_RPT
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.UAC_ASSESSMENT_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.AKA, TO_CHAR (C.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, C.COB, A.LOS, A.CITY_OF_ORIGIN, A.NEIGHBOR_OF_ORIGIN, A.CHILD_MENTION_US_POLICY, A.CHILD_MENTION_US_ECO, A.THE_DATE_LEFT_HOME_COUNTRY, A.THE_LENGTH_OF_THE_TRIP, A.WHO_TRAVELED_WITH_THE_CHILD, A.LEVEL_OF_EDU, A.LT_CHILD_WAS_IN_SCHOOL_AND_AGE, A.FF_PAID_FOR_THIS_TRIP, A.BEEN_IN_US_BEFORE, A.FAMILY_OWE_MONEY_FOR_JOURNEY, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(C.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, C.PREGNANCY, C.INJURY, C.ILLNESS, C.UAC_STATUS, C.GENDER, D.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, A.ISDELETED
FROM UAC_ASSESSMENT A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID WHERE B.DATE_ADMITTED BETWEEN TO_DATE('11/01/2015', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND TO_DATE('02/29/2016', 'mm/dd/yyyy')

table.name: V_ASSESSMENT_RPT_NF
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.COB, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.PREGNANCY, A.INJURY, A.ILLNESS, A.UAC_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.LOS, C.CITY_OF_ORIGIN, C.NEIGHBOR_OF_ORIGIN, C.CHILD_MENTION_US_POLICY, C.CHILD_MENTION_US_ECO, C.THE_DATE_LEFT_HOME_COUNTRY, C.THE_LENGTH_OF_THE_TRIP, C.WHO_TRAVELED_WITH_THE_CHILD, C.LEVEL_OF_EDU, C.LT_CHILD_WAS_IN_SCHOOL_AND_AGE, C.FF_PAID_FOR_THIS_TRIP, C.BEEN_IN_US_BEFORE, C.FAMILY_OWE_MONEY_FOR_JOURNEY, E.PROGRAM_TYPE
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_ASSESSMENT C ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID WHERE C.UAC_ASSESSMENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND B.DATE_ADMITTED BETWEEN TO_DATE('11/01/2015', 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND TO_DATE('01/31/2016', 'mm/dd/yyyy')

table.name: V_ASSESSMENT_RPT_NF_PT1
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR (A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.PREGNANCY, A.INJURY, A.ILLNESS, A.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, A.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, A.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, A.UAC_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.UAC_ASSESSMENT_ID, C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, C.LOS, C.CITY_OF_ORIGIN, C.NEIGHBOR_OF_ORIGIN, C.CHILD_MENTION_US_POLICY, C.CHILD_MENTION_US_ECO, C.THE_DATE_LEFT_HOME_COUNTRY, C.THE_LENGTH_OF_THE_TRIP, C.WHO_TRAVELED_WITH_THE_CHILD, C.LEVEL_OF_EDU, C.LT_CHILD_WAS_IN_SCHOOL_AND_AGE, C.FF_PAID_FOR_THIS_TRIP,
D.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_ASSESSMENT C ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID WHERE C.UAC_ASSESSMENT_ID IS NOT NULL

table.name: V_ASSESSMENT_RPT_NF_PT2
table.viewSql:
SELECT
A.ALIEN_NO, C.UAC_ASSESSMENT_ID,
C.HOW_GOTIN_TO_US,
D.PROGRAM_NAME,
E.PROGRAM_TYPE
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_ASSESSMENT C ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID WHERE C.UAC_ASSESSMENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND C.HOW_GOTIN_TO_US IS NOT NULL

FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_ASSESSMENT C ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID WHERE C.UAC_ASSESSMENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND C.LOCATION_APPREHENDED IS NOT NULL

table.name: V_CR_MEDICAL_HISTORY
table.viewSql: SELECT A."MEDICAL_HIST_ID",A."UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID",A."MM_CONDITION_ID",A."CONDITION_YN",A."CLARIFICATION",A."DATE_CREATED",A."USER_CREATED", B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID FROM UAC_CR_MEDICAL_HISTORY A Inner Join UAC_CASE_REVIEW B On A.UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID = B.UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID

table.name: V_CR_MEDICATION_HISTORY
table.viewSql:
SELECT A."MEDICATION_HIST_ID",A."UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID",A."MEDICATION_NAME",A."DOSAGE",A."TIMEFRAME",A."MEDICAL_CONDITION",A."DATE_CREATED",A."USER_CREATED",A."UPTIME",A."UPUSER", B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID
FROM UAC_CR_MEDICATION_HISTORY A Inner Join UAC_CASE_REVIEW B On A.UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID = B.UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID

table.name: V_ENROLLMENT_REPORT
table.viewSql: SELECT ROWNUM as SID, A."UAC_ID", A."ALIEN_NO",A."FIRST_NAME",A."LAST_NAME",A."DOB",A."COB",A."DATE_OF_ENTRY",A."STATE_OF_ENTRY",A."DATE_OF_APPREHENSION",A."REFERRING_SECTOR",A."REFERRAL_DATE",A."ORR_PLACEMENT_DATE",A."UAC_STATUS",A."GENDER",A."DATE_ADMITTED",A."CURRENT_STATUS",A."DATE_DISCHARGED",A."SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME",A."SPONSOR_LAST_NAME",A."SPONSOR_GENDER",A."SPONSOR_ADDRESS",A."SPONSOR_CITY",A."SPONSOR_STATE",A."SPONSOR_ZIPCODE",A."SPONSOR_PHONE",A."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC",A."PROGRAM_NAME",A."PROGRAM_TYPE",A."DISCHARGE_TYPE" From ( Select DISTINCT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS REFERRAL_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS ORR_PLACEMENT_DATE, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, TRim(Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY ELSE D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY End) As SPONSOR_ADDRESS, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_CITY Else D.CITY End As SPONSOR_CITY, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_STATE Else D.STATE End As SPONSOR_STATE, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE Else D.Zip_Code End as SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_HOME_PHONE Else D.HOME_PHONE End AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID And CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 and c.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID and d.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID WHERE UAC_STATUS NOT LIKE 'CANCEL%' Order by UAC_ID) A

table.name: V_ENROLLMENT_REPORT_DUMMY
table.viewSql: SELECT ROWNUM as SID, A."UAC_ID", A."ALIEN_NO",A."FIRST_NAME",A."LAST_NAME",A."DOB",A."COB",A."DATE_OF_ENTRY",A."STATE_OF_ENTRY",A."DATE_OF_APPREHENSION",A."REFERRING_SECTOR",A."REFERRAL_DATE",A."ORR_PLACEMENT_DATE",A."UAC_STATUS",A."GENDER",A."DATE_ADMITTED",A."CURRENT_STATUS",A."DATE_DISCHARGED",A."SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME",A."SPONSOR_LAST_NAME",A."SPONSOR_GENDER",A."SPONSOR_ADDRESS",A."SPONSOR_CITY",A."SPONSOR_STATE",A."SPONSOR_ZIPCODE",A."SPONSOR_PHONE",A."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC",A."PROGRAM_NAME",A."PROGRAM_TYPE",A."DISCHARGE_TYPE" From ( Select DISTINCT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS REFERRAL_DATE, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS ORR_PLACEMENT_DATE, A.UAC_STATUS, A.GENDER, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, D.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME, D.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME, D.GENDER AS SPONSOR_GENDER, TRim(Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY ELSE D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY End) As SPONSOR_ADDRESS, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_CITY Else D.CITY End As SPONSOR_CITY, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_STATE Else D.STATE End As SPONSOR_STATE, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE Else D.Zip_Code End as SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, Case When C.SPONSOR_ADDRESS is not null Then C.SPONSOR_HOME_PHONE Else D.HOME_PHONE End AS SPONSOR_PHONE, E.RELATIONSHIP AS SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID And CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 AND C.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID AND D.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID WHERE UAC_STATUS NOT LIKE 'CANCEL%' Order by UAC_ID ) A

table.name: V_ENTRY_STATES
table.viewSql: SELECT LIST_ENTRY_LOCATIONS.STATE as StateName, LIST_STATES.STATE as STATE FROM LIST_ENTRY_LOCATIONS INNER JOIN LIST_STATES ON UPPER(LIST_ENTRY_LOCATIONS.STATE) = UPPER(LIST_STATES.STATENAME)

table.name: V_FAST_SWEEP
table.viewSql: SELECT A.FAST_ID, A.UAC_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, B.UAC_FAST_STATUS, B.UAC_STATUS FROM UAC_FAST A LEFT JOIN UAC_INFO B ON B.UAC_ID=A.UAC_ID WHERE A.FAST_STATUS='1'

table.name: V_GET_INFLUX_DATA
table.viewSql:
Select Distinct A.First_Name, A.Last_Name, A.Alien_No, A.DOB, A.UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, K.PROGRAM_NAME as Receiving_Program, G.PROGRAM_NAME as Referring_PROGRAM, C.DATE_OF_DECISION TRANSFER_DATE, C.CASE_WORKER as CASE_MANAGER, C.ORR_DECISION_MAKER_NAME ORR_REVIEWER,TO_CHAR(D.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as INITIAL_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(E.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as UAC_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(F.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as UAC_RISK_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(H.END_DATE, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as ISP_DATE, M."UAC_ID",M."INITIAL_EXAM",M."FOLLOWUP_EXAM",M."CXR_TEST",M."CXR_NEGATIVE",M."PPD_TEST",M."PPD_NEGATIVE",M."IGRA_TEST",M."IGRA_NEGATIVE",M."HIV_TEST",M."HIV_POSITIVE",M."PREGNANCY_TEST",M."TDAP",M."Hepatitis A",M."Hepatitis B",M."VARICELLA",M."IPV",M."MMR or MMRV",M."MCV4",M."HPV",M."FLUE",M."IMMUNIZATION" From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID And A.UAC_STATUS = B.CURRENT_STATUS Left Join UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST C On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID And nvl(C.ISDELETED,0) = 0 Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID,UPTIME From UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID,UPTIME From UAC_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) E On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID,UPTIME From UAC_RISK_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) F On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.END_DATE From UAC_INDIVIDUAL_SERVICE_PLAN A Inner Join UAC_ISP_SUB B On A.SERVICE_PLAN_ID = B.SERVICE_PLAN_ID And B.SERVICE='Legal Orientation' Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0) H On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS G On B.PROGRAM_ID = G.PROGRAM_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS K On C.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID = K.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST L On L.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID And nvl(L.ISDELETED,0) = 0 Left Join ( Select Distinct UAC_ID, CASE WHEN nvl(INITIAL_EXAM,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Initial_Exam, CASE WHEN nvl(INITIAL_EXAM,0) <> 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Followup_Exam, CASE WHEN nvl(B.CXR, 0) <> 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End CXR_TEST, Case When nvl(B.CXR,0) <> 0 Then Case When CXR_TESTCOUNT > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Else '' End as CXR_NEGATIVE, Case When nvl(B.TST, 0) <> 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as PPD_TEST, Case When nvl(B.TST,0) <> 0 Then Case When PPD_TESTCOUNT > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Else '' End as PPD_NEGATIVE, Case When nvl(B.TB_BLOOD_TEST, 0) <> 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as IGRA_TEST, Case When nvl(B.TB_BLOOD_TEST,0) <> 0 Then Case When IGRA_TESTCOUNT > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Else '' End as IGRA_NEGATIVE, CASE WHEN C.DISEASE_ID = 39 Then 'Yes' ELSE 'No' End as HIV_TEST, CASE WHEN C.DISEASE_ID = 39 And (C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 Or OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT = 39) Then 'Yes' Else '' End HIV_POSITIVE, CASE WHEN C.DISEASE_ID = 21 Then 'Yes' Else 'N/A' End as Pregnancy_Test, Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'TDap', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as TDap, Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Hepatitis A', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "Hepatitis A", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Hepatitis B', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "Hepatitis B", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Varicella', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as Varicella, Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'IPV', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as IPV, Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'MMR', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "MMR or MMRV", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Meningococcal', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as MCV4, Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'HPV', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as HPV, Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Influenza', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as Flue, C.IMMUNIZATION From UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_GENERAL_INFO A Left Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.GENERAL_INFO_ID = B.GENERAL_INFO_ID Left Join ( Select A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID, count(*) PPD_TESTCOUNT from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_TST A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID And A.RESULT = 4 Group By A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID ) N On B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = N.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID Left Join ( Select A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID, count(*) IGRA_TESTCOUNT from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_IGRA A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID And A.RESULT = 4 Group By A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID ) P On B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = P.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID Left Join ( Select A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID, count(*) CXR_TESTCOUNT from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_CXR A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID And A.FINDINGS = 6 Group By A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID ) Q On B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = Q.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID Left Join ( Select Distinct A.GENERAL_INFO_ID, B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED, B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT, CASE WHEN B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 THEN B.DISEASE_ID ELSE B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT END as DISEASE_ID, C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS, LISTAGG(E.DESCRIPTION, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.DESCRIPTION) AS IMMUNIZATION From UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.UAC_WORKING_DIAGNOSIS B On A.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID = B.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.LIST_WORKING_DIAGNOSIS C On CASE WHEN B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 THEN B.DISEASE_ID ELSE B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT END = C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_ID Left Join UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_IMMUNIZATION D On A.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID = D.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID Left Join UAC_HEALTH.LIST_HEALTH_IMMUNIZATION E On D.VACCINE_ID = E.IMMUNIZATION_ID Where B.DISEASE_ID in (21, 39) or B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT in (21, 39) Group by A.GENERAL_INFO_ID, B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED, B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT,CASE WHEN B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 THEN B.DISEASE_ID ELSE B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT END, C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS ) C ON A.GENERAL_INFO_ID = C.GENERAL_INFO_ID ) M on A.UAC_ID = M.UAC_ID
Where A.UAC_STATUS in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANFER') And A.DOB between Add_Months(Sysdate,-204) and Add_Months(sysdate, -156) And G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = 5 And L.CC_RECOMMENDATION <> 6 And Exists(Select 1 from UAC_SPONSOR_LIST Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And CURRENT_SPONSOR=1)

table.name: V_GET_USERINFO
table.viewSql: SELECT USER_ID as Org_USER_ID, Email as ORG_EMAIL, UPPER(USER_ID) as USER_ID, UPPER(EMAIL) as EMAIL, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME FROM ADM_LIST_WEB_USER

table.name: V_INFLUX_RPT_TMP
table.viewSql:
Select DISTINCT A.First_Name, A.Last_Name, A.Alien_No,A.GENDER, A.DOB, floor(Months_Between(Sysdate,A.DOB)/12) as Age, A.UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, G.PROGRAM_NAME, TO_CHAR(D.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as INITIAL_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(E.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as UAC_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(F.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as UAC_RISK_ASSESSMENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(H.ORIENTATION_END_DATE, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as ISP_DATE, M."UAC_ID",M."DATE_EVALUATED",M."Chest X-Ray Findings",M."PPD/TST or IGRA Test Result",M."Pregnancy Test Result",M."HIV Test Result",M."TDap/Td Administered",M."Tdap/Td Adminitered Date",M."Hepatitis-A Administered",M."Hepatitis-A Administered Date",M."Hepatitis-B Administered",M."Hepatitis-B Administered Date",M."Varicella Administered",M."Varicella Administered Date",M."IPV Administered",M."IPV Administered Date",M."MMR Administered",M."MMR Administered Date",M."Meningococcal Administered",M."Meningococcal Adminis. Date",M."HPV Administered",M."HPV Administered Date",M."Flu Administered",M."Flu Administered Date",M."Other Vaccine Administered",M."Other Vaccine Name",M."Other V. Administered Date" From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID And A.UAC_STATUS = B.CURRENT_STATUS Left Join UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST C On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID And nvl(C.ISDELETED,0) = 0 Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID, MAX(UPTIME) as UPTIME From UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0 GROUP BY UAC_PROGRAM_ID) D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID, MAX(UPTIME) as UPTIME From UAC_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0 GROUP BY UAC_PROGRAM_ID) E On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID, MAX(UPTIME) as UPTIME From UAC_RISK_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0 GROUP BY UAC_PROGRAM_ID) F On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join ( Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ORIENTATION_END_DATE From UAC_INDIVIDUAL_SERVICE_PLAN A Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0 And UPTIME = (Select Max(UPTIME) From UAC_INDIVIDUAL_SERVICE_PLAN Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0 And UAC_PROGRAM_ID = A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID) ) H On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS G On B.PROGRAM_ID = G.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST L On L.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID And nvl(L.ISDELETED,0) = 0 INNER Join ( Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, --UC.FIRST_NAME, UC.ALIEN_NO, A.DATE_EVALUATED, Q.TEST_RESULT as "Chest X-Ray Findings", Case When nvl(N.PPD_TESTCOUNT, 0) <> 0 or nvl(P.IGRA_TESTCOUNT, 0) <> 0 Then 'Negative' Else '' End as "PPD/TST or IGRA Test Result", -- CASE WHEN (C.DISEASE_ID = 21 and C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1) Or C.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT = 21 Then 'No' Else Case When UC.GENDER = 'F' Or UPPER(UC.GENDER)='FEMALE' Then 'Yes' Else 'N/A' End End as "Pregnancy Test Result", -- CASE WHEN C.DISEASE_ID = 39 And (C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 Or OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT = 39) Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End "HIV Test Result", CASE WHEN INSTR(M.TEST_ID, '18', 1,1) > 0 Then 'Negative' Else Case When UC.GENDER = 'F' Or UPPER(UC.GENDER)='FEMALE' Then '' Else 'N/A' End End as "Pregnancy Test Result", CASE WHEN INSTR(M.TEST_ID, '17', 1,1) > 0 Then 'Negative' Else '' End as "HIV Test Result", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Tdap/Td', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "TDap/Td Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Tdap/Td', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Tdap/Td', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "Tdap/Td Adminitered Date", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Hepatitis A', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "Hepatitis-A Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Hepatitis A', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis A', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "Hepatitis-A Administered Date", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Hepatitis B', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "Hepatitis-B Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Hepatitis B', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Hepatitis B', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "Hepatitis-B Administered Date",
Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Varicella', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "Varicella Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Varicella', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Varicella', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "Varicella Administered Date",
Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'IPV', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "IPV Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'IPV', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'IPV', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "IPV Administered Date",
Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "MMR Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,3) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1), 3) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1), 3) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1) ) , '#', 1,1) + 1, 50) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'MMR (measles, mumps, rubella)', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 50) End Else null End as "MMR Administered Date",
Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Meningococcal', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "Meningococcal Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Meningococcal', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Meningococcal', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "Meningococcal Adminis. Date",
Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'HPV', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "HPV Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'HPV', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'HPV', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "HPV Administered Date",
Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Influenza', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End as "Flu Administered", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Influenza', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Influenza', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End "Flu Administered Date", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Other', 1, 1) > 0 Then 'Yes' Else '' End as "Other Vaccine Administered", C.OTHER_VACCINE as "Other Vaccine Name", Case When INSTR(C.IMMUNIZATION, 'Other', 1, 1) > 0 Then Case When instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1), 100), ',', 1,1) > 0 Then SubStr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1) ), Instr(substr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1), instr(C.IMMUNIZATION, ',', instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1), 1 ) - instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1) ), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) Else SubStr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1), 100), instr(SubStr(C.IMMUNIZATION, instr(C.IMMUNIZATION,'Other', 1, 1), 100), '#', 1,1) + 1, 20) End Else null End as "Other V. Administered Date" From UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_GENERAL_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO UC On A.UAC_ID = UC.UAC_ID Left Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.GENERAL_INFO_ID = B.GENERAL_INFO_ID Left Join ( Select B.GENERAL_INFO_ID, count(*) PPD_TESTCOUNT from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_TST A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID Where nvl(B.TST,0) = 1 And A.INTERPRETATION = 4 And Not Exists (Select 1 from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_TST Where HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID And INTERPRETATION <> 4) Group By B.GENERAL_INFO_ID ) N On B.GENERAL_INFO_ID = N.GENERAL_INFO_ID Left Join ( Select B.GENERAL_INFO_ID, count(*) IGRA_TESTCOUNT from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_IGRA A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID Where nvl(B.TB_BLOOD_TEST,0) = 1 And A.RESULT = 4 And Not Exists(Select 1 from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_IGRA Where HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID And Result <> 4) Group By B.GENERAL_INFO_ID ) P On B.GENERAL_INFO_ID = P.GENERAL_INFO_ID Left Join ( Select B.GENERAL_INFO_ID, E.DESCRIPTION as TEST_RESULT from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_CXR A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING B On A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = B.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_GENERAL_INFO C On B.GENERAL_INFO_ID = C.GENERAL_INFO_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO D On D.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.LIST_TEST_RESULT E On A.FINDINGS = E.RESULT_ID Where nvl(B.CXR,0) = 1 And D.DOB between Add_Months(Sysdate,-204) and Add_Months(sysdate, -180) And A.DATE_UPDATED = (Select max(DATE_UPDATED) from UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_CXR Where HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID = A.HEALTH_TB_SCREENING_ID) ) Q On B.GENERAL_INFO_ID = Q.GENERAL_INFO_ID Left Join ( Select Distinct A.GENERAL_INFO_ID, B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED, B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT, CASE WHEN B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 THEN B.DISEASE_ID ELSE B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT END as DISEASE_ID, C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS, LISTAGG(E.DESCRIPTION || '#' || D.IMMUNIZATION_DATE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.DESCRIPTION) AS IMMUNIZATION , LISTAGG(D.VACCINE_OTHER_EXP, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY D.VACCINE_OTHER_EXP) as OTHER_VACCINE From UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT A Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.UAC_WORKING_DIAGNOSIS B On A.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID = B.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.LIST_WORKING_DIAGNOSIS C On CASE WHEN B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 THEN B.DISEASE_ID ELSE B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT END = C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_ID Left Join UAC_HEALTH.UAC_HEALTH_IMMUNIZATION D On A.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID = D.HEALTH_ASSESSMENT_ID Inner Join UAC_HEALTH.LIST_HEALTH_IMMUNIZATION E On D.VACCINE_ID = E.IMMUNIZATION_ID -- Where B.DISEASE_ID in (21, 39) or B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT in (21, 39) Group by A.GENERAL_INFO_ID, B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED, B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT, CASE WHEN B.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS_CONFIRMED = 1 THEN B.DISEASE_ID ELSE B.OTHER_CONDITIONS_SUBCAT END, C.WORKING_DIAGNOSIS --, D.VACCINE_OTHER_EXP ) C ON A.GENERAL_INFO_ID = C.GENERAL_INFO_ID Left Join ( Select GENERAL_INFO_ID, LISTAGG(TEST_ID, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY TEST_ID) as TEST_ID from UAC_HEALTH.HEALTH_LAB_TEST Where TEST_ID in (17,18) and TEST_RESULT_ID = 4 GROUP BY GENERAL_INFO_ID ) M On A.GENERAL_INFO_ID = M.GENERAL_INFO_ID Where Date_EVALUATED is not null And nvl(INITIAL_EXAM,0) = 1 And C.IMMUNIZATION is not null Order by A.UAC_ID, UC.FIRST_NAME, UC.ALIEN_NO ) M on A.UAC_ID = M.UAC_ID Where A.UAC_STATUS in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANFER') And A.DOB between Add_Months(Sysdate,-204) and Add_Months(sysdate, -156) And G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = 5 And L.CC_RECOMMENDATION <> 6 And Exists(Select 1 from UAC_SPONSOR_LIST Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And CURRENT_SPONSOR=1) And "PPD/TST or IGRA Test Result" is not null And "HIV Test Result" is not null And "Pregnancy Test Result" is not null Order by A.First_Name, A.Last_Name, A.Alien_No, A.DOB, A.UAC_STATUS

table.name: V_LANGUAGES
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR (A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DOB, A.COB, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.UAC_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.INITIAL_INTAKES_ID, C. UAC_ARRIVAL_DATE, C. UAC_PRIMARY_LANGUAGE, C.ISDELETED FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT C ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID

table.name: V_LOGS_CBP
table.viewSql:
SELECT
A.DATETIME_STARTED, A.DATETIME_COMPLETED, A.STATUS, A.UAC_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, B.LAST_NAME, B.FIRST_NAME, A.PROCESS_INFO, A.ACTIVITY_ID FROM XMLJOB_ACTIVITY_LOGS A LEFT JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID ORDER BY DATETIME_STARTED

table.name: V_MEDICAL_RPT
table.viewSql: SELECT a.screening_id, a.tst_result, a.igra_result, a.xray_findings, a.xray_scpecify_if_abnormal, a.smears_result, a.nucleicacid_result, a.caltures_results, a.drug_susceptibility_resutl, b.date_admitted, c.dob, c.cob, d.program_name, e.sponsor_state FROM uac_medical_screening a LEFT JOIN uac_program_info b ON a.uac_program_id = b.uac_program_id LEFT OUTER JOIN uac_info c ON b.uac_id = c.uac_id LEFT OUTER JOIN list_programs d ON b.program_id = d.program_id LEFT OUTER JOIN uac_sponsor_list e ON b.uac_id = e.uac_id AND E.IS_DELETED = 0 WHERE a.isdeleted = 0 AND d.isactive = 1

table.name: V_PC_UNDERWRITERS
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT 'DIHORR', UI.ALIEN_NO, '01', UPI.DATE_ADMITTED, DATE_DISCHARGED, '', UI.DOB, UI.GENDER, UI.LAST_NAME, UI.FIRST_NAME, SUBSTR(UI.MIDDLE_NAME,0,1), '','','','',LP.PROGRAM_NAME,LP.ADDRESS, '', LP.CITY, LP.STATE, LP.ZIPCODE,'', '', '', '',UPI.CURRENT_STATUS FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_INFO UI ON UPI.UAC_ID = UI.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON UPI.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID WHERE UPPER(UI.FIRST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND UPPER(UI.LAST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND LENGTH(UI.ALIEN_NO) < 10 AND (CURRENT_STATUS in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'ENROUTE') Or (CURRENT_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' AND DATE_DISCHARGED > TO_DATE('09/30/2016', 'mm/dd/yyyy')))

table.name: V_PNEU_PT1
table.viewSql: SELECT A.ALIEN_NO, A.DOB, A.COB, A.GENDER, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.CITY_OF_APPREHENSION, A.STATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, D.PROGRAM_NAME, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID

table.name: V_PNEU_PT2
table.viewSql: SELECT A.ALIEN_NO, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, D.PROGRAM_NAME, F.UAC_ARRIVAL_DATE, F.DATE_DEPARTURE_COR FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT F ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID

table.name: V_PNEU_PT3
table.viewSql: SELECT A.ALIEN_NO, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, D.PROGRAM_NAME, G.LOCATION_APPREHENDED, J.DESCRIPTION AS REFERRING_SECTOR, G.THE_DATE_LEFT_HOME_COUNTRY, G.THE_LENGTH_OF_THE_TRIP FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_ASSESSMENT G ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = G.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_ICE_CBP J ON A.REFERRING_OFFICE = J.ICE_CBP_ID

table.name: V_PNEU_PT4
table.viewSql: SELECT A.ALIEN_NO, A.DOB, A.COB, A.GENDER, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, K.IMMUNE_TYPE_ID, K.IMMUNE_DATE1, K.IMMUNE_DATE2, K.IMMUNE_DATE3, K.IMMUNE_DATE4, K.IMMUNE_DATE5 FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_IMMUNIZATION K ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = K.UAC_PROGRAM_ID where K.IMMUNE_TYPE_ID='13'

table.name: V_RELEASE_ANALYSIS
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR (A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, A.COB, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.UAC_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.RELEASE_ID, C.TYPE_OF_RELEASE, C.ORR_DECISION, C.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS, C.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS, C.RELEASE_APPROVED_DATE, C.ISDELETED, D.PROGRAM_NAME AS CURRENT_PROGRAM, E.PROGRAM_TYPE AS CURRENT_PROGRAM_TYPE, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST C ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID

table.name: V_SIR_ALEXIS
table.viewSql: SELECT A.SIR_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.DATE_OF_INCIDENT, A.DATE_REPORTED, A.ABUSE_PERPETRATOR_ID, A.RUNAWAY, A.RUNAWAY_RISK, A.ABSENSE_OF_UAC, A.DATE_CREATED, A.USER_CREATED, B.DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.AKA, C.DOB, C.COB, C.DATE_OF_ENTRY, C.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, C.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, C.PREGNANCY, C.INJURY, C.ILLNESS, C.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, C.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, C.UAC_STATUS, GENDER, D.PROGRAM_NAME, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID, G.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID, H.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID, I.BEHAVIOR_ID FROM UAC_SIR A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS F ON F.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUES G ON G.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES H ON H.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_UAC_BEHAVIOR I ON I.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID WHERE A.ISDELETED = 0 AND D.ISACTIVE = 1

table.name: V_SIR_RPT
table.viewSql: SELECT RowNum as SID, A.SIR_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.DATE_OF_INCIDENT, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_REPORTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REPORTED, A.ABUSE_PERPETRATOR_ID, A.RUNAWAY, A.RUNAWAY_RISK, A.ABSENSE_OF_UAC, A.SIR_ADDENDUM_NOTE, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_CREATED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_CREATED, A.USER_CREATED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.AKA, TO_CHAR (C.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, C.COB, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, C.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, C.PREGNANCY, C.INJURY, C.ILLNESS, C.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, C.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, C.UAC_STATUS, GENDER, D.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID, G.ABUSE_TYPE, H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID, I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE, J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID, K.INCIDENT_TYPE, L.BEHAVIOR_ID, M.BEHAVIOR FROM UAC_SIR A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS F ON F.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS G ON G.ABUSE_TYPE_ID = F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUES H ON H.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_SIR_MM_ISSUES I ON I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID = H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES J ON J.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES K ON K.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID = J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_UAC_BEHAVIOR L ON L.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_UAC_BEHAVIOR M ON M.BEHAVIOR_ID = L.BEHAVIOR_ID WHERE A.ISDELETED = 0 AND D.ISACTIVE = 1

table.name: V_SIR_RPT_ALL_FIELDS
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.SIR_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.DATE_OF_INCIDENT, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_REPORTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REPORTED, A.LOCATION_OF_INCIDENT, A.ABUSE_PERPETRATOR_ID, A.RUNAWAY, A.RUNAWAY_RISK, A.ABSENSE_OF_UAC, A.SYNOPSIS_OF_INCIDENT, A.WITNESSES, A.STAFF_RESPONSES, A.RESOLUTION, A.RECOMMENDATIONS, A.INFO_RELEASED_TO_MEDIA, A.JURISDICTION_NAME, A.JURISDICTION_PHONE, A.JURISDICTION_TITLE, A.CONTACT_NAME, A.CONTACT_PHONE, A.CONTACT_TITLE, A.FILER_NAME, A.FILER_PHONE, A.FILER_TITLE, A.SUPERVISOR_NAME, A.SUPERVISOR_NOTE, A.SUPERVISOR_PHONE, A.SUPERVISOR_TITLE, A.SIR_ADDENDUM_NOTE, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_CREATED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_CREATED, A.USER_CREATED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.AKA, TO_CHAR (C.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, C.COB, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, C.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, C.PREGNANCY, C.INJURY, C.ILLNESS, C.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, C.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, C.UAC_STATUS, GENDER, D.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_ID, D.ISACTIVE, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID, G.ABUSE_TYPE, H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID, I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE, J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID, K.INCIDENT_TYPE, L.BEHAVIOR_ID, M.BEHAVIOR FROM UAC_SIR A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS F ON F.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS G ON G.ABUSE_TYPE_ID = F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUES H ON H.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_SIR_MM_ISSUES I ON I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID = H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES J ON J.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES K ON K.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID = J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_UAC_BEHAVIOR L ON L.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_UAC_BEHAVIOR M ON M.BEHAVIOR_ID = L.BEHAVIOR_ID
WHERE A.ISDELETED = 0

table.name: V_SIR_RPT_SYNOP
table.viewSql: SELECT A.SIR_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.DATE_OF_INCIDENT, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_REPORTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REPORTED, A.ABUSE_PERPETRATOR_ID, A.RUNAWAY, A.RUNAWAY_RISK, A.ABSENSE_OF_UAC, A.SYNOPSIS_OF_INCIDENT, A.SIR_ADDENDUM_NOTE, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_CREATED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_CREATED, A.USER_CREATED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.AKA, TO_CHAR (C.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, C.COB, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, C.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, C.PREGNANCY,
