C.INJURY, C.ILLNESS, C.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, C.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, C.NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, C.UAC_STATUS, GENDER, D.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID, G.ABUSE_TYPE, H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID, I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE, J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID, K.INCIDENT_TYPE, L.BEHAVIOR_ID, M.BEHAVIOR FROM UAC_SIR A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS F ON F.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_ABUSE_ALLEGATIONS G ON G.ABUSE_TYPE_ID = F.ABUSE_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUES H ON H.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_SIR_MM_ISSUES I ON I.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID = H.MEDICAL_MENTAL_ISSUE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES J ON J.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_OTHER_INCIDENT_TYPES K ON K.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID = J.INCIDENT_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SIR_UAC_BEHAVIOR L ON L.SIR_ID = A.SIR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_UAC_BEHAVIOR M ON M.BEHAVIOR_ID = L.BEHAVIOR_ID WHERE A.ISDELETED = 0 AND D.ISACTIVE = 1

table.name: V_SIR_SOHN
table.viewSql:
Select a.DATE_created, a.sir_id, a.event_id,sir_type_id, a.addendum_id, a.uac_program_id, a.ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE, a.INCIDENT_AT_ANOTHER_FACILITY, a.CARE_PROVIDER_NAME, A.CARE_PROVIDER_CITY, A.CARE_PROVIDER_STATE, A.DATE_REPORTED_TO_CARE_PROVIDER, A.DATE_REPORTED_TO_ORR, A.LOCATION_OF_INCIDENT, A.SA_TYPE_OF_INCIDENT, a.SA_TYPE_OF_ALLEGATION, a.SA_TYPE_OF_ALLEGATION_SPECIFY, b.uac_id, b.program_id, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.PROGRAM_NAME, E.PROGRAM_TYPE, A.ISDELETED, SUBSTR (F.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT,1,250) AS SYPNO
FROM UAC_sir_new A left join uac_program_info b on a.uac_program_id=b.uac_program_id LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_SIR_EVENT F ON F.EVENT_ID = A.EVENT_ID

table.name: V_SPONSOR_AFFIDAVITS_SUPPORT
table.viewSql: SELECT a.affidavit_id, a.sponsor_id, a.annual_income, a.proof_of_income, a.emp_name, a.emp_address, a.emp_city, a.emp_state, a.emp_zipcode, a.emp_phone, a.has_doc_support, a.date_created, a.user_created, a.uptime, a.upuser FROM sponsor_affidavits_support a INNER JOIN sponsor_info b ON b.sponsor_id = a.sponsor_id WHERE b.is_deleted = 0

table.name: V_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS
table.viewSql: SELECT A."OCCUPANT_ID",A."SPONSOR_ID",A."NAME_OF_OCCUPANT",A."AGE", A.UPTIME, Case when A.DEPENDENT_OF_SPONSOR = 1 Then 'Yes' When A.DEPENDENT_OF_SPONSOR = 0 Then 'No' When A.DEPENDENT_OF_SPONSOR = 2 Then 'Partial' End as Dependency , (Select Relationship from List_Relationship where Relationship_Id = A.RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR) as RelationshipToSponsor , (Select Relationship from List_Relationship where Relationship_Id = A.RELATIONSHIP_TO_MINOR) as RelationshipToUAC FROM SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS A

table.name: V_SPONSOR_INFO
table.viewSql: SELECT a.sponsor_id, a.ssn, a.first_name, a.last_name, a.alien_no, b.sponsor_address || ' ' || b.sponsor_address_secondary AS address, b.sponsor_city AS city, b.sponsor_state AS state, b.sponsor_zipcode AS zip_code, p_counter, a_counter, a.dob, a.cob, a.cor, a.marriage_status, b.sponsor_home_phone AS home_phone, b.sponsor_work_phone AS work_phone, b.sponsor_fax AS fax, b.sponsor_email AS email, a.gender, a.legal_status_id, b.sponsor_relationship_to_uac, b.uac_relationship_to_sponsor, a.household_has_disease, a.household_has_criminal_hist, nvl(b.comments, a.notes) AS notes, a.sponsorthip_status, CASE WHEN nvl(a.flag, 0) = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE 'Yes' END AS flag, flag_note, c.sponsor_category, a.flag_address, a.flag_address_note FROM sponsor_info a INNER JOIN uac_sponsor_list b ON a.sponsor_id = b.sponsor_id LEFT JOIN list_relationship c ON b.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = c.relationship_id WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 AND b.is_deleted = 0 UNION SELECT sponsor_id, ssn, first_name, last_name, alien_no, address, city, state, zip_code, p_counter, a_counter, dob, cob, cor, marriage_status, home_phone, work_phone, fax, email, gender, legal_status_id, sponsor_relationship_to_uac, uac_relationship_to_sponsor, household_has_disease, household_has_criminal_hist, notes, sponsorthip_status, CASE WHEN nvl(flag, 0) = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE 'Yes' END AS flag, flag_note, NULL AS sponsor_category, flag_address, flag_address_note FROM sponsor_info a WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM uac_sponsor_list WHERE sponsor_id = a.sponsor_id AND a.is_deleted = 0 ) AND is_deleted = 0

table.name: V_SPONSOR_LEGAL_RPT
table.viewSql: Select B.CURRENT_SPONSOR, A."SPONSOR_ID",A."FIRST_NAME",A."LAST_NAME",A."SSN",A."ALIEN_NO", B."SPONSOR_ADDRESS" as ADDRESS, B.SPONSOR_CITY "CITY", B.SPONSOR_STATE "STATE", B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE "ZIP_CODE", A."DOB", Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, A."COB", A."COR", A."MARRIAGE_STATUS", B.SPONSOR_HOME_PHONE "HOME_PHONE", B.SPONSOR_WORK_PHONE "WORK_PHONE", B.SPONSOR_FAX "FAX", B.SPONSOR_EMAIL "EMAIL", A."GENDER", A."LEGAL_STATUS_ID", A."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC", A."UAC_RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR", A."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_DISEASE", A."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_CRIMINAL_HIST", D.LEGAL_STATUS From SPONSOR_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.SPONSOR_ID = B.SPONSOR_ID Inner Join LIST_LEGAL_STATUS D On A.LEGAL_STATUS_ID = D.LEGAL_STATUS_ID where a.is_deleted = 0

table.name: V_SPONSOR_SPONSORED_UACS
table.viewSql: SELECT SS.SPONSORED_ID, SS.SPONSOR_ID, SS.UAC_ID,SS.UAC_ANUMBER,SS.FACILITYID_SPONSORED_FROM,CONCAT(UI.FIRST_NAME,UI.LAST_NAME) AS UAC_NAME, LR.RELATIONSHIP FROM UAC_SPONSOR_SPONSORED_UACS SS INNER JOIN UAC_INFO UI ON SS.UAC_ID = UI.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP LR ON LR.RELATIONSHIP_ID = SS.RELATIONSHIP_ID

table.name: V_SPRTD_UAC_DATA_REFRESH_RPT
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOB, A.COB, A.GENDER, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_ADMITTED, A.UAC_STATUS, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.MAIL_CITY AS PROGRAM_CITY, F.MAIL_STATE AS PROGRAM_STATE, UIA.UAC_PRIMARY_LANGUAGE AS CHILDS_PRIMARY_LANGUAGE, CASE WHEN E.RELATIONSHIP IN ('Mother', 'Father', 'Legal Guardian') THEN D.ALIEN_NO ELSE Null END AS SPONSOR_ALIEN_NO FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND C.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT UIA ON UIA.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND (UIA.ISDELETED IS Null OR UIA.ISDELETED = 0) LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID WHERE ( ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT UAC_ID, MAX(b1.DATE_ADMITTED) as MAX_DATE_ADMITTED FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO b1 GROUP BY UAC_ID) maxAdmt WHERE B.DATE_ADMITTED = maxAdmt.MAX_DATE_ADMITTED AND B.UAC_ID = maxAdmt.UAC_ID)) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM UAC_INFO WHERE (UAC_STATUS = 'ENROUTE') AND UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID)) OR ((NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT UAC_ID, MAX(b1.DATE_ADMITTED) as MAX_DATE_ADMITTED FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO b1 GROUP BY UAC_ID) maxAdmt WHERE B.DATE_ADMITTED = maxAdmt.MAX_DATE_ADMITTED AND B.UAC_ID = maxAdmt.UAC_ID)) AND (A.UAC_STATUS = 'ENROUTE' OR A.UAC_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) )

table.name: V_SPRTD_UAC_DATA_RFRSH_APP_RPT
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DOB,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOB, A.COB, A.GENDER, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_ADMITTED, A.UAC_STATUS, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(H.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, I.DISCHARGE_TYPE, F.PROGRAM_NAME, G.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.MAIL_CITY AS PROGRAM_CITY, F.MAIL_STATE AS PROGRAM_STATE, CASE WHEN E.RELATIONSHIP IN ('Mother', 'Father', 'Legal Guardian') THEN CASE WHEN D.ALIEN_NO Is Null THEN (SELECT UAI.ANUMBER FROM UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO UAI WHERE UAI.RELATIONSHIP_ID = C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC AND A.UAC_ID = UAI.UAC_ID AND rownum = 1 ) ELSE D.ALIEN_NO END ELSE Null END AS SPONSOR_ALIEN_NO FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND C.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO D ON C.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON C.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS F ON B.PROGRAM_ID = F.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE G ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT H ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE I ON H.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = I.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID WHERE ( ((EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT UAC_ID, MAX(b1.DATE_ADMITTED) as MAX_DATE_ADMITTED FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO b1 GROUP BY UAC_ID) maxAdmt WHERE B.DATE_ADMITTED = maxAdmt.MAX_DATE_ADMITTED AND B.UAC_ID = maxAdmt.UAC_ID)) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM UAC_INFO WHERE (UAC_STATUS = 'ENROUTE') AND UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID)) OR ((NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT UAC_ID, MAX(b1.DATE_ADMITTED) as MAX_DATE_ADMITTED FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO b1 GROUP BY UAC_ID) maxAdmt WHERE B.DATE_ADMITTED = maxAdmt.MAX_DATE_ADMITTED AND B.UAC_ID = maxAdmt.UAC_ID)) AND (A.UAC_STATUS = 'ENROUTE' OR A.UAC_STATUS = 'CANCELLED')) )

table.name: V_TEMP_INCARE
table.viewSql: Select B.PROGRAM_NAME, B.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, A.UAC_ID, A.PROGRAM_ID, A.CURRENT_STATUS, A.DATE_ADMITTED, A.DATE_DISCHARGED from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID Where TRUNC(DATE_ADMITTED) <= TRUNC(TO_DATE('10/1/2014', 'mm/dd/yyyy')) And (DATE_DISCHARGED is null or TRUNC(nvl(DATE_DISCHARGED, A.Uptime)) > TRUNC(TO_DATE('10/1/2014', 'mm/dd/yyyy'))) And A.PROGRAM_ID=10

table.name: V_TRAFFICKING_RPT
table.viewSql:
SELECT C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, C.AKA, TO_CHAR (C.DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DOB, C.COB, GENDER, A.TRAFFICKING_IN_PERSONS, A.DATE_ELIGIBILITY_LETTER_ISSUED, A.CHILD_DISABILITY_ACT, A.SPECIFY_UAC_DISABILITY, A.VICTIM_OF_PHYSEX_ABUSE, A.SPONSOR_RISK_TO_UAC, A.CITY_OF_ORIGIN, A.THE_LENGTH_OF_THE_TRIP, A.WHO_TRAVELED_WITH_THE_CHILD, A.BEEN_IN_US_BEFORE, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, TO_CHAR(C.DATE_ORR_APPROVED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ORR_APPROVED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (C.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, C.UAC_STATUS, D.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE
FROM UAC_ASSESSMENT A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID

table.name: V_TRANSFER_REQ_RPT
table.viewSql:
SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR (A.DOB,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DOB, A.COB, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_ENTRY,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, TO_CHAR (A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.UAC_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_REFERRED,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DATE_REFERRED, B.BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DATE_ADMITTED, B.CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR (B.DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYY') AS DATE_DISCHARGED, C.TRANSFER_REQUEST_ID, C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, C.DATE_REQUESTED, C.CONCUR_WITH_REQUESTING_PARTY, C.RECOMMENDED_PROGRAM_TYPE, F.PROGRAM_TYPE AS RECOMMENDEDPROGTYPE, C.CASE_COORDINATOR_NAME, C.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID, G.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROPSED_PROGRAM, C.PROVIDE_LESS_RESTRICTIVE, C.PROVIDE_MORE_RESTRICTIVE, C.MINOR_MEDICAL_HEALTH, C.MINOR_MENTAL_HEALTH, C.VIOLENT_BEHAVIOR, C.DISRUPTIVE_BEHAVIOR, C.MINORS_SAFETY, C.FLIGHT_RISK, C.EMERGENCY_INFLUX, C.ISDELETED, D.PROGRAM_NAME AS CURRENT_PROGRAM, D.PROGRAM_ID AS CURRENT_PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE AS CURRENT_PROGRAM_TYPE
FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST C ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D ON B.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E ON E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE F ON F.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = C.RECOMMENDED_PROGRAM_TYPE LEFT OUTER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS G ON G.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID WHERE C.TRANSFER_REQUEST_ID IS NOT NULL

table.name: V_UAC_ENROLLMENT_RPT
table.viewSql:
SELECT ROWNUM AS sid, a."UAC_ID", a."ALIEN_NO", a."FIRST_NAME", a."LAST_NAME", a."DOB", a."COB", a."DATE_OF_ENTRY", a."STATE_OF_ENTRY", a."DATE_OF_APPREHENSION", a."REFERRING_SECTOR", a."DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED", a."TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED", a."DATE_ORR_APPROVED", a."TIME_ORR_APPROVED", a."IMMIGRATION_STATUS", a."REFERRING_AGENCY", a."UAC_STATUS", a."GENDER", a."UAC_PROGRAM_ID", a."PROGRAM_ID", a."DATE_REFERRED", a."DATE_ADMITTED", a."CURRENT_STATUS", a."DATE_DISCHARGED", a."DATE_DISCHARGED_TEMP", a."SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME", a."SPONSOR_LAST_NAME", a."SPONSOR_GENDER", a."SPONSOR_ALIEN_NO", a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS", a."SPONSOR_CITY", a."SPONSOR_STATE", a."SPONSOR_ZIPCODE", a."SPONSOR_PHONE", a."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC", a."PROGRAM_NAME", a."PROGRAM_TYPE", a."DISCHARGE_TYPE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.uac_id, a.alien_no, a.first_name, a.last_name, to_char(a.dob, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS dob, a.cob, a.date_of_entry, a.state_of_entry, to_char(a.date_of_apprehension, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_of_apprehension, j.description AS referring_sector, to_char(a.date_orr_notified, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_notified, a.time_orr_notified, to_char(a.date_orr_approved, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_approved, a.time_orr_approved, a.immigration_status, a.referring_agency, a.uac_status, a.gender, b.uac_program_id, f.program_id, to_char(b.date_referred, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_referred, to_char(b.date_admitted, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_admitted, b.current_status, to_char(h.date_of_discharge, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_discharged, b.date_discharged AS date_discharged_temp, d.first_name AS sponsor_first_name, d.last_name AS sponsor_last_name, d.gender AS sponsor_gender, d.alien_no AS sponsor_alien_no, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_address || ' ' || c.sponsor_address_secondary ELSE d.address || ' ' || d.address_secondary END AS sponsor_address, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_city ELSE d.city END AS sponsor_city, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_state ELSE d.state END AS sponsor_state, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_zipcode ELSE d.zip_code END AS sponsor_zipcode, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_home_phone ELSE d.home_phone END AS sponsor_phone, e.relationship AS sponsor_relationship_to_uac, f.program_name, g.program_type, i.discharge_type FROM uac_info a LEFT JOIN uac_program_info b ON a.uac_id = b.uac_id LEFT JOIN uac_sponsor_list c ON a.uac_id = c.uac_id AND C.IS_dELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN sponsor_info d ON c.sponsor_id = d.sponsor_id AND D.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN list_relationship e ON c.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = e.relationship_id LEFT JOIN list_programs f ON b.program_id = f.program_id LEFT JOIN list_program_type g ON f.program_type_id = g.program_type_id LEFT JOIN uac_program_exit h ON b.uac_program_id = h.uac_program_id LEFT JOIN list_discharge_type i ON h.type_of_discharge = i.discharge_type_id LEFT JOIN list_ice_cbp j ON a.referring_office = j.ice_cbp_id
UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT a.uac_id, a.alien_no, a.first_name, a.last_name, to_char(a.dob, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS dob, a.cob, a.date_of_entry, a.state_of_entry, to_char(a.date_of_apprehension, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_of_apprehension, j.description AS referring_sector, to_char(a.date_orr_notified, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_notified, a.time_orr_notified, to_char(a.date_orr_approved, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_approved, a.time_orr_approved, a.immigration_status, a.referring_agency, a.uac_status, a.gender, b.uac_program_id, f.program_id, to_char(b.date_referred, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_referred, to_char(b.date_admitted, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_admitted, b.current_status, to_char(h.date_of_discharge, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_discharged, b.date_discharged AS date_discharged_temp, d.first_name AS sponsor_first_name, d.last_name AS sponsor_last_name, d.gender AS sponsor_gender, d.alien_no AS sponsor_alien_no, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_address || ' ' || c.sponsor_address_secondary ELSE d.address || ' ' || d.address_secondary END AS sponsor_address, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_city ELSE d.city END AS sponsor_city, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_state ELSE d.state END AS sponsor_state, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_zipcode ELSE d.zip_code END AS sponsor_zipcode, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_home_phone ELSE d.home_phone END AS sponsor_phone, e.relationship AS sponsor_relationship_to_uac, f.program_name, g.program_type, i.discharge_type FROM uac_info a LEFT JOIN uac_program_info b ON a.uac_id = b.uac_id LEFT JOIN uac_sponsor_list c ON a.uac_id = c.uac_id AND C.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN sponsor_info d ON c.sponsor_id = d.sponsor_id AND D.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN list_relationship e ON c.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = e.relationship_id LEFT JOIN list_programs f ON b.program_id = f.program_id LEFT JOIN list_program_type g ON f.program_type_id = g.program_type_id LEFT JOIN uac_program_exit h ON b.uac_program_id = h.uac_program_id LEFT JOIN list_discharge_type i ON h.type_of_discharge = i.discharge_type_id LEFT JOIN list_ice_cbp j ON a.referring_office = j.ice_cbp_id
ORDER BY uac_id ) a

table.name: V_UAC_ENROLLMENT_RPT_DUMMY
table.viewSql:
SELECT ROWNUM AS sid, a."UAC_ID", a."ALIEN_NO", a."FIRST_NAME", a."LAST_NAME", a."DOB", a."COB", a."DATE_OF_ENTRY", a."STATE_OF_ENTRY", a."DATE_OF_APPREHENSION", a."REFERRING_SECTOR", a."DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED", a."TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED", a."DATE_ORR_APPROVED", a."TIME_ORR_APPROVED", a."IMMIGRATION_STATUS", a."REFERRING_AGENCY", a."UAC_STATUS", a."GENDER", a."UAC_PROGRAM_ID", a."PROGRAM_ID", a."DATE_REFERRED", a."DATE_ADMITTED", a."CURRENT_STATUS", a."DATE_DISCHARGED", a."DATE_DISCHARGED_TEMP", a."SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME", a."SPONSOR_LAST_NAME", a."SPONSOR_GENDER", a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS", a."SPONSOR_CITY", a."SPONSOR_STATE", a."SPONSOR_ZIPCODE", a."SPONSOR_PHONE", a."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC", a."PROGRAM_NAME", a."PROGRAM_TYPE", a."DISCHARGE_TYPE" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.uac_id, a.alien_no, a.first_name, a.last_name, to_char(a.dob, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS dob, a.cob, a.date_of_entry, a.state_of_entry, to_char(a.date_of_apprehension, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_of_apprehension, j.description AS referring_sector, to_char(a.date_orr_notified, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_notified, a.time_orr_notified, to_char(a.date_orr_approved, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_approved, a.time_orr_approved, a.immigration_status, a.referring_agency, a.uac_status, a.gender, b.uac_program_id, f.program_id, to_char(b.date_referred, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_referred, to_char(b.date_admitted, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_admitted, b.current_status, to_char(h.date_of_discharge, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_discharged, b.date_discharged AS date_discharged_temp, d.first_name AS sponsor_first_name, d.last_name AS sponsor_last_name, d.gender AS sponsor_gender, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_address || ' ' || c.sponsor_address_secondary ELSE d.address || ' ' || d.address_secondary END AS sponsor_address, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_city ELSE d.city END AS sponsor_city, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_state ELSE d.state END AS sponsor_state, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_zipcode ELSE d.zip_code END AS sponsor_zipcode, CASE WHEN c.sponsor_address IS NOT NULL THEN c.sponsor_home_phone ELSE d.home_phone END AS sponsor_phone, e.relationship AS sponsor_relationship_to_uac, f.program_name, g.program_type, i.discharge_type FROM uac_info a LEFT JOIN uac_program_info b ON a.uac_id = b.uac_id LEFT JOIN uac_sponsor_list c ON a.uac_id = c.uac_id AND C.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN sponsor_info d ON c.sponsor_id = d.sponsor_id AND D.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN list_relationship e ON c.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = e.relationship_id LEFT JOIN list_programs f ON b.program_id = f.program_id LEFT JOIN list_program_type g ON f.program_type_id = g.program_type_id LEFT JOIN uac_program_exit h ON b.uac_program_id = h.uac_program_id LEFT JOIN list_discharge_type i ON h.type_of_discharge = i.discharge_type_id LEFT JOIN list_ice_cbp j ON a.referring_office = j.ice_cbp_id
ORDER BY a.uac_id ) a

table.name: V_UAC_HOMESTUDY_INFO
table.viewSql: Select A."HOMESTUDY_ID", A."UAC_PROGRAM_ID", A."REFERRAL_ID", A."REFERRING_FACILITY_NAME", A."FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER", A."ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL", A."REFERRAL_STATUS", A."SPONSOR_NAME", A."SPONSOR_ADDRESS", A."SPONSOR_CATEGORY", A."SPONSOR_CITY", A."SPONSOR_STATE", A."SPONSOR_ZIP_CODE", A."EXPEDITED", A."REASON_EXPEDITED", A."SPECIFY_OTHER", A."SPECIAL_INSTRUCTIONS", A."REASON_FOR_REFERRAL", A."DATE_CREATED", A."USER_CREATED", A."UPTIME", A."UPUSER", C."PROGRAM_NAME" From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS C ON B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID

table.name: V_UAC_INACTIVE_ENROUTE
table.viewSql: Select "UAC_ID","ALIEN_NO","FIRST_NAME","LAST_NAME","AKA","DOB","COB","DATE_OF_ENTRY","MANNER_OF_ENTRY","CITY_OF_ENTRY","SPECIFY_CITY_OF_ENTRY","STATE_OF_ENTRY","DATE_OF_APPREHENSION","REFERRING_OFFICE","NOTIFICATION_CITY","SPECIFY_NOT_CITY","NOTIFICATION_STATE","DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED","TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED","DATE_ORR_APPROVED","TIME_ORR_APPROVED","PREGNANCY","INJURY","ILLNESS","BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION","BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION","NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION","NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION","IMMIGRATION_STATUS","REFERRING_AGENCY","ORR_COMMENTS","UAC_STATUS","DATE_CREATED","USER_CREATED","UPTIME","UPUSER","GENDER","UAC_FAST_STATUS","STATUS_ID","AGENCY_ID" from UAC_INFO where UAC_STATUs = 'ENROUTE' and Extract(Day from Uptime) + 7 < Extract(day from sysdate) And UPtime < Sysdate

table.name: V_UAC_ORIG_SPONSOR_INFO
table.viewSql: SELECT a.uac_id, a.current_sponsor, b."SPONSOR_ID", b."FIRST_NAME", b."LAST_NAME", b."SSN", b."ALIEN_NO", a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS" AS address, a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY" address_secondary, a.sponsor_city "CITY", a.sponsor_state "STATE", a.sponsor_zipcode "ZIP_CODE", b."DOB", trunc(months_between(sysdate, b.dob) / 12) AS age, b."COB", b."COR", b."MARRIAGE_STATUS", a.query_id, a.sponsor_home_phone "HOME_PHONE", a.backup_phone_type, a.sponsor_work_phone "WORK_PHONE", a.sponsor_fax "FAX", a.sponsor_email "EMAIL", b."GENDER", b."LEGAL_STATUS_ID", a."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC", b."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_DISEASE", b."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_CRIMINAL_HIST", nvl(a.comments, b.notes) AS "NOTES", b."SPONSORTHIP_STATUS", b."P_COUNTER", b."A_COUNTER", b."DATE_CREATED", b."USER_CREATED", b."UPTIME", b."UPUSER", d.legal_status, e.relationship, b.flag, b.flag_note, b.flag_address, b.flag_address_note, e.sponsor_category || e.sponsor_sub_category AS sponsor_category, prs.prs_id, prs.orig_sponsor_id, prs.referral_status FROM uac_post_release_service prs INNER JOIN uac_program_info pi ON prs.uac_program_id = pi.uac_program_id LEFT JOIN uac_sponsor_list a ON prs.orig_sponsor_id = a.sponsor_id AND A.IS_DELETED = 0 INNER JOIN sponsor_info b ON a.sponsor_id = b.sponsor_id AND B.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN list_legal_status d ON b.legal_status_id = d.legal_status_id LEFT JOIN list_relationship e ON a.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = e.relationship_id

table.name: V_UAC_ORIG_SPONSOR_INFO_HS
table.viewSql: SELECT a.uac_id, a.current_sponsor, b."SPONSOR_ID", b."FIRST_NAME", b."LAST_NAME", b."SSN", b."ALIEN_NO", a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS" AS address, a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY" address_secondary, a.sponsor_city "CITY", a.sponsor_state "STATE", a.sponsor_zipcode "ZIP_CODE", b."DOB", trunc(months_between(sysdate, b.dob) / 12) AS age, b."COB", b."COR", b."MARRIAGE_STATUS", a.query_id, a.sponsor_home_phone "HOME_PHONE", a.backup_phone_type, a.sponsor_work_phone "WORK_PHONE", a.sponsor_fax "FAX", a.sponsor_email "EMAIL", b."GENDER", b."LEGAL_STATUS_ID", a."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC", b."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_DISEASE", b."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_CRIMINAL_HIST", nvl(a.comments, b.notes) AS "NOTES", b."SPONSORTHIP_STATUS", b."P_COUNTER", b."A_COUNTER", b."DATE_CREATED", b."USER_CREATED", b."UPTIME", b."UPUSER", d.legal_status, e.relationship, b.flag, b.flag_note, b.flag_address, b.flag_address_note, e.sponsor_category || e.sponsor_sub_category AS sponsor_category, hcr.homestudy_id, hcr.orig_sponsor_id, hcr.referral_status FROM uac_homestudy_case_referral hcr INNER JOIN uac_program_info pi ON hcr.uac_program_id = pi.uac_program_id LEFT JOIN uac_sponsor_list a ON hcr.orig_sponsor_id = a.sponsor_id and a.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN sponsor_info b ON a.sponsor_id = b.sponsor_id and b.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN list_legal_status d ON b.legal_status_id = d.legal_status_id LEFT JOIN list_relationship e ON a.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = e.relationship_id

table.name: V_UAC_PROG_INFO
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, UPI.PROGRAM_ID, UPI.DATE_ADMITTED,UI.ALIEN_NO, UI.FIRST_NAME, UI.LAST_NAME, UI.DOB, UI.COB,UF.FAST_STATUS, UI.DATE_OF_ENTRY, UPI.CURRENT_STATUS as UAC_STATUS, D.UPTIME as UAC_ASSESS_DATE, CASE When UAC_FAST_STATUS = 'F' Then 'Fast' Else '' END as FAST, CASE When UAC_FAST_STATUS = 'N' Then 'Non-Fast' Else '' END as NONFAST FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_INFO UI ON UPI.UAC_ID = UI.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_FAST UF ON UI.UAC_ID = UF.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID, Max(UPTIME) as UPTIME From UAC_ASSESSMENT Group By UAC_PROGRAM_ID) D On UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID

table.name: V_UAC_PROGRAM_INFO_MIR
table.viewSql: SELECT A.UAC_ID, ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, TO_CHAR(DOB,'MM/DD/YYYY') DOB, COB, DATE_OF_ENTRY, MANNER_OF_ENTRY, CITY_OF_ENTRY, SPECIFY_CITY_OF_ENTRY, STATE_OF_ENTRY, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, REFERRING_OFFICE, NOTIFICATION_CITY, SPECIFY_NOT_CITY, NOTIFICATION_STATE, DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, DATE_ORR_APPROVED, TIME_ORR_APPROVED, PREGNANCY, INJURY, ILLNESS, BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, NOTE_BI_WO_MEDICATION, NOTE_FOR_W_MEDICATION, IMMIGRATION_STATUS, REFERRING_AGENCY, ORR_COMMENTS, UAC_STATUS, GENDER, UAC_FAST_STATUS, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_REFERRED, BIO_VERIFIED, TO_CHAR(DATE_ADMITTED,'MM/DD/YYYY') DATE_ADMITTED, CURRENT_STATUS, TO_CHAR(E.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE,'MM/DD/YYYY') DATE_DISCHARGED, TO_CHAR(DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') ARCHIVE_DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.DISCHARGE_TYPE FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS C ON B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE D ON C.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT E ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE F ON E.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = F.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID

table.name: V_UAC_SPONSOR_CATEGORY
table.viewSql: SELECT A.RELATIONSHIP_ID, A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY || A.SPONSOR_SUB_CATEGORY as SPONSOR_CATEGORY FROM LIST_RELATIONSHIP A

table.name: V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD
table.viewSql: SELECT a."OCCUPANT_ID", a."SPONSOR_ID", a."UAC_ID", a."FIRST_NAME" AS hhfirst_name, a."LAST_NAME" AS hhlast_name, b."FIRST_NAME" AS sfirst_name, b."LAST_NAME" AS slast_name, c."FIRST_NAME" AS ufirst_name, c."LAST_NAME" AS ulast_name, c."UAC_STATUS", e."UAC_PROGRAM_ID", g."SPONSOR_CATEGORY", CASE WHEN nvl(f.sponsor_address, '') = '' THEN b.address || ' ' || b.address_secondary ELSE f.sponsor_address || ' ' || f.sponsor_address_secondary END AS address, CASE WHEN nvl(f.sponsor_address, '') = '' THEN b.city ELSE f.sponsor_city END AS city, CASE WHEN nvl(f.sponsor_address, '') = '' THEN b.state ELSE f.sponsor_state END AS state, g."RELATIONSHIP" AS uacrelationship, h."RELATIONSHIP" AS hhrelationship, CASE WHEN to_date(b.date_created, 'DD-MON-RR') <= ( SELECT to_date(param_value, 'DD-MON-RR') FROM uacportal_app_params WHERE param_name = 'OLD_SPONSOR_FORM_DATE' ) OR b.date_created IS NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS show_old_sponsor_form FROM sponsor_household_occupants a INNER JOIN sponsor_info b ON a.sponsor_id = b.sponsor_id and b.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN uac_info c ON c.uac_id = a.uac_id LEFT JOIN uac_program_info e ON c.uac_id = e.uac_id LEFT JOIN uac_sponsor_list f ON a.uac_id = f.uac_id and f.is_Deleted = 0 AND a.sponsor_id = f.sponsor_id LEFT JOIN list_relationship g ON b.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = g.relationship_id LEFT JOIN list_relationship h ON a.relationship_to_sponsor = h.relationship_id WHERE a.isdeleted = 0

table.name: V_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO
table.viewSql: SELECT a.uac_id, a.current_sponsor, b."SPONSOR_ID", b."FIRST_NAME", b."LAST_NAME", b."SSN", b."ALIEN_NO", a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS" AS address, a."SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY" address_secondary, a.sponsor_city "CITY", a.sponsor_state "STATE", a.sponsor_zipcode "ZIP_CODE", b."DOB", trunc(months_between(sysdate, b.dob) / 12) AS age, b."COB", b."COR", b."MARRIAGE_STATUS", a.query_id, a.sponsor_home_phone "HOME_PHONE", a.backup_phone_type, a.sponsor_work_phone "WORK_PHONE", a.sponsor_fax "FAX", a.sponsor_email "EMAIL", b."GENDER", b."LEGAL_STATUS_ID", a."SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC", b."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_DISEASE", b."HOUSEHOLD_HAS_CRIMINAL_HIST", nvl(a.comments, b.notes) AS "NOTES", b."SPONSORTHIP_STATUS", b."P_COUNTER", b."A_COUNTER", b."DATE_CREATED", b."USER_CREATED", b."UPTIME", b."UPUSER", d.legal_status, e.relationship, b.flag, b.flag_note, b.flag_address, b.flag_address_note, e.sponsor_category || e.sponsor_sub_category AS sponsor_category FROM uac_sponsor_list a INNER JOIN sponsor_info b ON a.sponsor_id = b.sponsor_id LEFT JOIN list_legal_status d ON b.legal_status_id = d.legal_status_id LEFT JOIN list_relationship e ON a.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = e.relationship_id WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 AND b.is_deleted = 0

table.name: V_UAC_SPONSOR_RPT
table.viewSql: SELECT a.uac_id, a.alien_no, a.first_name, a.last_name, to_char(a.dob, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS dob, a.cob, a.date_of_entry, a.manner_of_entry, a.city_of_entry, a.specify_city_of_entry, a.state_of_entry, to_char(a.date_of_apprehension, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_of_apprehension, a.referring_office, a.notification_city, a.specify_not_city, a.notification_state, to_char(a.date_orr_notified, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_notified, a.time_orr_notified, to_char(a.date_orr_approved, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_orr_approved, a.time_orr_approved, a.pregnancy, a.injury, a.illness, a.behavior_wo_medication, a.behavior_w_medication, a.note_bi_wo_medication, a.note_for_w_medication, a.immigration_status, a.referring_agency, a.orr_comments, a.uac_status, a.gender, a.uac_fast_status, b.uac_program_id, c.uac_relationship_to_sponsor, f.program_id, to_char(b.date_referred, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_referred, b.bio_verified, to_char(b.date_admitted, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_admitted, b.current_status, to_char(h.date_of_discharge, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS date_discharged, d.first_name AS sponsor_first_name, d.last_name AS sponsor_last_name, d.gender AS sponsor_gender, c.sponsor_address, c.sponsor_city, c.sponsor_state, c.sponsor_zipcode, d.home_phone AS sponsor_phone, e.relationship AS sponsor_relationship_to_uac, f.program_name, g.program_type, i.discharge_type FROM uac_info a LEFT JOIN uac_program_info b ON a.uac_id = b.uac_id LEFT JOIN uac_sponsor_list c ON a.uac_id = c.uac_id and c.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN sponsor_info d ON c.sponsor_id = d.sponsor_id AND d.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN list_relationship e ON c.sponsor_relationship_to_uac = e.relationship_id LEFT JOIN list_programs f ON b.program_id = f.program_id LEFT JOIN list_program_type g ON f.program_type_id = g.program_type_id LEFT JOIN uac_program_exit h ON b.uac_program_id = h.uac_program_id LEFT JOIN list_discharge_type i ON h.type_of_discharge = i.discharge_type_id

table.name: V_USERLIST_NOTPROGRAMUSERS
table.viewSql: Select "USER_ID","FIRST_NAME", "LAST_NAME", "ADDRESS", "CITY", "STATE", "ZIP_CODE", "PHONE", "WORK_PHONE","WORK_FAX", "EMAIL", "SUSPENDED", "ROLE_TYPE","USER_PRIVELEGE" FROM ADM_LIST_WEB_USER A Where A.email not like '%@ap-in.com' and Upper(A.First_Name) not like '%FAKE%' And USER_ID Not in (Select USER_ID from ADM_USER_PROGRAM)

table.name: V_USERLIST_WPROGRAMS
table.viewSql: Select A."USER_ID",A."FIRST_NAME",A."LAST_NAME",A."ADDRESS",A."CITY",A."STATE",A."ZIP_CODE",A."PHONE",A."WORK_PHONE", A."WORK_FAX",A."EMAIL",A."SUSPENDED",A."ROLE_TYPE",A."USER_PRIVELEGE", LISTAGG(C.PROGRAM_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER By C.PROGRAM_NAME) as Programs from ADM_LIST_WEB_USER A INNER JOIN ADM_USER_PROGRAM B On A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Where A.email not like '%@ap-in.com' and Upper(A.First_Name) not like '%FAKE%' and Upper(A.Last_Name) not like '%FAKE%' Group By A."USER_ID",A."PASSWORD",A."FIRST_NAME",A."LAST_NAME",A."ADDRESS",A."CITY",A."STATE",A."ZIP_CODE",A."PHONE",A."WORK_PHONE", A."WORK_FAX",A."EMAIL",A."SUSPENDED",A."ROLE_TYPE",A."USER_PRIVELEGE"

table.name: V_VA_TRANSFER
table.viewSql: SELECT DISTINCT LP.PROGRAM_NAME, UI.FIRST_NAME, UI.LAST_NAME, UI.ALIEN_NO, UI.DOB, UI.GENDER, UI.COB, UPI.DATE_ADMITTED, UPI.DATE_DISCHARGED, 'No', 'Transfer' FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_INFO UI ON UPI.UAC_ID = UI.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON UPI.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID WHERE UPPER(UI.FIRST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND UPPER(UI.LAST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%'

table.name: VSPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS
table.viewSql: SELECT a."OCCUPANT_ID", a."SPONSOR_ID", a.uac_id, a."FIRST_NAME", a."LAST_NAME", a.gender, a."AGE", a.uptime, a.dob, CASE WHEN a.dependent_of_sponsor = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN a.dependent_of_sponsor = 0 THEN 'No' WHEN a.dependent_of_sponsor = 2 THEN 'Partial' END AS dependency, ( SELECT relationship FROM list_relationship WHERE relationship_id = a.relationship_to_sponsor ) AS relationshiptosponsor, ( SELECT relationship FROM list_relationship WHERE relationship_id = a.relationship_to_minor ) AS relationshiptouac FROM sponsor_household_occupants a inner join sponsor_info b on a.sponsor_id = b.sponsor_id and b.is_deleted = 0 WHERE a.isdeleted = 0

routine.name: UACPORTAL.DATEDIFF
UACPORTAL.DECODETEXT
UACPORTAL.DUMP_TABLE_TO_CSV
UACPORTAL.DUMP_TABLE_TO_CSV_DUMMY
UACPORTAL.DUMP_TABLE_TO_CSV_NEW
UACPORTAL.FN_UAC_STATUS_CHECK
UACPORTAL.FORMATTEDDATE
UACPORTAL.HTML_CHARACTER_TO_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS
UACPORTAL.HTML_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS_TO_CHARACTER
UACPORTAL.ISDATE
UACPORTAL.ISNUMERIC
UACPORTAL.IS_SPECIAL_CHARACTER
UACPORTAL.JOIN
UACPORTAL.PARALLEL_DUMP_TABLE_TO_CSV
UACPORTAL.PRS_TRANSFER_REQUEST
routine.definition:
TRIGGER "UACPORTAL"."PRS_TRANSFER_REQUEST" BEFORE INSERT ON prs_transfer_request FOR EACH ROW WHEN ( new.prs_transfer_request_id IS NULL ) BEGIN SELECT seq_prs_transfer_request.NEXTVAL INTO :new.prs_transfer_request_id FROM dual;
END;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SPLIT
UACPORTAL.SPLIT_TBL
routine.definition: TYPE "SPLIT_TBL" AS TABLE OF VARCHAR2(32000);

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_ADMISSION_LANDING
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_ADMISSION_LANDING" ( Program_ID IN NUMBER, First_Name IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS progId_ NUMBER(3) := Program_ID; fName_ VARCHAR2(30) := Upper(First_Name); BEGIN If fName_ = 'ALL' Then Open cur_Out For Select A.UAC_ID,B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, C.PROGRAM_ID, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(A.UPTIME) LOS From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Where B.Program_ID = progId_ And CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE' Order by trunc(sysdate) - trunc(A.UPTIME); Else Open cur_Out For Select A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, C.PROGRAM_ID, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(A.UPTIME) LOS From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Where B.Program_ID = progId_ And CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE' And Upper(FIRST_NAME) = fName_ Order by trunc(sysdate) - trunc(A.UPTIME); End If; END SP_ADMISSION_LANDING;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_ARCHIVE_PILOT_ORPHAN_SPONSORS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_ARCHIVE_PILOT_ORPHAN_SPONSORS" AS BEGIN-- Insert the Orphan sponsor in the audit table INSERT into SPONSOR_INFO_ARCHIVE ( SPONSOR_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, SSN, ALIEN_NO, ADDRESS, CITY, "STATE", ZIP_CODE, DOB, COB, COR, MARRIAGE_STATUS, HOME_PHONE, WORK_PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, GENDER, LEGAL_STATUS_ID, SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, UAC_RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR, HOUSEHOLD_HAS_DISEASE, HOUSEHOLD_HAS_CRIMINAL_HIST, NOTES, SPONSORTHIP_STATUS, P_COUNTER, A_COUNTER, DATE_CREATED, USER_CREATED, UPTIME, UPUSER, FLAG, FLAG_NOTE, FLAG_ADDRESS, FLAG_ADDRESS_NOTE, SPONSOR_TOKEN, SMARTY_STREET_VALIDATION, DATE_DUP_DELETED )SELECT si.SPONSOR_ID, si.FIRST_NAME, si.LAST_NAME, si.SSN, si.ALIEN_NO, si.ADDRESS, si.CITY, si."STATE", si.ZIP_CODE, si.DOB, si.COB, si.COR, si.MARRIAGE_STATUS, si.HOME_PHONE, si.WORK_PHONE, si.FAX, si.EMAIL, si.GENDER, si.LEGAL_STATUS_ID, si.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC, si.UAC_RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR, si.HOUSEHOLD_HAS_DISEASE, si.HOUSEHOLD_HAS_CRIMINAL_HIST, si.NOTES, si.SPONSORTHIP_STATUS, si.P_COUNTER, si.A_COUNTER, si.DATE_CREATED, si.USER_CREATED, si.UPTIME, si.UPUSER, si.FLAG, si.FLAG_NOTE, si.FLAG_ADDRESS, si.FLAG_ADDRESS_NOTE, si.SPONSOR_TOKEN, si.SMARTY_STREET_VALIDATION, SYSDATE From SPONSOR_INFO si left join sponsor_affidavits_support sas on si.sponsor_id = sas.Sponsor_id left join sponsor_background_check sbc on si.sponsor_id = sbc.Sponsor_id left join sponsor_criminal_history sch on si.sponsor_id = sch.Sponsor_id left join sponsor_household_occupants sho on si.sponsor_id = sho.Sponsor_id left join sponsor_info_history sih on si.sponsor_id = sih.Sponsor_id left join uac_ar_notification uan on si.sponsor_id = uan.Sponsor_id left join uac_discharge_notification udn on si.sponsor_id = udn.Sponsor_id left join uac_release_request urr on si.sponsor_id = urr.Sponsor_id left join uac_sponsor_list usl on si.sponsor_id = usl.Sponsor_id left join uac_sponsor_sponsored_uacs ussu on si.sponsor_id = ussu.Sponsor_id where sas.sponsor_id is null and sbc.Sponsor_id is null and sch.Sponsor_id is null and sho.Sponsor_id is null and sih.Sponsor_id is null and uan.Sponsor_id is null and udn.Sponsor_id is null and urr.Sponsor_id is null and usl.Sponsor_id is null and ussu.Sponsor_id is null and (si.flag_address != 1 or si.flag_address is null) and (si.flag != 1 or si.flag is null) and TO_DATE(si.date_created, 'DD-MON-RR') >= TO_DATE('01-JAN-18', 'DD_MON-RR') and rownum < 351 and si.sponsor_id Not IN (select sponsor_id from SPONSOR_INFO_ARCHIVE ); -- Delete the orphan sponsor from SPONSOR_INFO DELETE from SPONSOR_INFO where sponsor_id in (select sponsor_id from SPONSOR_INFO_ARCHIVE); COMMIT;END SP_ARCHIVE_PILOT_ORPHAN_SPONSORS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_ASSIGN_RELATIONSHIP_GROUP
UACPORTAL.SP_AUTOCANCEL_ENROUTE
UACPORTAL.SP_BACKUP_FACILITY_INFO
UACPORTAL.SP_CANCEL_HSPRS_OVER_18
UACPORTAL.SP_CENSUSMGT_LANDING_INFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_CENSUSMGT_LANDING_INFO" ( Program_ID IN NUMBER, First_Name IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS progId_ NUMBER(3) := Program_ID; fName_ VARCHAR2(30) := Upper(First_Name); BEGIN If fName_ = 'ALL' Then Open cur_Out For Select B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, A.UAC_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, C.PROGRAM_ID, Case When CURRENT_STATUS = 'ADMITTED' Or CURRENT_STATUS = 'IN-TRANSFER' Then DateDiff('day', DATE_ADMITTED, SysDate) When CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE' Then 0 When CURRENT_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' Then DateDiff('day', DATE_ADMITTED, DATE_DISCHARGED) End as LOS , UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, D.Date_CaseSummary From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join ( Select * from ( Select UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, REVIEWED_DATE Date_CaseSummary, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_CASE_REVIEW A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where C.PROGRAM_ID = progId_ Order by A.Uptime Desc) Where Rownum <=1 ) D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where B.Program_ID = progId_ And B.CURRENT_STATUS IN ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER') Order by B.DATE_ADMITTED Desc; Else Open cur_Out For Select B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, A.UAC_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, C.PROGRAM_ID, DateDiff('day', B.DATE_ADMITTED, sysdate) LOS, UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, D.Date_CaseSummary From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join ( Select * from ( Select UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, REVIEWED_DATE Date_CaseSummary, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_CASE_REVIEW A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where C.PROGRAM_ID = progId_ Order by A.Uptime Desc) Where Rownum <=1 ) D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where B.Program_ID = progId_ And Upper(FIRST_NAME) = fName_ And B.CURRENT_STATUS IN ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER') Order by B.DATE_ADMITTED Desc; End If; END SP_CENSUSMGT_LANDING_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_CHECK_DOCVIEW_PERMISSION
UACPORTAL.SP_CHECK_PRS_FOR_PROGRAM_EXIT
UACPORTAL.SP_CHECK_QUERYID
UACPORTAL.SP_CHECK_RECORD_LOCK
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_CHECK_RECORD_LOCK" ( v_uacprogId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For SELECT DATETIME_CREATED as LOCKED_DATETIME, CASE WHEN datediff('Hour', DATETIME_CREATED, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) >= (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE UPPER(PARAM_NAME) = UPPER('UnlockHours')) THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS LOCK_RECORD FROM UAC_UNLOCKED_HIST WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = v_uacprogId AND NOT DATETIME_CREATED Is Null ORDER BY UNLOCKED_HIST_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY; END SP_CHECK_RECORD_LOCK;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_CHILDLEGAL_CENSUSMGT_INFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_CHILDLEGAL_CENSUSMGT_INFO" ( Program_ID IN NUMBER, First_Name IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS progId_ NUMBER(3) := Program_ID; fName_ VARCHAR2(30) := Upper(First_Name); BEGIN If fName_ = 'ALL' Then Open cur_Out For Select B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, A.UAC_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, C.PROGRAM_ID, Case When CURRENT_STATUS = 'ADMITTED' Or CURRENT_STATUS = 'IN-TRANSFER' Then TRunc(SysDate) - Trunc(DATE_ADMITTED) --When CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE' Then 0 When CURRENT_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' Then Trunc(DATE_DISCHARGED) - Trunc(DATE_ADMITTED) End as LOS , UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, D.Date_CaseSummary From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join ( Select * from ( Select UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, REVIEWED_DATE Date_CaseSummary, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_CASE_REVIEW A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where C.PROGRAM_ID = progId_ Order by A.Uptime Desc) Where Rownum <=1 ) D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where B.Program_ID = progId_ And CURRENT_STATUS IN ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER') Order by B.DATE_ADMITTED Desc; Else Open cur_Out For Select B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, A.UAC_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, C.PROGRAM_ID, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, D.Date_CaseSummary From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join ( Select * from ( Select UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, REVIEWED_DATE Date_CaseSummary, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_CASE_REVIEW A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where C.PROGRAM_ID = progId_ Order by A.Uptime Desc) Where Rownum <=1 ) D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where B.Program_ID = progId_ And Upper(FIRST_NAME) = fName_ And CURRENT_STATUS IN ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER') Order by B.DATE_ADMITTED Desc; End If; END SP_CHILDLEGAL_CENSUSMGT_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_COPY_SIR_TO_ADDENDUM

UACPORTAL.SP_DISCHARGE_LANDING_INFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_DISCHARGE_LANDING_INFO" ( Program_ID IN NUMBER, First_Name IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS progId_ NUMBER(3) := Program_ID; fName_ VARCHAR2(30) := Case When Upper(First_Name) = 'ALL' Then '%%' Else Upper(First_Name) End; BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.UAC_ID,B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, C.PROGRAM_ID, DateDiff('day',B.DATE_ADMITTED, sysdate) LOS, Z.UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, Z.REVIEWED_DATE as Date_CaseSummary From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B OUTER APPLY ( Select X.UAC_CASE_REVIEW_ID, X.REVIEWED_DATE From UAC_CASE_REVIEW X WHERE X.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID ORDER BY X.Uptime DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) Z Inner Join UAC_INFO A On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Where B.Program_ID = progId_ And Upper(FIRST_NAME) like fName_ And B.CURRENT_STATUS IN ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER') Order by B.DATE_ADMITTED Desc; END SP_DISCHARGE_LANDING_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_DISCHARGE_UAC

UACPORTAL.SP_GETACGIDENTITYPROOFDOCUMENTS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetACGIdentityProofDocuments ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.alternate_sponsor_name, l.document_type, TO_CHAR(s.expiration_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as expiration_date, s.verified, s.picture_id from SPONSOR_PROOF_OF_IDENTITY s left join list_proof_of_identity l on l.list_proof_of_identity_id = s.list_proof_of_identity_id where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.PROOF_TYPE = 'AlternateCareGiver' and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetACGIdentityProofDocuments;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETALLFLAGDETAILS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetAllFlagDetails ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, o_Result OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN o_Result FOR SELECT sf.SponsorFlagId, sf.SponsorId, sf.FlaggedEntityId, sf.FlaggedEntity, sf.FlagDescription, sf.UserCreated, TO_CHAR(sf.DateCreated, 'MM-DD-YYYY') AS DateCreated,
-- Flag Type Name from Lookup Table lft.FlagType AS FlagTypeName,
-- Check if it's an HHM or ACG (nullable LEFT JOINs) CASE WHEN sf.FlagTypeId = 2 AND ho.ISDELETED = 1 THEN 1 WHEN sf.FlagTypeId = 3 AND ac.ISDELETED = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsDeletedFlag,
-- Categories aggregated ( SELECT LISTAGG(lfc.FlagCategory, '|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY lfc.FlagCategory) FROM SponsorFlagCategory sfcat JOIN LIST_FLAGCATEGORY lfc ON sfcat.FlagCategoryId = lfc.FlagCategoryId WHERE sfcat.SponsorFlagId = sf.SponsorFlagId ) AS FlagCategories,
-- Comments aggregated as XML for large text ( SELECT XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("comment", XMLELEMENT("text", sfc.FlagComment), XMLELEMENT("createdby", sfc.CreatedBy), XMLELEMENT("createdbyemail", sfc.CreatedByEmail), XMLELEMENT("datecreated", TO_CHAR(sfc.DateCreated, 'MM-DD-YYYY')), XMLELEMENT("commentid", sfc.SponsorFlagCommentId) ) ).getClobVal() FROM SponsorFlagComment sfc WHERE sfc.SponsorFlagId = sf.SponsorFlagId ) AS FlagCommentsXML
FROM SponsorFlag sf LEFT JOIN LIST_FLAGTYPE lft ON sf.FlagTypeId = lft.FlagTypeId LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS ho ON sf.FlagTypeId = 2 AND sf.FlaggedEntityId = TO_CHAR(ho.OCCUPANT_ID) LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER ac ON sf.FlagTypeId = 3 AND sf.FlaggedEntityId = TO_CHAR(ac.SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER_ID) WHERE sf.SponsorId = p_SponsorId; END;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETBACKGROUNDCHECKS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetBackgroundChecks ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.background_check_id, s.occupant_id, s.sponsor_alternate_caregiver_id, s.bg_public, s.bg_sex, s.bg_imm, s.bg_fbich, s.bg_fbinc, s.bg_can, s.bg_state, TO_CHAR(s.date_requested, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as date_requested, TO_CHAR(s.date_received, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as date_received, s.check_requested, s.result_id, l.description as result from sponsor_background_check s left join LIST_BG_CHECK_RESULT_TYPE l on l.result_id = s.result_id where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId order by 1; END sp_GetBackgroundChecks;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETDISCHARGE_INFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GETDISCHARGE_INFO" ( v_Param1 IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS progId NUMBER(3); BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.UAC_ID,UAC_PROGRAM_ID,ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, C.PROGRAM_ID, trunc(sysdate) - B.DATE_ADMITTED LOS From UAC_INFO A INNER Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Where ALIEN_NO like v_Param1 or FIRST_NAME like v_Param1 or LAST_NAME like v_Param1 or C.PROGRAM_NAME like v_Param1 Order by B.DATE_ADMITTED Desc; END SP_GETDISCHARGE_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETFLAGCATEGORIESBYSPONSOR
routine.definition: PROCEDURE sp_GetFlagCategoriesBySponsor ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, o_Result OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN o_Result FOR SELECT sfc.SponsorFlagId, lfc.FlagCategory AS Category FROM SponsorFlagCategory sfc JOIN SponsorFlag sf ON sfc.SponsorFlagId = sf.SponsorFlagId JOIN LIST_FLAGCATEGORY lfc ON sfc.FlagCategoryId = lfc.FlagCategoryId WHERE sf.SponsorId = p_SponsorId; END sp_GetFlagCategoriesBySponsor;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETFLAGCOMMENTSBYSPONSOR
routine.definition: PROCEDURE sp_GetFlagCommentsBySponsor ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, o_Result OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN o_Result FOR SELECT sfc.SponsorFlagCommentId, sfc.SponsorFlagId, sfc.FlagComment, sfc.UserCreated AS CreatedBy, TO_CHAR(sfc.DateCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DateCreated, sfc.CreatedByEmail FROM SponsorFlagComment sfc JOIN SponsorFlag sf ON sfc.SponsorFlagId = sf.SponsorFlagId WHERE sf.SponsorId = p_SponsorId ORDER BY sfc.SPONSORFLAGCOMMENTID DESC; END sp_GetFlagCommentsBySponsor;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETHOUSEHOLDMEMBERIDENTITYPROOF
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetHouseholdMemberIdentityProof ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.hh_member_name, l.document_type, TO_CHAR(s.Expiration_Date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as Expiration_Date, s.verified, s.picture_id from SPONSOR_PROOF_OF_IDENTITY s left join LIST_PROOF_OF_IDENTITY l on l.list_proof_of_identity_id = s.list_proof_of_identity_id where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.proof_type = 'Household'; END sp_GetHouseholdMemberIdentityProof;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETHOUSEHOLDMEMBERS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetHouseholdMembers ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.FIRST_NAME, s.LAST_NAME, TO_CHAR(s.DOB, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as DOB,
CASE s.gender WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END as Gender,
s.AGE, s.PHONE, l.relationship as Relationship_To_Sponsor, s.dependent_of_sponsor from sponsor_household_occupants s left join List_Relationship l on l.relationship_id = s.relationship_to_sponsor where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetHouseholdMembers;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETHOUSEHOLDMEMBERSPONSORSHIPS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetHouseholdMemberSponsorships ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.LAST_NAME, s.ALIEN_NO, TO_CHAR(s.DOB, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as DOB,
CASE s.gender WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END as Gender,
l.relationship as Relationship_To_Child,
CASE s.current_location WHEN '1' THEN 'Living with Sponsor' WHEN '2' THEN 'Not Living with Sponsor' WHEN '3' THEN 'Returned to Home Country' ELSE '' END as current_location,
CASE s.orr_release_decision WHEN '1' THEN 'Approve Straight Release' WHEN '2' THEN 'Approve with Post-Release Only Services' WHEN '3' THEN 'Deny Release' WHEN '4' THEN 'Approve with Post-Release Services' ELSE '' END as orr_release_decision,
TO_CHAR(s.date_of_discharge, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as date_of_discharge, s.discharge_program_name from SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_SPONSORSHIPS s left join List_Relationship l on l.relationship_id = s.sponsor_relationship_to_child where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetHouseholdMemberSponsorships;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETPOTENTIALADULTACG
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetPotentialAdultACG ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.name, s.a_number, s.age, TO_CHAR(s.DOB, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as DOB,
CASE s.gender WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END as Gender,
s.home_address, s.phone_number, l.relationship as relationship_To_sponsor from SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER s left join List_Relationship l on l.relationship_id = s.relationship_to_sponsor where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetPotentialAdultACG;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETREPORT_INFO
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GETREPORT_INFO" ( infoType IN VARCHAR2, UAC_PROGRAM_ID IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10):= UAC_PROGRAM_ID; infoType_ VARCHAR2(20) := upper(infoType); BEGIN If infoType_ = 'DISCHARGE' Then Open cur_Out For Select * from (
-- Select Case when Max(nvl(E.PROGRAM_EXIT_ID,0)) > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'Release_Verification' as RptType, 'Verification of Release' as ReportName, 1 as RptOrder -- From UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT E -- INNER JOIN (SELECT UAC_PROGRAM_ID FROM UAC_DISCHARGE_NOTIFICATION WHERE TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE IN (1,3) AND UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_) D ON E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID -- Where E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ Select Case when Max(nvl(PROGRAM_EXIT_ID,0)) > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'Release_Verification' as RptType, 'Verification of Release' as ReportName, 1 as RptOrder From UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ AND TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE IN (1,3) --Select Case when Max(nvl(RELEASE_ID,0)) > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'Release_Verification' as RptType, 'Verification of Release' as ReportName, 1 as RptOrder --From UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ And (ORR_DECISION in (1,2) OR ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = 1) Union --Select Case When Max(nvl(SIR_ID,0))> 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'Runaway' as RptType, 'Notice to DHS of Runaway' as ReportName, 2 as RptOrder from UAC_SIR Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ AND RUNAWAY = 1 --Union Select Case when Max(nvl(RELEASE_ID,0)) > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'ORR_NOTICE_TO_ICE_CCRUACSRCA' as RptType, 'ORR Notification to ICE Chief Counsel Release of Unaccompanied Alien Child to Sponsor and Request to Change Address' as ReportName, 3 as RptOrder from UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ Union Select Case When Max(nvl(TRANSFER_REQUEST_ID,0)) > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'ORR_DCS_Transfer_Request' as RptType, 'ORR/DCS Transfer Request and Tracking Form - New' as RptName, 4 as RptOrder From UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ Union Select Case When Max(nvl(TRANSFER_REQUEST_ID,0)) > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'ORR_Notice_of_Transfer_to_ICE' as RptType, 'ORR Notice of Transfer to ICE Chief Counsel Nov 2012' as RptName, 4 as RptOrder From UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ ) Where Hasreport = 1 Order by RptOrder; Else Open cur_Out For Select * from ( Select Case When Max(nvl(Transfer_Request_id,0))> 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'Transfer' as RptType, 'Notice of Placement in Secure ; Staff Secure - TRANSFER' as ReportName, 1 as RptOrder from UAC_Transfer_Request Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ Union Select 1 as Hasreport, 'Medical' as RptType, 'Authorization for Medical, Dental, and Mental Health Care' as ReportName, 2 as RptOrder from dual Union Select Case when Max(nvl(UAC_PROGRAM_ID,0)) > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End as Hasreport, 'Placement' as RptType, 'Notice of Placement in Secure or Staff Secure Facility CURRENT' as ReportName, 3 as RptOrder from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS B ON A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID Where A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ And B.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID in (4,6,8) Union Select 1 as Hasreport, 'Placement_Authorization' as RptType, 'Placement Authorization' as ReportName, 4 as RptOrder from dual ) Where Hasreport = 1 order by RptOrder; End If; END SP_GETREPORT_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSAVEDSPONSORFLAGS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE sp_GetSavedSponsorFlags ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT S.SPONSORFLAGID, S.SPONSORID, S.FLAGTYPEID, NVL(S.FLAGGEDENTITYID, '0') AS FLAGGEDENTITYID, S.FLAGGEDENTITY, S.USERCREATED, S.DATECREATED, LFT.FLAGTYPE, (LFT.FLAGTYPE || ' Flag: ' || S.FLAGGEDENTITY) AS FLAGTYPEANDENTITY, (U.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || U.LAST_NAME) AS CREATEDBY, U.EMAIL AS CREATEDBYEMAIL, S.FLAGDESCRIPTION FROM SPONSORFLAG S LEFT JOIN LIST_FLAGTYPE LFT ON LFT.FLAGTYPEID = S.FLAGTYPEID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER U ON U.USER_ID = S.USERCREATED WHERE S.SPONSORID = p_SponsorId AND S.ISACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY S.SPONSORFLAGID DESC; END sp_GetSavedSponsorFlags;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSELFREPORTEDSPONSORSHIPS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetSelfReportedSponsorships ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.self_reported_id, s.name, s.a_number, s.dob, TRUNC(months_between(sysdate, s.dob) / 12) AS age,
CASE s.gender WHEN 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN 'F' THEN 'Female' ELSE '' END as Gender,
CASE s.current_location WHEN '1' THEN 'Living with Sponsor' WHEN '2' THEN 'Not Living with Sponsor' WHEN '3' THEN 'Returned to Home Country' ELSE '' END as current_location,
CASE s.orr_release_decision WHEN '1' THEN 'Approve Straight Release' WHEN '2' THEN 'Approve with Post-Release Only Services' WHEN '3' THEN 'Deny Release' WHEN '4' THEN 'Approve with Post-Release Services' ELSE '' END as orr_release_decision,
TO_CHAR(s.date_of_discharge, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as date_of_discharge, s.discharge_program_name, l.relationship from SPONSOR_SELF_RPT_SPONSORSHIPS s left join List_Relationship l on l.relationship_id = s.relationship_to_uc where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetSelfReportedSponsorships;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORADDRESSES
UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORADDRESSPROOFDOCUMENTS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorAddressProofDocuments ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select l.document_type, TO_CHAR(s.date_issued, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as date_issued, s.dated_within_2_months from SPONSOR_PROOF_OF_ADDRESS s left join list_proof_of_address l on l.list_proof_of_address_id = s.list_proof_of_address_id where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetSponsorAddressProofDocuments;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORASSESSMENTDETAILS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorAssessmentDetails ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, p_UacProgId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select -- Tab 1 Demographic Information s.sponsor_id, s.formtype, s.ASSESSMENT_STARTED, s.upuser, s.uptime, si.alien_no, si.first_name, si.last_name, si.dob, si.cob, si.gender, h.update_date, h.full_name, s.SPONSOR_HOME_PHONE, s.SPONSOR_WORK_PHONE, s.SPONSOR_EMAIL, s.LEGAL_STATUS_VERIFIED, si.home_phone, si.work_phone, lp.phone_type_id, lp.phone_type, si.email, si.legal_status_id, lls.legal_status, si.immigration_status, s.sponsor_identity_verified, s.ADDITIONAL_IDENTITY, si.PRIMARY_LANGUAGE, si.OTHER_LANGUAGES, si.RELIGIOUS_AFFILIATION, s.ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION, -- Tab 2 Contact Information ci.update_date as tab2_update_date, ci.full_name as tab2_full_name, s.sponsor_address, s.sponsor_address_secondary, s.SPONSOR_CITY, s.SPONSOR_STATE, s.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, si.cor, s.how_long_at_current_address, s.ADDRESS_VERIFIED_GOOGLE_MAPS, s.ADDRESS_VERIFIED_GOOGLE_EARTH, s.VERIFIED_SMARTY_STREETS, s.ADDITIONAL_ADDRESS_INFORMATION, -- Tab 3 Relationship to Child hRC.update_date as tab3_update_date, hRC.full_name as tab3_full_name, (u.first_name || ' ' || u.last_name) as child_name, lr.relationship as sponsor_child_relationship, s.sponsor_category, s.CURRENT_SPONSOR, s.SPONSOR_KNOW_CHILD, s.RELATIONSHIP_VERIFIED, s.HAS_DNA_BEEN_USED, s.WHY_CHILD_LEAVE_COUNTRY, s.CHILD_JOURNEY, s.OWE_MONEY, s.add_rel_to_child, -- Tab 4 Background Checks hBC.update_date as tab4_update_date, hBC.full_name as tab4_full_name, sch.sponsor_disclose_criminal_history, sch.EXPLAIN_CRIMINAL_HISTORY, sch.felony, sch.MISDEMEANOR, sch.PROBATION_PAROLE, sch.CHILD_ABUSE_NEGLECT, sch.SUBSTANCE_ABUSE, sch.DOMESTIC_VIOLENCE, sch.CRIMINAL_ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION, sch.BACKGROUND_ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION, -- Tab 5 Sponsorships hs.update_date as tab5_update_date, hs.full_name as tab5_full_name, s.SPONSOR_ATTEMPT_SPONSOR_ORR, s.CHILD_STILL_RESIDING_WITH_SPONSOR, s.WHY_CHILD_NOT_RESIDING_WITH_SPONSOR, s.SPONSOR_UNDERGO_HOME_STUDY, s.CHILD_POSTRELEASE_SERVICE, s.CHILD_ENROLLED_ATTENDING_SCHOOL, s.SPONSOR_ATTEND_LOPC, s.SPONSOR_WITHDRAW_APP, s.WHY_WITHDRAW, s.WHY_DENIED, s.SPONSOR_DENIED_SPOSORSHIP, s.CHILD_COURT_DATE, S.ADD_INFO_SPONSORSHIPS, -- Tab 6 Family Relationships hfr.update_date as tab6_update_date, hfr.full_name as tab6_full_name, fr.SPONSOR_PARTNER, fr.LEAGLLY_MARRIED_COHABITATION, fr.SPONSOR_HAVE_CHILDREN, si.MARRIAGE_STATUS, fr.CHILDREN_BEEN_IN_ORR_CARE, fr.WHO_CARING_FOR_CHILDREN, fr.COURT_ORDERED_FINANCIAL_SUPPORT, fr.SPONSOR_PARTNER_INTERACTED_CPS, fr.SPONSOR_PARTNER_CPS_INTERACTION, fr.CHILD_REMOVED_FROM_CUSTODY, fr.CHILD_REMOVED_EXPLAIN, fr.INVOLVED_IN_CHILD_SUPPORT, fr.INVOLVED_IN_CHILD_SUPPORT_EXPLAIN, fr.FAMILY_FRIENDS_IN_USA, fr.HAVE_FAMILY_HOME_COUNTRY, fr.RELATIONSHIP_WITH_FAMILY_HOME_COUNTRY, fr.FAMILY_RELATIONSHIPS_ADDITION_INFO, fr.HOW_SPONSOR_DISCIPLINE, fr.ANY_RELATIVES_IN_ORR_CARE, fr.WHERE_IN_ORR_CARE, -- Tab 7 Household hm.update_date as tab7_update_date, hm.full_name as tab7_full_name, SH.DESCRIBE_HOME, SH.WHERE_SLEEP, SH.CONTRIBUTE_TO_HOUSEHOLD, SH.HOUSING_CONDITIONS, SH.ADEQUATE_HOUSING, SH.ANYONE_ELSE_LIVE, SH.CONTAGIOUS_DISEASE, SH.CONTAGIOUS_DISEASE_YES, SH.CRIMINAL_CONVICTIONS, SH.CRIMINAL_CONVICTIONS_YES, SH.CHILD_REMOVED, SH.CHILD_REMOVED_YES, SH.ATTEMPT_TO_SPONSOR, SH.RESIDE_WITH_HOUSEHOLD, SH.RESIDE_WITH_HOUSEHOLD_NO, SH.UNDERGO_HS, SH.RECEIVED_PRS, SH.ENROLLED_SCHOOL, SH.ATTEND_LOPC, TO_CHAR(SH.COURT_DATE, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as COURT_DATE, SH.WITHDRAWN_APPLICATION, SH.WITHDRAWN_APPLICATION_YES, SH.DENY_SPONSORSHIP, SH.DENY_SPONSORSHIP_YES, SH.HOUSEHOLD_IDENTITIES_VERIFIED, SH.ADDITIONAL_INFO_HOUSEHOLD, -- Tab 8 Employment e.update_date as tab8_update_date, e.full_name as tab8_full_name, s.HAVE_JOB, s.WORK_SCHEDULE, s.MEET_MONTHLY_EXPENSES, s.ADDITIONAL_FINANCIAL, -- Tab 9 Care Plan cp.update_date as tab9_update_date, cp.full_name as tab9_full_name, SCP.SCHOOL_TO_ATTEND, SCP.UNDERSTAND_ENROLLMENT_PROCESS, SCP.SPONSOR_AWARE_MEDICAL_CONDITIONS, SCP.PLANS_TO_ADDRESS_MEDICAL_NEEDS, SCP.PLANS_TO_ADDRESS_MENTAL_HEALTH_NEEDS, SCP.SPONSOR_AWARE_CRIMINAL_BEHAVIOR, SCP.CHILD_DISCIPLINE_PLAN, SCP.CONCERNS_DISCIPLINE_PRACTICE, SCP.READ_SPONSOR_HANDBOOK, SCP.PLAN_TO_KEEP_SAFE, SCP.SPONSOR_SPECIAL_NEEDS_MENTAL_HEALTH, SCP.SPONSOR_FAMILY_COMMUNITY_SUPPOT, SCP.DESCRIBE_CHILD_SUPERVISION, SCP.FAMILY_FRIENDS_HELP_CHILDCARE, SCP.CARE_PLAN_ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION, SCP.ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER_VERIFIED, SCP.WHO_TRANSPORT_CHILD_SCHOOL, -- Tab 10 Trafficking And Fraud tf.update_date as tab10_update_date, tf.full_name as tab10_full_name, FT.FIRST_DECIDE_TO_US, FT.ADDITIONAL_INFO_ON_COERCION, FT.ADDITIONAL_INFO_ON_DEBT, FT.ADDITIONAL_INFO_ON_JOURNEY, FT.PRESENT_ABUSE_RISK, FT.PRESENT_ABUSE_RISK_YES, FT.PRESENT_BEING_ABUSED, FT.PRESENT_BEING_ABUSED_YES, FT.HOW_MUCH_DEBT_INCREASE, FT.ARRANGE_WORK, FT.ARRANGE_WORK_YES, FT.KEEP_DESTROY_DOCUMENTS, FT.KEEP_DESTROY_DOCUMENTS_YES, FT.THREATEN_TO_REPORT, FT.THREATEN_TO_REPORT_YES, FT.ANYONE_PAY_FOR_TRAVEL, FT.THREATEN_SPONSOR_FAMILY, FT.THREATEN_SPONSOR_FAMILY_YES, FT.ANYTHING_BAD_IF_LEAVE, FT.ANYTHING_BAD_IF_LEAVE_YES, FT.ARRANGEMENTS_CHANGE, FT.ARRANGEMENTS_CHANGE_YES, FT.DEPEND_UPON_NON_FAMILY_MEMBERS, FT.EXPERIENCE_ANY_CHALLENGES, FT.PERFORM_WORK, FT.RECEIVE_PAY, FT.WORK_CONDITIONS_CHANGE, FT.PAY_BACK, FT.FAMILY_FRIEND_OWE_MONEY, FT.FAMILY_FRIEND_OWE_MONEY_YES, FT.DEBT_AMOUNT_INCREASE, FT.PAY_WITHOUT_REPORT_ORR, FT.PAY_WITHOUT_REPORT_ORR_YES, FT.PAY_ON_RELEASE, FT.PAY_ON_RELEASE_YES, FT.THREATEN_OVER_PAYMENT, FT.TRAVELED_BACK, FT.HOW_ARRIVE_WORK_SITE, FT.PERFORM_WORK_FREQUENCY, FT.THREATEN_OVER_PAYMENT_YES, FT.WORRY_FIND, FT.WORRY_FIND_YES, FT.HAS_DEBT, FT.PLAN_FOR_PAY_BACK, FT.REFERRED_TO_OTIP, FT.ANYONE_AROUND_PHYSICALLY_HARMED, FT.ANYONE_AROUND_PHYSICALLY_HARMED_YES, FT.HELD_AGAINST_WILL, FT.HELD_AGAINST_WILL_YES, FT.DO_WHAT_THEY_DISLIKE, FT.DO_WHAT_THEY_DISLIKE_YES, FT.PHYSICALLY_HARMED, FT.PHYSICALLY_HARMED_YES, FT.COMMUNICATION_RESTRICTED, FT.PAID_AS_PROMISED, FT.MOVEMENT_RESTRICTED, FT.EXPENSES_OUT_OF_PAY, FT.EXPENSES_OUT_OF_PAY_YES, FT.HAPPEN_IF_LEFT_JOB, FT.HAPPEN_IF_NOT_PAY_BACK, FT.DEBT_AMOUNT, FT.PERFORM_WORK_TYPE, FT.WHEN_DEBT_AMOUNT_INCREASE, FT.FIRST_LIVE_WHERE_WHOM, FT.WHERE_LIVE_WHILE_WORKING, FT.WHO_ARRANGE_WORK, FT.WHO_PLAN_JOURNEY, FT.WHY_DEBT_AMOUNT_INCREASE, FT.ADD_INFO_FRAUD_TRAFFICKING, -- Tab 12 Case Manager Assessment cma.update_date as tab12_update_date, cma.full_name as tab12_full_name, s.case_management_assessment, -- Tab 13 Certification cth.update_date as tab13_update_date, cth.full_name as tab13_full_name, s.date_initiated, s.date_complete, s.signature, s.title from uac_sponsor_list s inner join SPONSOR_INFO si on s.sponsor_id = si.sponsor_id left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY h on s.sponsor_id = h.sponsor_id and s.uac_id = h.uac_id and h.assessment_tab = 'DemographicInformation' left join LIST_PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE lp on lp.phone_type_id = s.BACKUP_PHONE_TYPE left join List_Legal_Status lls on lls.legal_status_id = si.legal_status_id left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY ci on ci.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and ci.uac_id = s.uac_id and ci.assessment_tab = 'ContactInformation' left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY hRC on hRC.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and hRC.uac_id = s.uac_id and hRC.assessment_tab = 'RelatioshipToChild' left join uac_info u on u.uac_id = s.uac_id left join List_Relationship lr on lr.relationship_id = s.sponsor_relationship_to_uac left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY hBC on hBC.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and hBC.uac_id = s.uac_id and hBC.assessment_tab = 'BackGroundChecks' left join SPONSOR_CRIMINAL_HISTORY sch on sch.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and sch.uac_id = s.uac_id left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY hs on hs.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and hs.uac_id = s.uac_id and hs.assessment_tab = 'SponsorShips' left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY hfr on hfr.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and hfr.uac_id = s.uac_id and hfr.assessment_tab = 'FamilyRelationShips' left join SPONSOR_FAMILY_RELATIONSHIPS fr on fr.SPONSOR_ID = s.sponsor_id and s.uac_id = fr.UAC_ID left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY hm on hm.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and hm.uac_id = s.uac_id and hm.assessment_tab = 'HouseHold' left join SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD sh on sh.SPONSOR_ID = s.SPONSOR_ID and sh.UAC_ID = s.uac_id left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY e on e.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and e.uac_id = s.uac_id and e.assessment_tab = 'Employment' left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY cp on cp.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and cp.uac_id = s.uac_id and cp.assessment_tab = 'CarePlan' left join SPONSOR_CARE_PLAN SCP on s.SPONSOR_ID = SCP.SPONSOR_ID and s.uac_id = SCP.UAC_ID left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY tf on tf.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and tf.uac_id = s.uac_id and tf.assessment_tab = 'TraffickingAndFraud' left join SPONSOR_FRAUD_TRAFFICKING FT ON s.SPONSOR_ID = FT.SPONSOR_ID and s.uac_id = FT.UAC_ID left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY cma on cma.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and cma.uac_id = s.uac_id and cma.assessment_tab = 'CaseManagerAssessment' left join SPONSOR_ASSESS_TAB_HISTORY cth on cth.sponsor_id = s.sponsor_id and cth.uac_id = s.uac_id and cth.assessment_tab = 'Certification' where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId; END sp_GetSponsorAssessmentDetails;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORFAMILYINUS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorFamilyInUS ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.name, s.age, l.relationship from SPONSOR_FAMILY_FRIENDS s left join List_Relationship l on l.relationship_id = s.relationship_to_sponsor where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetSponsorFamilyInUS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORFLAGCATEGORIES
routine.definition: PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorFlagCategories ( p_SponsorFlagId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT LISTAGG(LFC.flagcategory, '|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY LFC.sequence) AS Categories FROM list_flagcategory LFC JOIN sponsorflagcategory SFC ON LFC.flagcategoryid = SFC.flagcategoryid WHERE SFC.sponsorflagid = p_SponsorFlagId; END sp_GetSponsorFlagCategories;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORFLAGCOMMENTS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorFlagComments ( p_SponsorFlagId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT S.SponsorFlagCommentId, S.SponsorFlagId, S.FlagComment, S.UserCreated, S.DateCreated, S.CREATEDBY, S.CREATEDBYEMAIL FROM SPONSORFLAGCOMMENT S WHERE S.SPONSORFLAGID = p_SponsorFlagId ORDER BY S.SponsorFlagCommentId DESC; END sp_GetSponsorFlagComments;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORFLAGDETAILS
UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORFLAGS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorFlags ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, o_Result OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN o_Result FOR SELECT sf.SponsorFlagId, sf.FlaggedEntityId, sf.FlaggedEntity, (LFT.FLAGTYPE || ' Flag: ' || sf.FLAGGEDENTITY) AS FLAGTYPEANDENTITY, sf.FlagDescription, sf.UserCreated, TO_CHAR(sf.DateCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DateCreated, sf.FlagToken AS CreatedByEmail, sf.UserCreated AS LastUpdatedBy, TO_CHAR(sf.DateCreated, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LastUpdatedDate, CASE WHEN fc.IsDeleted = 1 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS IsDeleted FROM SponsorFlag sf
LEFT JOIN LIST_FLAGTYPE LFT ON LFT.FLAGTYPEID = sf.FLAGTYPEID
LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS fc ON REGEXP_LIKE(sf.FlaggedEntityId, '^\d+$') AND TO_NUMBER(sf.FlaggedEntityId) = fc.OCCUPANT_ID
LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER ac ON REGEXP_LIKE(sf.FlaggedEntityId, '^\d+$') AND TO_NUMBER(sf.FlaggedEntityId) = ac.SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER_ID
WHERE sf.SponsorId = p_SponsorId ORDER BY sf.SPONSORFLAGID DESC; END sp_GetSponsorFlags;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORIDENTITYPROOFDOCUMENTS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorIdentityProofDocuments ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT L.document_type, TO_CHAR(S.expiration_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS expiration_date, S.verified, S.picture_id FROM SPONSOR_PROOF_OF_IDENTITY S LEFT JOIN LIST_PROOF_OF_IDENTITY L ON L.list_proof_of_identity_id = S.list_proof_of_identity_id WHERE S.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId AND S.uac_id = p_UacId AND S.PROOF_TYPE = 'Sponsor' AND S.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetSponsorIdentityProofDocuments;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORINCARCERATIONHISTORY
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorIncarcerationHistory ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select s.crime as sponsor_crime, TO_CHAR(s.incarceration_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as sponsor_crime_date, s.length_of_incarceration as sponsor_crime_length, s.incarceration_location as sponsor_crime_location from SPONSOR_INCARCERATION s where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetSponsorIncarcerationHistory;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETSPONSORRELATIONSHIPPROOFDOCUMENTS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE sp_GetSponsorRelationshipProofDocuments ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_UacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For
select l.relationship_document as document_type, TO_CHAR(s.expiration_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as expiration_date, TO_CHAR(s.date_issued, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as date_issued, s.verified from SPONSOR_PROOF_OF_RELATIONSHIP s left join LIST_PROOF_RELATIONSHIP_DOCUMENT l on l.list_proof_relationship_document_id = s.list_relationship_document_proof_id where s.sponsor_id = p_SponsorId and s.uac_id = p_UacId and s.ISDELETED = 0; END sp_GetSponsorRelationshipProofDocuments;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETUACINFO
UACPORTAL.SP_GETUACINFO_BYALIENNO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GETUACINFO_BYALIENNO" ( ALIEN_NO IN VARCHAR2 , CUR_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS aNo_ VARCHAR2(10) := ALIEN_NO; lastStatus_ VARCHAR2(30); rCount_ VARCHAR2(2) := 0; BEGIN Select Join(cursor(select distinct UAC_Status from UAC_INFO Where ALIEN_NO = aNo_)) into lastStatus_ from dual; If regexp_instr(lastStatus_, 'PENDING') > 0 Then OPEN cur_OUT For Select * from ( SELECT DISTINCT B.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, B.DATE_ADMITTED,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, A.UPTIME, A.GENDER FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.DATE_ADMITTED,A.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, A.UPTIME From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID ) B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where A.ALIEN_NO = aNo_ And A.UAC_STATUS = 'PENDING' Order by NVL(A.UPTIME, SYSDATE) DESC ) where rownum <= 1; ElsIf regexp_instr(lastStatus_, 'ENROUTE') > 0 Then OPEN cur_OUT For Select * from ( SELECT DISTINCT B.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, B.DATE_ADMITTED,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, A.UPTIME, A.GENDER FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.DATE_ADMITTED,A.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, A.UPTIME From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID ) B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where A.ALIEN_NO = aNo_ And A.UAC_STATUS = 'ENROUTE' Order by NVL(A.UPTIME, SYSDATE) DESC ) where rownum <= 1; Elsif regexp_instr(lastStatus_, 'IN-TRANSFER') > 0 Then OPEN cur_OUT For Select * from ( SELECT DISTINCT B.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, B.DATE_ADMITTED,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, A.UPTIME, A.GENDER FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.DATE_ADMITTED,A.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, A.UPTIME From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID ) B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where A.ALIEN_NO = aNo_ And A.UAC_STATUS = 'IN-TRANSFER' Order by NVL(A.UPTIME, SYSDATE) DESC ) where rownum <= 1; Elsif regexp_instr(lastStatus_, 'ADMITTED') > 0 Then OPEN cur_OUT For Select * from ( SELECT DISTINCT B.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, B.DATE_ADMITTED,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, A.UPTIME, A.GENDER FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.DATE_ADMITTED,A.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, A.UPTIME From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID ) B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where A.ALIEN_NO = aNo_ And A.UAC_STATUS = 'ADMITTED' Order by NVL(A.UPTIME, SYSDATE) DESC ) where rownum <= 1; ElsIf regexp_instr(lastStatus_, 'DISCHARGED') > 0 Then OPEN cur_OUT For Select * from ( SELECT DISTINCT B.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, B.DATE_ADMITTED,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, A.UPTIME, A.GENDER, B.DATE_DISCHARGED FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.DATE_ADMITTED, A.DATE_DISCHARGED,A.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, A.UPTIME From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID ) B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where A.ALIEN_NO = aNo_ And A.UAC_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' Order by NVL(B.DATE_DISCHARGED, SYSDATE) DESC ) where rownum <= 1; Else OPEN cur_OUT For Select * from ( SELECT DISTINCT B.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, B.DATE_ADMITTED,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, A.UPTIME, A.GENDER FROM UAC_INFO A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.DATE_ADMITTED,A.PROGRAM_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME, A.UPTIME From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID ) B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where A.ALIEN_NO = aNo_ And A.UAC_STATUS = 'CANCELED' Order by NVL(A.UPTIME, SYSDATE) DESC ) where rownum <= 1; End If; END SP_GETUACINFO_BYALIENNO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETUACPLACEMENTINFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GETUACPLACEMENTINFO" ( UAC_ID NUMBER, UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; uacId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_ID; BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.UAC_ID,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.AKA, A.DOB, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, A.COB, A.GENDER, A.CBP_CODE, CURRENT_STATUS as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_REFERRED, A.PROCESSING_POC, A.PROCESSING_PHONE, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, C.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_TYPE, DATE_ORR_APPROVED as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED, C.ADDRESS, C.CITY, C.STATE, C.ZIPCODE, E.TRANSACTION_ID, CASE WHEN A.REFERRING_AGENCY = 1 THEN 'USEC' ELSE 'E3' END AS REFERRER FROM UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join XMLJOB_ACTIVITY_LOGS E On E.UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE D On C.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID Where A.UAC_ID = uacId_ AND B.PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; END SP_GETUACPLACEMENTINFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GETUAC_CASEMANAGERS
UACPORTAL.SP_GETUAC_UNIFICATION_SPECIALIST
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_ADDENDUM_INFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_ADDENDUM_INFO ( v_SIRID number, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out for select 1 as ADDENDUM_ID, A.EVENT_ID, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as DATE_CREATED, TO_CHAR(A.UPTIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy hh:mi:ssAM') as UPTIME, A.UPUSER, A.SIR_ID, A.UAC_SIR_ID,A.EVENT_TYPE, B.DATE_CREATED as DATE_OF_EVENT from UAC_SIR_NEW A Inner Join UAC_SIR_EVENT B on A.EVENT_ID = B.EVENT_ID where A.SIR_ID = V_SIRID AND A.ADDENDUM_ID = 1 AND A.ISDELETED = 0; END SP_GET_ADDENDUM_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_AGENCY
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_APP_LAUNCHER_SETTINGS
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_ASSESSMENT_DATA
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_BWA_MATCHES
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_BWA_SETTINGS
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CASESTATUS_ALT_CAREGIVER_ARI_DATE
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_CASESTATUS_ALT_CAREGIVER_ARI_DATE" ( UAC_ID varchar2, VSPONSOR_ID varchar2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_ID; BEGIN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT H.SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER_ID, H.NAME,H.ARI_DATE_RECEIVED, H.ARI_DATE_NA FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER H ON H.SPONSOR_ID = A.SPONSOR_ID AND H.UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID WHERE A.UAC_ID = uacId_ AND A.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 and A.IS_DELETED = 0 AND H.Age > 17 AND H.ISDELETED = 0 and H.SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER_ID not in ( select SPAC.SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER_ID from SPONSOR_ALTERNATE_CAREGIVER SPAC inner join SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS SHO on SHO.uac_id = SPAC.UAC_ID and SHO.SPONSOR_ID = SPAC.Sponsor_id and SHO.ISDELETED = 0 where SHO.DOB=SPAC.DOB and (UPPER(sho.first_name)||' ' || UPPER(sho.last_name) = Upper(SPAC.name))); END SP_GET_CASESTATUS_ALT_CAREGIVER_ARI_DATE;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CASESTATUS_FAM_REUN
