routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_CASESTATUS_FAM_REUN" ( UAC_ID NUMBER , UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER , CUR_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_ID; uacProgId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT UPI.*, (SELECT MIN(B.DATE_ADMITTED) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B WHERE B.UAC_ID = uacId_) As FIRST_ADMITTED_DATE, (SELECT UPI3.DATE_DISCHARGED FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI3 INNER JOIN (SELECT A.UAC_ID, MAX(B.DATE_ADMITTED) as MAX_ADMITTED_DATE FROM UAC_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID WHERE A.UAC_ID = uacId_ GROUP BY A.UAC_ID ) UPI2 ON UPI2.UAC_ID = UPI3.UAC_ID AND UPI2.MAX_ADMITTED_DATE = UPI3.DATE_ADMITTED) AS LATEST_DISCHARGE_DATE FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI WHERE UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; END SP_GET_CASESTATUS_FAM_REUN;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CATEGORY_MAP_DATA
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_GET_CATEGORY_MAP_DATA ( vSirID number, vAddendum number, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN
if vAddendum is not null then OPEN cur_Out for select * from uac_sir_category_map where SIR_ID = vSirID AND ISDELETED = 0 and addendum_id = 1; else OPEN cur_Out for select * from uac_sir_category_map where SIR_ID = vSirID AND ISDELETED = 0 and addendum_id is null; end if; END SP_GET_CATEGORY_MAP_DATA;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CHILD_CURRENT_LOCATION
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CHILD_DOB
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_Get_Child_Dob(UACPROGRAMID IN NUMBER, CUR_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR) AS BEGIN OPEN CUR_OUT FOR select TRUNC(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) / 12) AS Age from UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID where B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UACPROGRAMID; END SP_Get_Child_Dob;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CHILD_EVENT_TOP
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_Get_CHILD_EVENT_TOP( vEventID in number, CUR_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR) AS BEGIN OPEN CUR_OUT FOR Select EVENT_ID, DATE_OF_EVENT, SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, TIME_OF_EVENT, lle.location_description, les.location_name, lp.program_name, SPECIFY_LOCATION, DATE_EVENT_REPORTED_CARE_PROVIDER, TIME_EVENT_REPORTED_CARE_PROVIDER, APPROX_MONTH, APPROX_YEAR, lp1.program_name as SPECIFIED_PROGRAM_NAME from uac_sir_event ASE left outer join LIST_LOCATION_EVENT lle on lle.list_location_event_id = ase.location left outer join LIST_LOCATION_EVENT_SPECIFY les on les.LIST_LOCATION_EVENT_SPECIFY_ID = ase.Specify_location left outer join list_Programs lp on lp.program_id = ase.program_id left outer join list_Programs lp1 on lp1.program_id = ase.SPECIFIED_PROGRAM_ID where event_ID = vEventID; END SP_Get_CHILD_EVENT_TOP;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CHILD_LEVEL_EVENT_SETTING
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST" ( vUAC_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacId_ NUMBER(10,0) := vUAC_ID; BEGIN /* -- Used to get rows for Location History section on DischargeDetail.aspx page */ Open cur_Out For SELECT A.CHILD_LCTN_HIST_ID, A.UAC_ID, CASE WHEN A.PRIMARY_CAREGIVER_TYPE is not null then C.CAREGIVER_TYPE ELSE A.LOCATION_TYPE END as LOCATION_TYPE, CASE WHEN A.PRIMARY_CAREGIVER_TYPE is not null then A.CAREGIVER_FIRST_NAME || ' ' || A.CAREGIVER_LAST_NAME Else A.LOCATION_NAME END as LOCATION_NAME, CASE WHEN A.LOCATION_ADDRESS is null then '' ELSE A.LOCATION_ADDRESS || ', ' END || CASE WHEN A.LOCATION_ADDRESS_SECONDARY is null then '' else A.LOCATION_ADDRESS_SECONDARY || ', ' END || CASE WHEN A.LOCATION_CITY is null then '' else A.LOCATION_CITY || ', ' END || Case when A.LOCATION_STATE is null then '' else A.LOCATION_STATE || ' ' END || A.LOCATION_ZIPCODE as ADDRESS, U.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || U.LAST_NAME || ' ' || to_char(A.DATE_LAST_UPDATED, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as LAST_UPDATED, A.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID, A.CHILD_LOCATION_TYPE, LIVING_WITH_SPONSOR, nvl(A.REASON_FOR_UPDATE_ID,1) AS REASON_FOR_UPDATE_ID, RFU.REASON_FOR_UPDATE_TYPE FROM UAC_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST A LEFT JOIN LIST_CURRENT_LOCATION_TYPE B On A.CHILD_LOCATION_TYPE = B.CURRENT_LCTN_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_CAREGIVER_TYPE C On A.PRIMARY_CAREGIVER_TYPE = C.CAREGIVER_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER U On UPPER(A.USER_LAST_UPDATED) = UPPER(U.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN LIST_REASON_FOR_UPDATE RFU ON A.REASON_FOR_UPDATE_ID = RFU.REASON_FOR_UPDATE_ID WHERE A.UAC_ID = uacId_ AND A.ISDELETED = 0 AND A.IS_CURRENT = 0 ORDER BY CHILD_LCTN_HIST_ID DESC; END SP_GET_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_COUNTRIES
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_COUNTRIES" ( v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if v_Search_Value = 'All' then Open cur_Out For select * from LIST_COUNTRIES order by COUNTRY_NAME ; else Open cur_Out For select * from LIST_COUNTRIES Where COUNTRY_NAME = v_Search_Value order by COUNTRY_NAME ; end if;
END SP_GET_COUNTRIES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CSV_1
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_CSV_1" ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID = '-1' then Open cur_Out For select C.PROGRAM_NAME "Location", FIRST_NAME FirstName , LAST_NAME LastName, ALIEN_NO AlienNumber, Case When DOB is not null Then TO_CHAR(DOB, 'dd-MON-YY') Else '01-JAN-2000' End as DOB, case when UPPER(GENDER) ='M' then 'Male' when UPPER(GENDER) ='F' then 'Female' else 'Unknown' end as GENDER, COB Origin, Case When B.DATE_ADMITTED is not null Then TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED, 'dd-MON-YY') Else '01-JAN-00' End as StartDate, CASE WHEN B.DATE_DISCHARGED is not null Then TO_CHAR(B.DATE_DISCHARGED, 'dd-MON-YY') Else '' End EndDate, Case When nvl(B.BIO_VERIFIED,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Verified, case when A.DATE_OF_ENTRY >B.DATE_ADMITTED then 'Initial Placement' else 'Transfer' end Disposition from UAC_INFO A inner join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B on A.UAC_ID=B.UAC_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C on C.PROGRAM_ID=B.PROGRAM_ID where upper(A.UAC_STATUS) in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'DISCHARGED') And UPPER(FIRST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND UPPER(LAST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%'; else Open cur_Out For select C.PROGRAM_NAME "Location", FIRST_NAME FirstName , LAST_NAME LastName, ALIEN_NO AlienNumber, Case When DOB is not null Then TO_CHAR(DOB, 'dd-MON-YY') Else '01-JAN-00' End, case when UPPER(GENDER) ='M' then 'Male' when UPPER(GENDER) ='F' then 'Female' else 'Unknown' end as GENDER, COB Origin, Case When B.DATE_ADMITTED is not null Then TO_CHAR(B.DATE_ADMITTED, 'dd-MON-YY') Else '01-JAN-00' End StartDate, CASE WHEN B.DATE_DISCHARGED is not null Then TO_CHAR(B.DATE_DISCHARGED, 'dd-MON-YY') Else '' End EndDate, Case When nvl(B.BIO_VERIFIED,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Verified, case when A.DATE_OF_ENTRY >B.DATE_ADMITTED then 'Initial Placement' else 'Transfer' end Disposition from UAC_INFO A inner join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B on A.UAC_ID=B.UAC_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C on C.PROGRAM_ID=B.PROGRAM_ID where B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID=v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND upper(A.UAC_STATUS) in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'DISCHARGED') And UPPER(FIRST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%' AND UPPER(LAST_NAME) not like '%FAKE%'; end if;
END SP_GET_CSV_1;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CSV_2
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_CSV_2" ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID = '-1' then Open cur_Out For select null Carrier, 'DIHORR' "Group #", A.ALIEN_NO "Cardholder ID", '01' "Person Code", to_char(C.DATE_ADMITTED, 'YYYYMMDD') "Effective Date", null "Term Date", null Filler, to_char(A.DOB, 'YYYYMMDD') DOB, CASE when UPPER(A.Gender) LIKE 'M%' then 'M' else 'F' end Gender, A.LAST_NAME "Last Name",A.FIRST_NAME "First Name" , null MI, null "Cardholder SSN", null "Coverage Code", null "Location Code", NULL Filler2, D.ADDRESS "Address 1", NULL "Address 2", D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIPCODE ZIP, NULL "Home Phone", NULL "Work Phone", NULL "Dependent SSN", NULL "Medicare HICN" from UAC_INFO A inner join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C on A.UAC_ID=C.UAC_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS D on C.PROGRAM_ID=D.PROGRAM_ID WHERE upper(A.UAC_STATUS) in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'ENROUTE', 'PENDING') AND upper(C.CURRENT_STATUS) in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'ENROUTE', 'PENDING') ; else Open cur_Out For select null Carrier, 'DIHORR' "Group #", A.ALIEN_NO "Cardholder ID", '01' "Person Code", to_char(C.DATE_ADMITTED, 'YYYYMMDD') "Effective Date", null "Term Date", null Filler, to_char(A.DOB, 'YYYYMMDD') DOB, CASE when UPPER(A.Gender) LIKE 'M%' then 'M' else 'F' end Gender, A.LAST_NAME "Last Name",A.FIRST_NAME "First Name" , null MI, null "Cardholder SSN", null "Coverage Code", null "Location Code", NULL Filler2, D.ADDRESS "Address 1", NULL "Address 2", D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIPCODE ZIP, NULL "Home Phone", NULL "Work Phone", NULL "Dependent SSN", NULL "Medicare HICN" from UAC_INFO A inner join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C on A.UAC_ID=C.UAC_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS D on C.PROGRAM_ID=D.PROGRAM_ID where c.UAC_PROGRAM_ID=v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND upper(A.UAC_STATUS) in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'ENROUTE', 'PENDING') AND upper(C.CURRENT_STATUS) in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'ENROUTE', 'PENDING'); end if;
END SP_GET_CSV_2;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CSV_2_FIXED_LEN
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_CSV_2_FIXED_LEN" ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID = '-1' then Open cur_Out For select null Carrier, 'DIHORR' "Group #", B.ALIEN_NO "Cardholder ID", '01' "Person Code", to_char(C.DATE_ADMITTED, 'YYYYMMDD') "Effective Date", null "Term Date", null Filler, to_char(B.DOB, 'YYYYMMDD') DOB, CASE when UPPER(B.Gender) LIKE 'M%' then 'M' else 'F' end Gender, B.LAST_NAME "Last Name",B.FIRST_NAME "First Name" , null MI, null "Cardholder SSN", null "Coverage Code", null "Location Code", NULL Filler2, B.ADDRESS "Address 1", NULL "Address 2", B.CITY, B.STATE, B.ZIP_CODE ZIP, NULL "Home Phone", NULL "Work Phone", NULL "Dependent SSN", NULL "Medicare HICN", null Filler3 from UAC_INFO A left join SPONSOR_INFO B on A.ALIEN_NO=B.ALIEN_NO and b.is_deleted = 0 inner join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C on A.UAC_ID=C.UAC_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS D on C.PROGRAM_ID=D.PROGRAM_ID; else Open cur_Out For select null Carrier, 'DIHORR' "Group #", B.ALIEN_NO "Cardholder ID", '01' "Person Code", to_char(C.DATE_ADMITTED, 'YYYYMMDD') "Effective Date", null "Term Date", null Filler, to_char(B.DOB, 'YYYYMMDD') DOB, CASE when UPPER(B.Gender) LIKE 'M%' then 'M' else 'F' end Gender, B.LAST_NAME "Last Name",B.FIRST_NAME "First Name" , null MI, null "Cardholder SSN", null "Coverage Code", null "Location Code", NULL Filler2, B.ADDRESS "Address 1", NULL "Address 2", B.CITY, B.STATE, B.ZIP_CODE ZIP, NULL "Home Phone", NULL "Work Phone", NULL "Dependent SSN", NULL "Medicare HICN", null Filler3 from UAC_INFO A left join SPONSOR_INFO B on A.ALIEN_NO=B.ALIEN_NO and b.is_deleted = 0 inner join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C on A.UAC_ID=C.UAC_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS D on C.PROGRAM_ID=D.PROGRAM_ID where c.UAC_PROGRAM_ID=v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID ; end if;
END SP_GET_CSV_2_FIXED_LEN;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CSV_3
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_CSV_3" ( v_Days NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For select DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, DAILY_DISCHARGE from ( select '1' Seq, TO_CHAR(DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, COUNT(UAC_PROGRAM_ID) DAILY_DISCHARGE FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO where DATE_DISCHARGED <= sysdate and DATEDIFF('day', DATE_DISCHARGED, sysdate) <= v_Days And UAC_PROGRAM_ID Not in (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT Where TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = 9) group by TO_CHAR(DATE_DISCHARGED,'MM/DD/YYYY') union select '2' Seq, 'Total discharges' DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, COUNT(UAC_PROGRAM_ID) DAILY_DISCHARGE FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO where DATE_DISCHARGED <= sysdate and DATEDIFF('day', DATE_DISCHARGED, sysdate) <= v_Days And UAC_PROGRAM_ID Not in (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT Where TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = 9) union select '3' Seq, 'Shelter Only LOS' DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, ROUND(AVG(DateDiff('day', A.DATE_ADMITTED, DATE_DISCHARGED)),2) DAILY_DISCHARGE FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A inner join LIST_PROGRAMS D on D.PROGRAM_ID=A.PROGRAM_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE E on E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID where DATE_DISCHARGED <= sysdate and DATEDIFF('day', DATE_DISCHARGED, sysdate) <= v_Days And UAC_PROGRAM_ID Not in (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT Where TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = 9) and upper(E.PROGRAM_TYPE)='SHELTER' union select '4' Seq, 'All Discharge LOS' DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, ROUND(AVG(DateDiff('day',DATE_ADMITTED, DATE_DISCHARGED)),2) DAILY_DISCHARGE FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO where DATE_DISCHARGED <= sysdate and DATEDIFF('day', DATE_DISCHARGED, sysdate) <= v_Days And UAC_PROGRAM_ID Not in (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT Where TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = 9) ) order by Seq , DATE_OF_DISCHARGE ;
END SP_GET_CSV_3;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_CURRENT_CHILD_LOCATION
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_EMAIL_NOTIFICATION_ADD
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_EMAIL_NOTIFICATION_INFO
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_ENROLLMENTRPTS_LIST
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_ENTRY_LOCATION
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_ENTRY_LOCATION" ( v_uacId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out For Select A.City_OF_ENTRY || ', ' || A.STATE_OF_ENTRY as Referring_Field_Sector from UAC_INFO A Where A.CITY_OF_ENTRY is not null And A.UAC_ID = v_uacId; END SP_GET_ENTRY_LOCATION;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_EVENTS
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_EVENTS_BY_PROGID
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_EVENTS_SIRS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_EVENTS_SIRS ( v_User_Id VARCHAR2, v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_Param1 varchar2(300); BEGIN v_Param1 := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',UPPER(v_Search_Value)), '%'); if v_User_Id <> 'HQ' Then OPEN cur_Out for Select * from ( select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'SIR Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, CASE WHEN T1.LOCATION IN (7,8,9,10) THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.APPROX_MONTH, 'MM'), 'MON')) || '-' || T1.APPROX_YEAR ELSE TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_OF_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') END AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_OF_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND NVL(ADDENDUM_ID,0) = 0) NUM_SIRS, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND NVL(ADDENDUM_ID,0) = 0 AND ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE = 'Sexual Abuse or Sexual Harassment') NUM_SEXABUSE, T4.SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from UAC_SIR_EVENT T1 --LEFT JOIN (Select * From UAC_SIR_NEW Where NVL(ADDENDUM_ID,0) = 0) T2 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T2.EVENT_ID --LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO T4 ON T4.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = T2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SIR_FOLLOWUP_RPT T4 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T4.EVENT_ID WHERE (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) And T1.PROGRAM_ID in (Select PROGRAM_ID from ADM_USER_PROGRAM Where Upper(USER_ID) = Upper(v_User_Id)) AND NVL(T1.ISDELETED,0) = 0 UNION select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'Program Level Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, 0 NUM_SIRS, 0 NUM_SEXABUSE, 0 SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENTS_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID WHERE (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) And T1.PROGRAM_ID in (Select PROGRAM_ID from ADM_USER_PROGRAM Where Upper(USER_ID) = Upper(v_User_Id)) )ORDER BY EVENT_ID; Else OPEN cur_Out for Select * from ( select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'SIR Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, CASE WHEN T1.LOCATION IN (7,8,9,10) THEN TRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.APPROX_MONTH, 'MM'), 'MON')) || '-' || T1.APPROX_YEAR ELSE TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_OF_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') END AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_OF_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND NVL(ADDENDUM_ID,0) = 0) NUM_SIRS, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND NVL(ADDENDUM_ID,0) = 0 AND ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE = 'Sexual Abuse or Sexual Harassment') NUM_SEXABUSE, T4.SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from UAC_SIR_EVENT T1 --LEFT JOIN (Select * From UAC_SIR_NEW Where NVL(ADDENDUM_ID,0) = 0) T2 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T2.EVENT_ID --LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO T4 ON T4.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = T2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SIR_FOLLOWUP_RPT T4 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T4.EVENT_ID WHERE (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) AND NVL(T1.ISDELETED,0) = 0 UNION select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'Program Level Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, 0 NUM_SIRS, 0 NUM_SEXABUSE, 0 SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENTS_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID WHERE (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) ) ORDER BY EVENT_ID; End If; END SP_GET_EVENTS_SIRS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_EVENTS_SIRS_DUMMY
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_EVENTS_SIRS_DUMMY ( v_User_Id VARCHAR2, v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_Param1 varchar2(300); v_ParamUser varchar(300); BEGIN v_Param1 := v_Search_Value; v_Param1 := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',UPPER(v_Param1)), '%'); v_ParamUser := v_User_Id; if v_ParamUser <> 'HQ' Then OPEN cur_Out for Select * from ( select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'SIR Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_OF_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_OF_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND nvl(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = null) NUM_SIRS, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND nvl(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = null AND ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE = 'Sexual Abuse or Sexual Harassment') NUM_SEXABUSE, T4.SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from UAC_SIR_EVENT T1 LEFT JOIN (Select EVENT_ID, UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_SIR_NEW Where nvl(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = null) T2 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T2.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO T4 ON T4.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = T2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SIR_FOLLOWUP_RPT T4 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T4.EVENT_ID WHERE NVL(T1.ISDELETED, 0) = 0 AND (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) And T1.PROGRAM_ID in (Select PROGRAM_ID from ADM_USER_PROGRAM Where Upper(USER_ID) = Upper(v_ParamUser)) UNION select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'Program Level Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, 0 NUM_SIRS, 0 NUM_SEXABUSE, 0 SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENTS_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID WHERE (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) And T1.PROGRAM_ID in (Select PROGRAM_ID from ADM_USER_PROGRAM Where Upper(USER_ID) = Upper(v_ParamUser)) )ORDER BY EVENT_ID; Else OPEN cur_Out for Select * from ( select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'SIR Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_OF_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_OF_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND nvl(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = null) NUM_SIRS, (select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE EVENT_ID = T1.EVENT_ID AND nvl(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = null AND ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE = 'Sexual Abuse or Sexual Harassment') NUM_SEXABUSE, T4.SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from UAC_SIR_EVENT T1 LEFT JOIN (Select EVENT_ID, UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_SIR_NEW Where nvl(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = null) T2 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T2.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO T4 ON T4.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = T2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SIR_FOLLOWUP_RPT T4 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T4.EVENT_ID WHERE NVL(T1.ISDELETED, 0) = 0 AND (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) UNION select distinct T1.EVENT_ID as EVENT_ID,'Program Level Event' as EVENT_TYPE, T1.SYNOPSIS AS SYNOPSIS_OF_EVENT, TO_CHAR(T1.DATE_EVENT,'DD-MON-YYYY') AS DATE_OF_EVENT, T3.PROGRAM_NAME AS PROGRAM_NAME, T1.TIME_EVENT AS TIME_OF_EVENT, 0 NUM_SIRS, 0 NUM_SEXABUSE, 0 SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID from PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENTS_INFO T1 LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T3 ON T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PROGRAM_ID WHERE (UPPER(TO_CHAR(T1.EVENT_ID)) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T1.SYNOPSIS) like v_Param1 or UPPER(T3.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1) ) ORDER BY EVENT_ID; End If; END SP_GET_EVENTS_SIRS_DUMMY;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_EVENT_ID
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_FACILITY_INFO
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_FACILITY_INFO_ARC
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_FACILITY_INFO_ARC" ( isDeleted IN NUMBER, ARCTIME IN VARCHAR2 , v_USER_ID IN VARCHAR2, v_STATE IN VARCHAR2, cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS arcTime_ VARCHAR2(64) := ARCTIME; isDeleted_ NUMBER(1) := isDeleted; vUserRole VARCHAR2(50); BEGIN Select ROLE_TYPE into vUserRole From ADM_LIST_WEB_USER Where USER_ID = v_USER_ID; IF (vUserRole = 'HQ' or vUserRole <> 'Program') THEN IF(v_STATE = 'DFFC') THEN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT F.FACILITY_ID, F.FACILITY_NAME, F.FACILITY_TYPE, F.REGION, F.STATE, F.CITY, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_M, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_F, F.IN_CARE_M, F.IN_CARE_F, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_M, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_F, F.COMMENTS, F.INSTRUCTIONS, F.CONFIRMED_BY, F.CONFIRMED_TIME, F.ISDELETED, F.MEN_ONLY, F.REGION_ORDER, F.PROGRAM_ID, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_M, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_F, F.DFFC_TYPE, F.VERIFIED, F.ENROUTE_M, F.ENROUTE_F, F.IN_TRANSFER_M, F.IN_TRANSFER_F, L.STATENAME FROM FACILITY_INFO_ARC F LEFT JOIN LIST_STATES L on F.STATE=L.STATE Where To_Date(To_Char(Arc_TIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM'),'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Date(arcTime_, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') and ISDELETED = isDeleted_ AND F.STATE is null; ElsIf (v_STATE is null or v_STATE='') THEN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT F.FACILITY_ID, F.FACILITY_NAME, F.FACILITY_TYPE, F.REGION, F.STATE, F.CITY, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_M, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_F, F.IN_CARE_M, F.IN_CARE_F, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_M, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_F, F.COMMENTS, F.INSTRUCTIONS, F.CONFIRMED_BY, F.CONFIRMED_TIME, F.ISDELETED, F.MEN_ONLY, F.REGION_ORDER, F.PROGRAM_ID, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_M, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_F, F.DFFC_TYPE, F.VERIFIED, F.ENROUTE_M, F.ENROUTE_F, F.IN_TRANSFER_M, F.IN_TRANSFER_F, L.STATENAME FROM FACILITY_INFO_ARC F LEFT JOIN LIST_STATES L on F.STATE=L.STATE Where To_Date(To_Char(Arc_TIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM'),'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Date(arcTime_, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') and ISDELETED = isDeleted_; Else Open CUR_OUT for SELECT F.FACILITY_ID, F.FACILITY_NAME, F.FACILITY_TYPE, F.REGION, F.STATE, F.CITY, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_M, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_F, F.IN_CARE_M, F.IN_CARE_F, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_M, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_F, F.COMMENTS, F.INSTRUCTIONS, F.CONFIRMED_BY, F.CONFIRMED_TIME, F.ISDELETED, F.MEN_ONLY, F.REGION_ORDER, F.PROGRAM_ID, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_M, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_F, F.DFFC_TYPE, F.VERIFIED, F.ENROUTE_M, F.ENROUTE_F, F.IN_TRANSFER_M, F.IN_TRANSFER_F, L.STATENAME FROM FACILITY_INFO_ARC F LEFT JOIN LIST_STATES L on F.STATE=L.STATE Where To_Date(To_Char(Arc_TIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM'),'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Date(arcTime_, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') and ISDELETED = isDeleted_ AND f.STATE=v_STATE; end if; ELSIF(vUserRole = 'Program') THEN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT F.FACILITY_ID, F.FACILITY_NAME, F.FACILITY_TYPE, F.REGION, F.STATE, F.CITY, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_M, F.FUNDED_CAPACITY_F, F.IN_CARE_M, F.IN_CARE_F, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_M, F.BEDS_IN_RESERVE_F, F.COMMENTS, F.INSTRUCTIONS, F.CONFIRMED_BY, F.CONFIRMED_TIME, F.ISDELETED, F.MEN_ONLY, F.REGION_ORDER, F.PROGRAM_ID, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_M, F.BEDS_UNAVAILABLE_F, F.DFFC_TYPE, F.VERIFIED, F.ENROUTE_M, F.ENROUTE_F, F.IN_TRANSFER_M, F.IN_TRANSFER_F, L.STATENAME FROM FACILITY_INFO_ARC F LEFT JOIN LIST_STATES L on F.STATE=L.STATE Where To_Date(To_Char(Arc_TIME, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM'),'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Date(arcTime_, 'mm/dd/yyyy HH:mi:ss AM') and ISDELETED = isDeleted_ and F.PROGRAM_ID IN (select PROGRAM_ID from ADM_USER_PROGRAM WHERE USER_ID = v_USER_ID); end if; END SP_GET_FACILITY_INFO_ARC;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_FACILITY_SUMMARY
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_FACILITY_SUM_BY_REGION
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_FAST
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_FAST" ( v_UAC_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, AKA, A.DOB, A.COB, A.GENDER, A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.UAC_STATUS, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, C.PROGRAM_ID, C.PROGRAM_NAME,D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, D.PROGRAM_TYPE, A.DATE_CREATED as DATE_INITIAL_PLACEMENT, F.* From UAC_INFO A left join UAC_FAST F on A.UAC_ID=F.UAC_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE D on C.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID Where A.UAC_ID = v_UAC_ID ;
END SP_GET_FAST;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_FC_TRAVEL_REQUEST
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_FC_TRAVEL_REQUESTS
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_HOTLINE_ALERTS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_HOTLINE_ALERTS" ( V_HOTLINE_ALERT_ID IN NUMBER default null, V_DATE_OF_CALL IN DATE default null, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For SELECT HOTLINE_ALERT_ID, DATE_OF_CALL, INCIDENT_SYNOPSIS, NVL(SENTTOORR,0) as SENTTOORR FROM UAC_HOTLINE_ALERT where (V_HOTLINE_ALERT_ID = -1 or (TRUNC(DATE_OF_CALL) = V_DATE_OF_CALL or HOTLINE_ALERT_ID = V_HOTLINE_ALERT_ID)) and ISDELETED = 0 ORDER BY DATE_OF_CALL desc; END SP_GET_HOTLINE_ALERTS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_HSPRS_CAPACITY
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_HSPRS_CAPACITY" ( v_Provider IN NUMBER , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS provider_ NUMBER(10) := v_Provider; BEGIN if provider_ > 0 Then OPEN cur_OUT For SELECT z.STATE, NVL(x.HSCountActive, 0) as HSCountActive, NVL(y.PRSCountActive, 0) as PRSCountActive, NVL(k.HSCountClosed, 0) as HSCountClosed, NVL(d.PRSCountClosed, 0) as PRSCountClosed FROM LIST_STATES z LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.HOMESTUDY_ID) as HSCountActive From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = provider_ AND R.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) GROUP BY E.STATE) x ON z.STATE = x.STATE LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.PRS_ID) as PRSCountActive From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = provider_ AND ((R.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS IN (1,5) AND R.ORR_DECISION <> 6 AND A.PRS_Type = 0) OR (R.ORR_DECISION = 2 AND A.PRS_Type = 1)) GROUP BY E.STATE) y ON z.STATE = y.STATE LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.HOMESTUDY_ID) as HSCountClosed From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 AND A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = provider_ AND R.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) GROUP BY E.STATE) k ON z.STATE = k.STATE LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.PRS_ID) as PRSCountClosed From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 AND A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = provider_ AND ((R.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS IN (1,5) AND R.ORR_DECISION <> 6 AND A.PRS_Type = 0) OR (R.ORR_DECISION = 2 AND A.PRS_Type = 1)) GROUP BY E.STATE) d ON z.STATE = d.STATE ORDER BY z.STATE; Else OPEN cur_OUT for SELECT z.STATE, NVL(x.HSCountActive, 0) as HSCountActive, NVL(y.PRSCountActive, 0) as PRSCountActive, NVL(k.HSCountClosed, 0) as HSCountClosed, NVL(d.PRSCountClosed, 0) as PRSCountClosed FROM LIST_STATES z LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.HOMESTUDY_ID) as HSCountActive From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND R.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) GROUP BY E.STATE) x ON z.STATE = x.STATE LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.PRS_ID) as PRSCountActive From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND ((R.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS IN (1,5) AND R.ORR_DECISION <> 6 AND A.PRS_Type = 0) OR (R.ORR_DECISION = 2 AND A.PRS_Type = 1)) GROUP BY E.STATE) y ON z.STATE = y.STATE LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.HOMESTUDY_ID) as HSCountClosed From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 AND R.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) GROUP BY E.STATE) k ON z.STATE = k.STATE LEFT JOIN (SELECT E.STATE, COUNT(DISTINCT A.PRS_ID) as PRSCountClosed From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFt JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST F On F.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID and f.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_INFO E ON F.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST R on C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = R.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where (F.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR F.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) AND A.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 AND ((R.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS IN (1,5) AND R.ORR_DECISION <> 6 AND A.PRS_Type = 0) OR (R.ORR_DECISION = 2 AND A.PRS_Type = 1)) GROUP BY E.STATE) d ON z.STATE = d.STATE ORDER BY z.STATE; End If; END SP_GET_HSPRS_CAPACITY;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_HSPRS_DROPDOWNLIST
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_HSPRS_INFO
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_HSPRS_INFO" ( referralType NUMBER, referralStatus NUMBER, state VARCHAR2, provider VARCHAR2, aNumber VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS referralType_ NUMBER(2) := Upper(referralType); referralStatus_ NUMBER(2) := Upper(referralStatus); state_ VARCHAR2(100) := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',Upper(state)), '%'); provider_ VARCHAR2(100) := Upper(provider); aNumber_ VARCHAR2(100) := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',Upper(aNumber)), '%');
BEGIN If state_ = '%%' Then If referralType_ = 1 Then Open cur_Out For Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.HOMESTUDY_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, Case When E.ORR_DECISION = 7 Then 'Conduct Home Study - TVPRA' When E.ORR_DECISION = 8 Then 'Conduct Home Study - Discretionary' When E.ORR_DECISION = 9 Then 'Conduct Home Study - ORR Mandated' End as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO_HS D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and a.orig_sponsor_id = d.orig_sponsor_id --Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on A.RELEASE_ID = E.RELEASE_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND E.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) order by A.REFERRAL_DATE ASC; Elsif referralType_ = 2 Then Open cur_Out For Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.PRS_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, --F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as HOMESTUDY_INFO, (SELECT CASE WHEN HS_PROVIDER Is NUll THEN 'HS N/A' ELSE HS_PROVIDER END AS HS_PROVIDER FROM (SELECT ( SELECT HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL HS2 ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = HS2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER HSP ON HS2.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE UPI.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND HS2.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 order by COALESCE(HS2.HOMESTUDY_ID, 0) desc fetch first 1 row only) as HS_PROVIDER from dual)) as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB ,A.PRS_SERVICE_LEVEL From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and a.orig_sponsor_id = d.orig_sponsor_id --Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID --Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER F on A.PROVIDER_HOMESTUDY = F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND A.PRS_Type = 0 AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND E.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS IN (5) --AND E.ORR_DECISION <> 6 --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) order by A.REFERRAL_DATE ASC; Elsif referralType_ = 3 Then Open cur_Out For Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.PRS_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, --F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as HOMESTUDY_INFO, (SELECT CASE WHEN HS_PROVIDER Is NUll THEN 'HS N/A' ELSE HS_PROVIDER END AS HS_PROVIDER FROM (SELECT ( SELECT HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL HS2 ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = HS2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER HSP ON HS2.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE UPI.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND HS2.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 order by COALESCE(HS2.HOMESTUDY_ID, 0) desc fetch first 1 row only) as HS_PROVIDER from dual)) as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB ,A.PRS_SERVICE_LEVEL From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and a.orig_sponsor_id = d.orig_sponsor_id --Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID --Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER F on A.PROVIDER_HOMESTUDY = F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND A.PRS_Type = 1 AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND (E.ORR_DECISION = 2 OR (E.ORR_DECISION IN (8,9) AND E.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = 1 AND EXISTS -- (SELECT 1 FROM UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL H WHERE H.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 AND H.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID ) )) --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) order by A.REFERRAL_DATE ASC; End If; Else If referralType_ = 1 Then Open cur_Out For Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.HOMESTUDY_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, Case When E.ORR_DECISION = 7 Then 'Conduct Home Study - TVPRA' When E.ORR_DECISION = 8 Then 'Conduct Home Study - Discretionary' When E.ORR_DECISION = 9 Then 'Conduct Home Study - ORR Mandated' End as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO_HS D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and A.orig_sponsor_id = D.orig_sponsor_id --Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on A.RELEASE_ID = E.RELEASE_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND Upper(D.STATE) LIKE state_ AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND E.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) order by A.REFERRAL_DATE ASC; Elsif referralType_ = 2 Then Open cur_Out For Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.PRS_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, --F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as HOMESTUDY_INFO, (SELECT CASE WHEN HS_PROVIDER Is NUll THEN 'HS N/A' ELSE HS_PROVIDER END AS HS_PROVIDER FROM (SELECT ( SELECT HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL HS2 ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = HS2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER HSP ON HS2.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE UPI.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND HS2.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 order by COALESCE(HS2.HOMESTUDY_ID, 0) desc fetch first 1 row only) as HS_PROVIDER from dual)) as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB ,A.PRS_SERVICE_LEVEL From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and A.orig_sponsor_id = D.orig_sponsor_id --Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID --Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER F on A.PROVIDER_HOMESTUDY = F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND A.PRS_Type = 0 AND Upper(D.STATE) LIKE state_ AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND E.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS IN (1,5) --AND E.ORR_DECISION <> 6 --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) order by A.REFERRAL_DATE ASC; Elsif referralType_ = 3 Then Open cur_Out For Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.PRS_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, --F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as HOMESTUDY_INFO, (SELECT CASE WHEN HS_PROVIDER Is NUll THEN 'HS N/A' ELSE HS_PROVIDER END AS HS_PROVIDER FROM (SELECT ( SELECT HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL HS2 ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = HS2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER HSP ON HS2.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE UPI.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND HS2.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 order by COALESCE(HS2.HOMESTUDY_ID, 0) desc fetch first 1 row only) as HS_PROVIDER from dual)) as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB ,A.PRS_SERVICE_LEVEL From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and A.orig_sponsor_id = D.orig_sponsor_id --Inner Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID --Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER F on A.PROVIDER_HOMESTUDY = F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND A.PRS_Type = 1 AND Upper(D.STATE) LIKE state_ AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND E.ORR_DECISION = 2 --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) order by A.REFERRAL_DATE ASC; End If; End If; END SP_GET_HSPRS_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_HSPRS_INFO_DB_PAGING
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_HSPRS_INFO_DB_PAGING" ( referralType NUMBER, referralStatus NUMBER, state VARCHAR2, provider VARCHAR2, aNumber VARCHAR2, v_Page_Number Number := 1, sort_by VARCHAR2, sort_order VARCHAR2, v_program_id NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS referralType_ NUMBER(2) := Upper(referralType); referralStatus_ NUMBER(2) := Upper(referralStatus); state_ VARCHAR2(100) := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',Upper(state)), '%'); provider_ VARCHAR2(100) := Upper(provider); aNumber_ VARCHAR2(100) := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',Upper(aNumber)), '%'); v_PageSize Number; BEGIN SELECT to_number(PARAM_VALUE) into v_PageSize from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS where PARAM_NAME = 'HSPRS_MAIN_PAGE_SIZE'; If state_ = '%%' Then If referralType_ = 1 Then Open cur_Out For SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as line_number, COUNT(*) OVER () as TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS, Z.* FROM (
Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, --COUNT(*) OVER () as TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.HOMESTUDY_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, --D.ADDRESS, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY as ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, Case When E.ORR_DECISION = 7 Then 'Conduct Home Study ¿ TVPRA' When E.ORR_DECISION = 8 Then 'Conduct Home Study ¿ Discretionary' When E.ORR_DECISION = 9 Then 'Conduct Home Study ¿ ORR Mandated' End as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB ,'' as PRS_SERVICE_LEVEL From UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO_HS D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and a.orig_sponsor_id = d.orig_sponsor_id Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on A.RELEASE_ID = E.RELEASE_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND ((B.PROGRAM_ID = v_program_id and v_program_id is not null) Or v_program_id is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND E.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) --order by A.REFERRAL_DATE ASC ORDER BY CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ALIEN_NO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.ALIEN_NO END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ALIEN_NO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.ALIEN_NO END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'PROGRAM_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN LP.PROGRAM_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'PROGRAM_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN LP.PROGRAM_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'FIRST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.FIRST_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'FIRST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.FIRST_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'LAST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.LAST_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'LAST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.LAST_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'DOB' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.DOB END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'DOB' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.DOB END DESC, --CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.ADDRESS END ASC, --CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.ADDRESS END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'STATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.STATE END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'STATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.STATE END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'CITY' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.CITY END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'CITY' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.CITY END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ZIP_CODE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.ZIP_CODE END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ZIP_CODE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.ZIP_CODE END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'HOMESTUDY_INFO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN HOMESTUDY_INFO END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'HOMESTUDY_INFO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN HOMESTUDY_INFO END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ASSIGNED_PROVIDER' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ASSIGNED_PROVIDER' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'REFERRAL_DATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN A.REFERRAL_DATE END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'REFERRAL_DATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN A.REFERRAL_DATE END DESC ) Z ) Where line_number Between Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + 1 Else 1 End and Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + v_PageSize Else v_PageSize End order by line_number; Elsif referralType_ = 2 Then Open cur_Out For SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as line_number, COUNT(*) OVER () as TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS, Z.* FROM ( Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, --COUNT(*) OVER () as TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.PRS_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, --D.ADDRESS, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY as ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, --F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as HOMESTUDY_INFO, (SELECT CASE WHEN HS_PROVIDER Is NUll THEN 'HS N/A' ELSE HS_PROVIDER END AS HS_PROVIDER FROM (SELECT ( SELECT HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL HS2 ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = HS2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER HSP ON HS2.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE UPI.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND HS2.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 order by COALESCE(HS2.HOMESTUDY_ID, 0) desc fetch first 1 row only) as HS_PROVIDER from dual)) as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB ,A.PRS_SERVICE_LEVEL From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN HOMESTUDY_INFO END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'HOMESTUDY_INFO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN HOMESTUDY_INFO END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ASSIGNED_PROVIDER' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ASSIGNED_PROVIDER' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'REFERRAL_DATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN A.REFERRAL_DATE END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'REFERRAL_DATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN A.REFERRAL_DATE END DESC ) Z ) Where line_number Between Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + 1 Else 1 End and Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + v_PageSize Else v_PageSize End order by line_number; Elsif referralType_ = 3 Then Open cur_Out For SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as line_number, COUNT(*) OVER () as TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS, Z.* FROM ( Select DISTINCT C.UAC_ID, --COUNT(*) OVER () as TOTAL_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS, C.ALIEN_NO, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.PRS_ID as REF_ID, A.REFERRAL_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, --D.ADDRESS, D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY as ADDRESS, D.CITY, D.STATE, D.ZIP_CODE, A.REFERRAL_DATE, --F.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as HOMESTUDY_INFO, (SELECT CASE WHEN HS_PROVIDER Is NUll THEN 'HS N/A' ELSE HS_PROVIDER END AS HS_PROVIDER FROM (SELECT ( SELECT HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL HS2 ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = HS2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER HSP ON HS2.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE UPI.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND HS2.REFERRAL_STATUS = 3 order by COALESCE(HS2.HOMESTUDY_ID, 0) desc fetch first 1 row only) as HS_PROVIDER from dual)) as HOMESTUDY_INFO, C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.ACCEPTANCE_DATE, A.EXP_CLOSURE_DATE, G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER as ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, A.USER_CREATED, A.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, A.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER ,LP.PROGRAM_NAME ,C.DOB ,a.prs_service_level From UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON B.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID --Left Join v_UAC_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join v_UAC_Orig_SPONSOR_INFO D on B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID and D.Referral_Status = A.REFERRAL_STATUS and A.orig_sponsor_id = D.orig_sponsor_id Left Join UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST E on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER G on A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = referralStatus_ AND A.PRS_Type = 1 AND Upper(D.STATE) LIKE state_ AND ((Upper(A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER) LIKE provider_ and Not provider_ is null) OR provider_ is null) AND ((B.PROGRAM_ID = v_program_id and v_program_id is not null) Or v_program_id is null) AND Upper(C.ALIEN_NO) LIKE aNumber_ --AND E.ORR_DECISION = 2 --AND (D.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 OR D.SPONSOR_ID Is NUll) ORDER BY CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ALIEN_NO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.ALIEN_NO END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ALIEN_NO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.ALIEN_NO END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'PROGRAM_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN LP.PROGRAM_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'PROGRAM_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN LP.PROGRAM_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'FIRST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.FIRST_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'FIRST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.FIRST_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'LAST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.LAST_NAME END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'LAST_NAME' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.LAST_NAME END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'DOB' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.DOB END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'DOB' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.DOB END DESC, --CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.ADDRESS END ASC, --CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.ADDRESS END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ADDRESS' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.ADDRESS || ' ' || D.ADDRESS_SECONDARY END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'STATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.STATE END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'STATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.STATE END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'CITY' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.CITY END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'CITY' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.CITY END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ZIP_CODE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN D.ZIP_CODE END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ZIP_CODE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN D.ZIP_CODE END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'HOMESTUDY_INFO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN HOMESTUDY_INFO END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'HOMESTUDY_INFO' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN HOMESTUDY_INFO END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ASSIGNED_PROVIDER' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'ASSIGNED_PROVIDER' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN G.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN C.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID END DESC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'REFERRAL_DATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'ASC' THEN A.REFERRAL_DATE END ASC, CASE WHEN UPPER(sort_by) = 'REFERRAL_DATE' AND UPPER(sort_order) = 'DESC' THEN A.REFERRAL_DATE END DESC ) Z ) Where line_number Between Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + 1 Else 1 End and Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + v_PageSize Else v_PageSize End order by line_number; End If; End If; END SP_GET_HSPRS_INFO_DB_PAGING;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_HSPRS_OVER_18
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_HSPRS_OVER_18" ( PASTDATE DATE, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_pastdate DATE:= PASTDATE; BEGIN Open cur_Out For SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, C.REFERRAL_ID, C.USER_CREATED, C.PROVIDER_USERID, C.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER, C.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, C.REFERRAL_STATUS, D.EMAIL, E.EMAIL AS PROVIDER_EMAIL FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL C ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER D ON C.USER_CREATED = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER E ON C.PROVIDER_USERID = E.USER_ID WHERE C.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND B.DOB < v_pastdate - 30 UNION SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, C.REFERRAL_ID, C.USER_CREATED, C.PROVIDER_USERID, C.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER, C.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, C.REFERRAL_STATUS, D.EMAIL, E.EMAIL AS PROVIDER_EMAIL FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER JOIN UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE C ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER D ON C.USER_CREATED = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER E ON C.PROVIDER_USERID = E.USER_ID WHERE C.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND B.DOB < v_pastdate - 30 UNION SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, C.REFERRAL_ID, C.USER_CREATED, C.PROVIDER_USERID, C.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER, C.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, C.REFERRAL_STATUS, D.EMAIL, E.EMAIL AS PROVIDER_EMAIL FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL C ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER D ON C.USER_CREATED = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER E ON C.PROVIDER_USERID = E.USER_ID WHERE C.REFERRAL_STATUS = 2 AND B.DOB < v_pastdate UNION SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, C.REFERRAL_ID, C.USER_CREATED, C.PROVIDER_USERID, C.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER, C.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, C.REFERRAL_STATUS, D.EMAIL, E.EMAIL AS PROVIDER_EMAIL FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER JOIN UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE C ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER D ON C.USER_CREATED = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER E ON C.PROVIDER_USERID = E.USER_ID WHERE C.REFERRAL_STATUS = 2 AND B.DOB < v_pastdate /* Exclued cases that were re-activated*/ --AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TT_BK_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE WHERE C.PRS_ID = PRS_ID) ; END SP_GET_HSPRS_OVER_18;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_HSPRS_TURNED_18
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_HSPRS_TURNED_18" ( PASTDATE DATE, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_pastdate DATE:= PASTDATE; BEGIN Open cur_Out For SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, C.REFERRAL_ID, C.USER_CREATED, C.PROVIDER_USERID, C.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER, C.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, C.REFERRAL_STATUS, D.EMAIL, E.EMAIL AS PROVIDER_EMAIL FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL C ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER D ON C.USER_CREATED = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER E ON C.PROVIDER_USERID = E.USER_ID WHERE C.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND B.DOB = v_pastdate UNION SELECT A.UAC_ID, A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, C.REFERRAL_ID, C.USER_CREATED, C.PROVIDER_USERID, C.FACILITY_CASE_MANAGER, C.ALTERNATIVE_EMAIL, C.REFERRAL_STATUS, D.EMAIL, E.EMAIL AS PROVIDER_EMAIL FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER JOIN UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE C ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER D ON C.USER_CREATED = D.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER E ON C.PROVIDER_USERID = E.USER_ID WHERE C.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 AND B.DOB = v_pastdate /* Exclued cases that were re-activated*/ -- AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TT_BK_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE WHERE C.PRS_ID = PRS_ID) ; END SP_GET_HSPRS_TURNED_18;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_INPROGRESS_CLE_ADDENDUM
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_INTAKES
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_INTAKES" ( v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, v_User_Type VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN If v_Search_Value = 'All' Then Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.AKA, A.DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, A.CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.SPECIFY_CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.REFERRING_OFFICE, A.NOTIFICATION_CITY, A.SPECIFY_NOT_CITY, A.NOTIFICATION_STATE, A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.PREGNANCY, A.INJURY, A.ILLNESS, A.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, A.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.UAC_STATUS, A.DATE_CREATED, A.USER_CREATED, A.UPTIME, A.UPUSER, A.GENDER, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, A.STATUS_ID, A.AGENCY_ID, A.MIDDLE_NAME, A.UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN, A.UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, A.UAC_ADDITIONAL_INFO, A.HC_OTHER, A.HC_ERGENT_CONDITION, A.UAC_FLAG, A.PROCESSING_POC, A.PROCESSING_EMAIL, A.PROCESSING_PHONE, A.DATE_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, A.KNOWN_GANG_AFFILIATION, A.NAME_OF_GANG, A.CITY_OF_APPREHENSION, A.STATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, A.STATE_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, A.DETENTION_TYPE_OF_FACILITY, A.FACILITY_NAME, A.FACILITY_PHONE, A.FACILITY_POC, A.FACILITY_FAX, A.FACILITY_ADMISSION_DATE, A.FACILITY_DISCHARGED_DATE, A.DATE_CANCELLED, A.CANCELLED_BY, A.REFERRAL_DATE, A.FAMILYGROUP, REVIEWED_BY_ORR, admin.role_type, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case When nvl(PREGNANCY,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End isPregnant, Case When nvl(UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, 0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End CRIMINALCHARGE, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, Case When nvl(A.REFERRING_OFFICE,0) > 0 And A.REFERRING_OFFICE <= 19 Then Case When nvl(A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, '') = '' Then B.Description Else B.Description || '/' || A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION End Else A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION End as R_OFFICE, Case When nvl(A.REFERRING_OFFICE, 0) > 19 Then 0 Else A.REFERRING_OFFICE End as "REFERRING_OFFICE",AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, --TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as DATE_OF_REFERRING, TO_CHAR(A.REFERRAL_DATE, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as REFERRAL_DATE , DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) as Pending_Hours, E.PROGRAM_NAME,A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED, CASE WHEN NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = -1 Then '' WHEN NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = 0 Then 'No' When NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = 1 Then 'Yes' End as FOOTGUIDE, A.REFERRAL_NOTES From UAC_INFO A Left join ADM_LIST_WEB_USER admin on a.USER_CREATED = admin.user_id Left Join (Select * from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE') D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join List_ICE_CBP B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where UAC_STATUS in ('PENDING', 'ENROUTE') order by A.UPTIME Desc ; Else Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.*, admin.role_type, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case When nvl(PREGNANCY,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End isPregnant, Case When nvl(UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, 0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End CRIMINALCHARGE, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, Case When nvl(A.REFERRING_OFFICE,0) > 0 And A.REFERRING_OFFICE <= 19 Then Case When nvl(A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, '') = '' Then B.Description Else B.Description || '/' || A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION End Else A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION End as R_OFFICE, Case When nvl(A.REFERRING_OFFICE, 0) > 19 Then 0 Else A.REFERRING_OFFICE End as "REFERRING_OFFICE",AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, --TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as DATE_OF_REFERRING, DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) as Pending_Hours, TO_CHAR(A.REFERRAL_DATE, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as REFERRAL_DATE, E.PROGRAM_NAME,A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED, CASE WHEN NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = -1 Then '' WHEN NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = 0 Then 'No' When NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = 1 Then 'Yes' End as FOOTGUIDE From UAC_INFO A Left join ADM_LIST_WEB_USER admin on A.USER_CREATED = admin.user_id Left Join (Select * from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE') D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join List_ICE_CBP B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where A.UAC_ID = v_Search_Value order by A.UPTIME Desc ;
End If; /* if v_Search_Value = 'All' then If v_User_Type = 'CBP' Then Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.*, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case When nvl(PREGNANCY,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End isPregnant, Case When nvl(UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, 0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End CRIMINALCHARGE, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, B.Description as R_OFFICE, A.REFERRING_OFFICE,AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as DATE_OF_REFERRING , DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) as Pending_Hours From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select * From List_ICE_CBP Where ICE_CBP_TYPE = 'CBP') B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where UAC_STATUS in ('PENDING', 'ENROUTE') order by A.UPTIME Desc ; Elsif v_User_Type = 'ICE' Then Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.*, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case When nvl(PREGNANCY,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End isPregnant, Case When nvl(UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, 0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End CRIMINALCHARGE, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, B.Description as R_OFFICE, A.REFERRING_OFFICE, AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as DATE_OF_REFERRING , DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) as Pending_Hours From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select * From List_ICE_CBP Where ICE_CBP_TYPE = 'ICE') B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where UAC_STATUS in ('PENDING', 'ENROUTE') order by A.UPTIME Desc; Else Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.*, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case When nvl(PREGNANCY,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End isPregnant, Case When nvl(UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, 0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End CRIMINALCHARGE, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, B.OFFICE_NAME as R_OFFICE, A.REFERRING_OFFICE,AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE , D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as DATE_OF_REFERRING , DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) as Pending_Hours From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join List_referring_Field_Offices B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.OFFICE_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where UAC_STATUS in ('PENDING', 'ENROUTE') order by A.UPTIME Desc; End If; else If v_User_Type = 'CBP' Then Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.*, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, B.Description as R_OFFICE, A.REFERRING_OFFICE,AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select * From List_ICE_CBP Where ICE_CBP_TYPE = 'CBP') B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where A.UAC_ID = v_Search_Value Order by A.Uptime Desc; Elsif v_User_Type = 'ICE' Then Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.*, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, B.Description as R_OFFICE, A.REFERRING_OFFICE,AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select * From List_ICE_CBP Where ICE_CBP_TYPE = 'ICE') B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where A.UAC_ID = v_Search_Value Order by A.UPTIME DESC; Else Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.*, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", CASE nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, B.Description as R_OFFICE, A.REFERRING_OFFICE,AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join (Select * From List_ICE_CBP Where ICE_CBP_TYPE = 'CBP') B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where A.UAC_ID = v_Search_Value Order By A.UPTIME Desc; End If; end if; */ END SP_GET_INTAKES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_INTAKES_MAIN
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_INTAKES_MAIN" ( v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, v_User_Type VARCHAR2, v_Page_Number Number := 1, v_Age Number := null, v_Gender VARCHAR2 := null, V_REFERRING_OFFICE Number := null, v_Health Number := null, v_REFEERAL_DATE Date := null, v_PENDING_HOURS Number := null, v_DATE_ORR_APPROVED Date := null, v_Alien_NO VARCHAR2 := null, v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID Number := null, v_PROGRAM_ID Number := null, CUR_OUT1 OUT SYS_REFCURSOR, CUR_OUT2 OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_PageSize Number; BEGIN SELECT to_number(PARAM_VALUE) into v_PageSize from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS where PARAM_NAME = 'IntakesPageSize'; Open CUR_OUT1 For Select * FROM ( Select rownum as line_number, z.* FROM ( Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.AKA, A.DOB, A.COB, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY, A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, A.CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.SPECIFY_CITY_OF_ENTRY, A.STATE_OF_ENTRY, A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.REFERRING_OFFICE, A.NOTIFICATION_CITY, A.SPECIFY_NOT_CITY, A.NOTIFICATION_STATE, A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.TIME_ORR_NOTIFIED, A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED, A.TIME_ORR_APPROVED, A.PREGNANCY, A.INJURY, A.ILLNESS, A.BEHAVIOR_WO_MEDICATION, A.BEHAVIOR_W_MEDICATION, A.IMMIGRATION_STATUS, A.REFERRING_AGENCY, A.UAC_STATUS, A.DATE_CREATED, A.USER_CREATED, A.UPTIME, A.UPUSER, A.GENDER, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, A.STATUS_ID, A.AGENCY_ID, A.MIDDLE_NAME, A.UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN, A.UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, A.UAC_ADDITIONAL_INFO, A.HC_OTHER, A.HC_ERGENT_CONDITION, A.UAC_FLAG, A.PROCESSING_POC, A.PROCESSING_EMAIL, A.PROCESSING_PHONE, A.DATE_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, A.KNOWN_GANG_AFFILIATION, A.NAME_OF_GANG, A.CITY_OF_APPREHENSION, A.STATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, A.STATE_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, A.DETENTION_TYPE_OF_FACILITY, A.FACILITY_NAME, A.FACILITY_PHONE, A.FACILITY_POC, A.FACILITY_FAX, A.FACILITY_ADMISSION_DATE, A.FACILITY_DISCHARGED_DATE, A.DATE_CANCELLED, A.CANCELLED_BY, A.REFERRAL_DATE, A.FAMILYGROUP, REVIEWED_BY_ORR, admin.role_type, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER_", CASE nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) When 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End Health, Case When nvl(PREGNANCY,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End isPregnant, Case When nvl(UAC_CRIMINAL_CHARGE, 0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End CRIMINALCHARGE, Case (Select Count(*) From UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO Where UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And APPREHENSION_TYPE='APPREHENSION') When 0 Then 'No' Else 'Yes' End as Appr, Case When nvl(A.REFERRING_OFFICE,0) > 0 And A.REFERRING_OFFICE <= 19 Then Case When nvl(A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION, '') = '' Then B.Description Else B.Description || '/' || A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION End Else A.CITY_OF_CURRENT_LOCATION End as R_OFFICE, Case When nvl(A.REFERRING_OFFICE, 0) > 19 Then 0 Else A.REFERRING_OFFICE End as "REFERRING_OFFICE_",AGENCY as R_AGENCY, A.DATE_CREATED as REFERRING_DATE, D.PROGRAM_ID, E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, --TO_CHAR(A.DATE_CREATED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as DATE_OF_REFERRING, TO_CHAR(A.REFERRAL_DATE, 'mm/dd/yyyy') as REFERRAL_DATE_ , DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) as Pending_Hours, E.PROGRAM_NAME, CASE WHEN NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = -1 Then '' WHEN NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = 0 Then 'No' When NVL(A.FOOT_GUIDE, -1) = 1 Then 'Yes' End as FOOTGUIDE From UAC_INFO A Left join ADM_LIST_WEB_USER admin on a.USER_CREATED = admin.user_id Left Join (Select * from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE') D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Left Join List_ICE_CBP B On A.REFERRING_OFFICE = B.ICE_CBP_ID Left Join List_Referring_Agency C on A.REFERRING_AGENCY = C.AGENCY_ID Where UAC_STATUS = v_Search_Value AND (v_Age is null OR (v_Age = 1 AND (Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) < 13)) OR (v_Age = 2 AND (Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) > 12 AND Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) < 18)) ) AND (v_Gender is null OR UPPER(A.GENDER) = UPPER(v_Gender)) AND (V_REFERRING_OFFICE is null OR A.REFERRING_OFFICE = V_REFERRING_OFFICE) AND (v_Health is null OR nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) = v_Health) AND (v_REFEERAL_DATE is null OR (DateDiff('day', A.REFERRAL_DATE, v_REFEERAL_DATE) = 0 and To_Char(A.REFERRAL_DATE, 'HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Char(v_REFEERAL_DATE, 'HH:mi:ss AM'))) AND (v_DATE_ORR_APPROVED is null OR (DateDiff('day', A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED, v_DATE_ORR_APPROVED) = 0 and To_Char(A.REFERRAL_DATE, 'HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Char(v_DATE_ORR_APPROVED, 'HH:mi:ss AM'))) AND (v_PENDING_HOURS is null Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 1 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) < 25 ) Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 2 AND (DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) > 24 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) < 49)) Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 3 AND (DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) > 48 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) < 73)) Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 4 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) > 72 ) ) AND (v_Alien_NO is null Or UPPER(A.ALIEN_NO) LIKE UPPER('%' || v_Alien_NO || '%')) AND (v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID is null Or E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID) AND (v_PROGRAM_ID is null Or D.PROGRAM_ID = v_PROGRAM_ID) order by A.REFERRAL_DATE Desc ) z ) Where line_number Between Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + 1 Else 1 End and Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + v_PageSize Else v_PageSize End order by line_number ; OPEN CUR_OUT2 For Select Count(*) as v_count from UAC_INFO A Left Join (Select * from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where CURRENT_STATUS = 'ENROUTE') D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left Join LIST_PROGRAMS E On D.PROGRAM_ID = E.PROGRAM_ID Where UAC_STATUS = v_Search_Value AND (v_Age is null OR (v_Age = 1 AND (Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) < 13)) OR (v_Age = 2 AND (Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) > 12 AND Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) < 18)) ) AND (v_Gender is null OR UPPER(A.GENDER) = UPPER(v_Gender)) AND (V_REFERRING_OFFICE is null OR A.REFERRING_OFFICE = V_REFERRING_OFFICE) AND (v_Health is null OR nvl(UAC_HEALTH_CONCERN,0) = v_Health) AND (v_REFEERAL_DATE is null OR (DateDiff('day', A.REFERRAL_DATE, v_REFEERAL_DATE) = 0 and To_Char(A.REFERRAL_DATE, 'HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Char(v_REFEERAL_DATE, 'HH:mi:ss AM'))) AND (v_DATE_ORR_APPROVED is null OR (DateDiff('day', A.DATE_ORR_APPROVED, v_DATE_ORR_APPROVED) = 0 and To_Char(A.REFERRAL_DATE, 'HH:mi:ss AM') = To_Char(v_DATE_ORR_APPROVED, 'HH:mi:ss AM'))) AND (v_PENDING_HOURS is null Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 1 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) < 25 ) Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 2 AND (DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) > 24 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) < 49)) Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 3 AND (DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) > 48 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) < 73)) Or (v_PENDING_HOURS = 4 AND DateDiff('hour', A.DATE_CREATED, sysdate) > 72 ) ) AND (v_Alien_NO is null Or UPPER(A.ALIEN_NO) LIKE UPPER('%' || v_Alien_NO || '%')) AND (v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID is null Or E.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID) AND (v_PROGRAM_ID is null Or D.PROGRAM_ID = v_PROGRAM_ID) ;
END SP_GET_INTAKES_MAIN;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_INTAKE_CHECKBOXES
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_ISP_CERTIFICATE
