routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_ISP_CERTIFICATE" ( vUserId IN VARCHAR2 , ispId IN NUMBER , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_OUT FOR Select PrintName, SignDate From( Select FIRST_NAME || ' ' || LAST_NAME as PrintName, Trunc(SysDate) as SignDate from ADM_LIST_WEB_USER Where User_ID = vUserId Union Select FIRST_NAME || ' ' || LAST_NAME as PrintName, TRUNC(A.UPTIME) as SignDate From UAC_ISP_CERTIFICATE A Inner Join ADM_LIST_WEB_USER B on B.User_ID = A.UPUSER Where A.SERVICE_PLAN_ID = ispId ) Order by SignDate Desc; END SP_GET_ISP_CERTIFICATE;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_LIRS_USCCB_COUNT
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MAX_RELEASE_ID
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_MAX_RELEASE_ID" ( vUAC_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacId_ NUMBER(10,0) := vUAC_ID; BEGIN Open cur_Out For SELECT MAX(RELEASE_ID) as MAX_RELEASE_ID FROM UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI ON RR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID WHERE RR.ORR_DECISION IN (7,8,9) AND (RR.ISDELETED = 0 OR RR.ISDELETED is null) AND UPI.UAC_ID = uacId_; END SP_GET_MAX_RELEASE_ID;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_DIAGNOSES
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_MEDICAL_DIAGNOSES" ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For select A.VISIT_ID, A.DIAGNOSIS_ID, B.DIAGNOSIS, C.DATE_OF_VISIT FROM UAC_MEDICAL_VISIT_DIAGNOSIS A inner join LIST_DOC_DIAGNOSIS B on A.DIAGNOSIS_ID=B.DIAGNOSIS_ID inner join UAC_MEDICAL_VISIT C on C.VISIT_ID=A.VISIT_ID where UAC_PROGRAM_ID=v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID order by C.DATE_OF_VISIT desc ; END SP_GET_MEDICAL_DIAGNOSES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_IMMUNIZATION
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_SCREEN
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_MEDICAL_SCREEN" ( v_SCREENING_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.UAC_ID, A.UAC_FAST_STATUS, C.PROGRAM_ID, C.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID, D.PROGRAM_TYPE, A.DATE_CREATED as DATE_INITIAL_PLACEMENT, D.PROGRAM_TYPE, C.PROGRAM_NAME,B.PROGRAM_ID, M.SCREENING_ID, M.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE,M.PREGNANCY,M.MEDICAL_EXAMINER_NAME, M.DENTAL_EXAM_DATE, M.TST_DATE_APPLIED, M.TST_RESULT, M.SPECITY_IF_NAGATIVE, M.IGRA_DATE_DRAWN, M.IGRA_TYPE, M.IGRA_RESULT, M.DATE_XRAY, M.XRAY_FINDINGS, M.XRAY_SCPECIFY_IF_ABNORMAL, M.SUGGESTIVE_TB, M.SMEARS_RESULT, M.NUCLEICACID_RESULT, M.CALTURES_RESULTS, M.DRUG_SUSCEPTIBILITY_RESUTL, M.SUSCEP_CPECIFY_IF_OTHER, M.COMMUNICABLE_DISEASE_ID, M.COMM_DISEASE_CPECIFY_IF_OTHER,M.INTAKES_INTERRUPTED,M.RELEASE_DELAYED, M.QUARANTINE,NUMBER_OF_UAC_QUARANTINED,M.LTBI_TREATMENT_STARTED,M."3MONTHS_REHINMENT", M.DISEASE_CLASSIFICATION_ID From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B Inner join UAC_INFO A On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner join UAC_MEDICAL_SCREENING M on B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID=M.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Inner join LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE D on C.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID Where M.SCREENING_ID = v_SCREENING_ID ; END SP_GET_MEDICAL_SCREEN;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_SCREENS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_MEDICAL_SCREENS" ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select distinct SCREENING_ID, MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE From UAC_MEDICAL_SCREENING Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID =v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID order by MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE; END SP_GET_MEDICAL_SCREENS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_VISIT
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_VISITS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_MEDICAL_VISITS ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, v_VISIT_TYPE VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select VISIT_ID, DATE_OF_VISIT From UAC_MEDICAL_VISIT Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND ( VISIT_ID in (select VISIT_ID from UAC_MEDICAL_VISIT_DIAGNOSIS where DIAGNOSIS_ID in (select DIAGNOSIS_ID from LIST_DOC_DIAGNOSIS where VISIT_PURPOSE= v_VISIT_TYPE)) or VISIT_ID in (select VISIT_ID from UAC_MEDICAL_VISIT_REASON where VISIT_REASON_ID in (select VISIT_REASON_ID from LIST_DOC_VISIT_REASON where VISIT_PURPOSE= v_VISIT_TYPE)) or VISIT_ID in (select VISIT_ID from UAC_MEDICAL_VISIT_TYPE where VISIT_TYPE_ID in (select VISIT_TYPE_ID from LIST_DOC_VISIT_TYPE where VISIT_PURPOSE= v_VISIT_TYPE)) ) And UAC_PROGRAM_ID in (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID from UAC_MEDICAL_SCREENING Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID And NVL(ISDELETED,0) = 0); --Select VISIT_ID, DATE_OF_VISIT From UAC_MEDICAL_VISIT Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID --ORDER BY DATE_OF_VISIT DESC ; END SP_GET_MEDICAL_VISITS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_VISIT_DIAGNOSIS
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_VISIT_REASON
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICAL_VISIT_TYPE
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICATIONS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_MEDICATIONS" ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select MEDICATION_ID, MEDICATION_NAME || ' -- ' || DRUG_DATE MEDICATION_NAME From UAC_MEDICATION_INFO Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID ORDER BY MEDICATION_NAME, DRUG_DATE DESC ; END SP_GET_MEDICATIONS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MEDICATION_INFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_MEDICATION_INFO" ( v_MEDICATION_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select * From UAC_MEDICATION_INFO Where MEDICATION_ID = v_MEDICATION_ID ; END SP_GET_MEDICATION_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MED_SCREENING_NOTE
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_MED_SCREENING_NOTES
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_MED_SCREENING_NOTES" ( v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select SCREEINING_NOTE_ID, ATTACHEMENT_FILE_NAME From UAC_MEDICAL_SCREENING_NOTES Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID ORDER BY ATTACHEMENT_FILE_NAME ; END SP_GET_MED_SCREENING_NOTES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_NEW_EVENT_SIR
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_NEW_EVENT_SIR" ( vEventID IN NUMBER, vType varchar2,
vUACPROGID in Number, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if vType = 'ORIGINAL' then OPEN cur_Out For Select * from uac_sir_new Where Event_id = vEventID and uac_program_id = vUACPROGID and ADDENDUM_ID is null; else OPEN cur_Out For Select * from uac_sir_new Where Event_id = vEventID and uac_program_id = vUACPROGID and ADDENDUM_ID = 1 and rownum = 1 order by DATE_CREATED Desc; End if; END SP_GET_NEW_EVENT_SIR;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_NEW_SIRID
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_ORIGINAL_SIRID
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_ORR_DECISION_HISTORY
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_ORR_DECISION_HISTORY" ( vRELEASE_ID NUMBER, cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS
BEGIN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT A.ORR_DECISION_HST_ID, A.RELEASE_ID, A.UPTIME, F.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || F.LAST_NAME as UPUSER, B.ORR_DECISION_ID, B.ORR_DECISION, C.DECISION_ID as ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS_ID, C.DECISION_AFTER_HS, D.HOMESTUDY_STATUS_ID, D.HOMESTUDY_STATUS, E.REMAND_REASON_ID, E.REMAND_REASON FROM ORR_DECISION_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN LIST_ORR_DECISION B On A.ORR_DECISION = B.ORR_DECISION_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DECISION_AFTER_HS C ON A.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = C.DECISION_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_STATUS D ON A.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS = D.HOMESTUDY_STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_REMAND_REASON E ON A.REMAND_REASON = E.REMAND_REASON_ID LEFT JOIN ADM_LIST_WEB_USER F ON UPPER(A.UPUSER) = UPPER(F.USER_ID) WHERE A.RELEASE_ID = vRELEASE_ID ORDER BY A.UPTIME DESC, A.ORR_DECISION_HST_ID DESC; END SP_GET_ORR_DECISION_HISTORY;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_OTHER_SPONSORS_ADDRESSES
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_GET_OTHER_SPONSORS_ADDRESSES ( vSponsorId IN NUMBER, -- Input: Sponsor ID v_Page_Number IN NUMBER := 1, -- Input: Page number (default is 1) CUR_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR -- Output: Ref Cursor for the result set ) AS v_PageSize NUMBER; -- Variable to store page size
BEGIN -- Retrieve the page size from the application parameters SELECT TO_NUMBER(PARAM_VALUE) INTO v_PageSize FROM UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE PARAM_NAME = 'OTHER_SPONSORS_ADDR_PAGE_SIZE';
-- Open the cursor to fetch the sponsor addresses based on the page number and page size OPEN CUR_OUT FOR SELECT * FROM ( SELECT z.*, -- Select all fields from the inner query rownum AS line_number, -- Add a row number for pagination COUNT(*) OVER () AS V_COUNT -- Total count of records for pagination FROM ( -- Main query to get sponsor address information SELECT B.SPONSOR_ID, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME, (C.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || C.LAST_NAME) AS FULL_NAME, B.UAC_ID, B.ADDRESS || ' ' || ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, B.CITY, B.STATE, B.ZIP_CODE, TRIM(B.ADDRESS || ' ' || ADDRESS_SECONDARY) || ', ' || B.CITY || ', ' || B.STATE || ' ' || B.ZIP_CODE AS FULL_ADDRESS, R.RELATIONSHIP, H.HOUSEHOLD_COUNT, TO_CHAR(D.DATE_CREATED, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS SPONSORSHIP_DATE,
-- Determine the flag status of the sponsor CASE WHEN C.FLAG = 1 OR C.FLAG_ADDRESS = 1 THEN 'Flag' WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SponsorFlag SF WHERE SF.SPONSORID = C.SPONSOR_ID ) THEN 'Flag' ELSE 'No Flags' END AS SPONSOR_FLAG,
-- Determine sponsorship type CASE WHEN UI.UAC_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' AND UPE.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = 3 THEN 'Actual Sponsorship' ELSE 'Potential Sponsorship' END AS SPONSORSHIP_TYPE FROM ( -- Subquery to fetch other sponsors who share the same addresses SELECT SPONSOR_ID, NULL AS UAC_ID, TRIM(ADDRESS || ' ' || ADDRESS_SECONDARY) AS ADDRESS, CITY, STATE, ZIP_CODE FROM SPONSOR_INFO WHERE IS_DELETED = 0
UNION
SELECT SPONSOR_ID, UAC_ID, TRIM(CONCAT(CONCAT(SPONSOR_ADDRESS, ' '), SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY)) AS ADDRESS, SPONSOR_CITY AS CITY, SPONSOR_STATE AS STATE, SPONSOR_ZIPCODE AS ZIP_CODE FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 ) B INNER JOIN SPONSOR_INFO C ON B.SPONSOR_ID = C.SPONSOR_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST D ON B.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID AND B.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP R ON R.RELATIONSHIP_ID = D.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC LEFT JOIN ( -- Subquery to get household occupant count SELECT SPONSOR_ID, UAC_ID, COUNT(*) AS HOUSEHOLD_COUNT FROM SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS GROUP BY SPONSOR_ID, UAC_ID ) H ON H.SPONSOR_ID = D.SPONSOR_ID AND H.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_INFO UI ON D.UAC_ID = UI.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI ON D.UAC_ID = UPI.UAC_ID AND UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = ( SELECT MAX(UPI1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI1 WHERE D.UAC_ID = UPI1.UAC_ID ) LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT UPE ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPE.UAC_PROGRAM_ID
WHERE EXISTS ( -- Subquery to match the addresses of other sponsors SELECT 1 FROM ( -- Get all addresses for the specified sponsor SELECT TRIM(ADDRESS || ' ' || ADDRESS_SECONDARY) AS ADDRESS, CITY, STATE, ZIP_CODE FROM SPONSOR_INFO WHERE SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId AND IS_DELETED = 0 UNION SELECT TRIM(CONCAT(CONCAT(SPONSOR_ADDRESS, ' '), SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY)) AS ADDRESS, SPONSOR_CITY AS CITY, SPONSOR_STATE AS STATE, SPONSOR_ZIPCODE AS ZIP_CODE FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST WHERE SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId AND IS_DELETED = 0 ) A WHERE TRIM(UPPER(B.ADDRESS)) = TRIM(UPPER(A.ADDRESS)) AND TRIM(UPPER(B.CITY)) = TRIM(UPPER(A.CITY)) AND TRIM(UPPER(NVL(B.STATE, 'xxx'))) = TRIM(UPPER(NVL(A.STATE, 'xxx'))) AND TRIM(UPPER(B.ZIP_CODE)) = TRIM(UPPER(A.ZIP_CODE)) AND B.SPONSOR_ID <> vSponsorId -- Exclude the specified sponsor ) ) Z ) WHERE line_number BETWEEN CASE WHEN v_Page_Number > 1 THEN ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + 1 ELSE 1 END AND CASE WHEN v_Page_Number > 1 THEN ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + v_PageSize ELSE v_PageSize END ORDER BY line_number; -- Order by line number for pagination END SP_GET_OTHER_SPONSORS_ADDRESSES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_OTHER_SPONSORS_FLAGS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_OTHER_SPONSORS_FLAGS ( vSponsorId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_PageSize Number; BEGIN OPEN cur_Out For SELECT A.SPONSOR_ID, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME ,A.FLAG ,A.FLAG_NOTE ,A.FLAG_ADDRESS ,A.FLAG_ADDRESS_NOTE FROM SPONSOR_INFO A WHERE A.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId and is_deleted = 0; END SP_GET_OTHER_SPONSORS_FLAGS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROGRAMS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_PROGRAMS" ( v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID number, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = 0 then Open cur_Out For select p.PROGRAM_ID, p.PROGRAM_NAME, p.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID from LIST_PROGRAMS p Where IsActive = 1 order by PROGRAM_NAME ; else Open cur_Out For select p.PROGRAM_ID, p.PROGRAM_NAME, p.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID from LIST_PROGRAMS p where PROGRAM_TYPE_ID=v_PROGRAM_TYPE_ID And IsActive = 1 order by PROGRAM_NAME ; end if;
END SP_GET_PROGRAMS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROGRAMS_BYUSER
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_PROGRAMS_BYUSER" ( v_userId VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For select A.PROGRAM_ID, A.PROGRAM_NAME from LIST_PROGRAMS A Inner Join ADM_USER_PROGRAM B On A.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID Where A.IsActive = 1 And B.USER_ID = v_userId order by PROGRAM_NAME ; END SP_GET_PROGRAMS_BYUSER;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROGRAM_ADDRESS
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROGRAM_BYUSER_EXISTS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_PROGRAM_BYUSER_EXISTS" ( v_userId VARCHAR2, v_UACProgramID varchar2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS counter NUMBER; BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select Count(AUP.Program_ID) Counter into counter from adm_user_program AUP join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO LP on lp.program_id = aup.program_id where lp.uac_program_id = TO_NUMBER(v_UACProgramID) and aup.user_id = v_userId;
END SP_GET_PROGRAM_BYUSER_EXISTS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROGRAM_HIST
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENT
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENT" ( v_EVENT_ID VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN If v_EVENT_ID <> '-1' Then Open cur_Out For SELECT a.EVENT_ID, a.DATE_EVENT, a.TIME_EVENT, a.PROGRAM_ID, a.CATEGORY_EVENT, a.SUB_CATEGORY, a.SPECIFY_CATEGORY, a.SYNOPSIS, a.LOCATION_OF_INCIDENT, a.SPECIFY_LOCATION, a.DESCRIPTION, a.IS_INJURED, a.SPECIFY_INJURED, a.INTERNAL_INVESTIGATION, a.DATE_INVESTIGATION, a.RESULT_INTERNAL_INVESTIGATION, a.IS_EVACUATED, a.SPECIFY_EVACUATED, a.STAFF_RESPONSE, a.FOLLOW_UP, a.STATE_LICENSING, a.DATE_STATE_REPORT, a.TIME_STATE_REPORT, a.STATE_INCIDENT_INVESTIGATED, a.DATE_STATE_INVESTIGATION, a.STATE_CASE_NUMBER, a.SPECIFY_STATE_INVESTIGATION, a.RESULTS_STATE_INVESTIGATION, a.LAW_ENFORCEMENT, a.DATE_LAW_REPORT, a.TIME_LAW_REPORT, a.LAW_INCIDENT_INVESTIGATED, a.DATE_LAW_INVESTIGATION, a.LAW_CASE_NUMBER, a.SPECIFY_LAW_INVESTIGATION, a.RESULTS_LAW_INVESTIGATION, b.PROGRAM_NAME FROM PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENTS_INFO a left join list_programs b on b.PROGRAM_ID = a.PROGRAM_ID WHERE EVENT_ID=v_EVENT_ID; END IF;
END SP_GET_PROGRAM_LEVEL_EVENT;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROGRAM_LIST
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_PROGRAM_LIST" ( isActive IN NUMBER, v_USER_ID IN VARCHAR2, cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS isActive_ NUMBER(1) := isActive; vUserRole VARCHAR2(50); BEGIN
Select ROLE_TYPE into vUserRole From ADM_LIST_WEB_USER Where USER_ID = v_USER_ID; IF (vUserRole = 'HQ' or vUserRole <> 'Program') THEN Open CUR_OUT for select PROGRAM_ID, PROGRAM_NAME FROM LIST_PROGRAMS WHERE ISACTIVE=isActive_ order by PROGRAM_NAME; ELSIF(vUserRole = 'Program') THEN Open CUR_OUT for select L.PROGRAM_ID,L.PROGRAM_NAME FROM LIST_PROGRAMS L JOIN ADM_USER_PROGRAM U ON L.PROGRAM_ID=U.PROGRAM_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = v_USER_ID AND L.ISACTIVE=isActive_ order by L.PROGRAM_NAME; End if; END SP_GET_PROGRAM_LIST;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROOF_OF_RELATIONSHIP_LIST
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_PROVIDER_EMAIL
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_PROVIDER_EMAIL" ( v_PROVIDER IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN IF v_PROVIDER ='All' then Open cur_Out For select A.USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, B.PROGRAM_ID, USER_PRIVELEGE,ROLE_TYPE, C.PROGRAM_NAME from ADM_LIST_WEB_USER A inner join ADM_USER_PROGRAM B on A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C ON C.PROGRAM_ID=B.PROGRAM_ID order by LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME; else Open cur_Out For select A.*, '' PROGRAM_NAME from ADM_LIST_WEB_USER A where A.Provider=v_PROVIDER order by LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME; end if; END SP_GET_PROVIDER_EMAIL;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_RR_ORR_DECISION
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_RR_ORR_DECISION" ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT B.ORR_DECISION_ID, B.ORR_DECISION, A.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS, CASE WHEN A.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = 1 THEN 'Approve with Post-Release Services' WHEN A.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = 2 THEN 'Approve with Post-Release Services Pending Completion of Conditions' WHEN A.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = 3 THEN 'Remand' WHEN A.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = 4 THEN 'Deny Release' WHEN A.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = 5 THEN 'Approve with post release services - TVPRA' ELSE '' END AS ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HOMESTUDY, A.ORR_UPTIME FROM UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST A LEFT JOIN LIST_ORR_DECISION B On A.ORR_DECISION = B.ORR_DECISION_ID WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT UAC_PROGRAM_ID, MAX(RELEASE_ID) as MAX_RR_ID FROM UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST WHERE (ISDELETED = 0 OR ISDELETED is null) AND UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ GROUP BY UAC_PROGRAM_ID ) D WHERE A.RELEASE_ID = D.MAX_RR_ID); END SP_GET_RR_ORR_DECISION;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SEQ_VALUE
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SIRS_BY_EVENTID
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_SIRS_BY_EVENTID ( vEVENT_ID number, vUSER_ID VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if vUSER_ID = 'HQ' Then OPEN cur_Out for select T1.SIR_ID, T1.UAC_SIR_ID,T1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, T3.ALIEN_NO, T3.LAST_NAME, T3.FIRST_NAME, T3.DOB, T3.COB, T4.PROGRAM_NAME, T1.ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE, T1.EVENT_TYPE, T1.EVENT_ID , T5.SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID, t6.DATE_CREATED as DATE_OF_EVENT ,(select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE T1.EVENT_ID = EVENT_ID AND NVL(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = 0 AND ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE = 'Sexual Abuse or Sexual Harassment') NUM_SEXABUSE from UAC_SIR_NEW T1 INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO T2 ON T1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = T2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN UAC_INFO T3 ON T2.UAC_ID = T3.UAC_ID INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T4 ON T2.PROGRAM_ID = T4.PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN UAC_SIR_EVENT T6 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T6.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SIR_FOLLOWUP_RPT T5 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T5.EVENT_ID WHERE T1.EVENT_ID = vEVENT_ID AND T1.ADDENDUM_ID IS NULL; Else OPEN cur_Out for select T1.SIR_ID, T1.UAC_SIR_ID, T1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, T3.ALIEN_NO, T3.LAST_NAME, T3.FIRST_NAME, T3.DOB, T3.COB, T4.PROGRAM_NAME, T1.ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE, T1.EVENT_TYPE, T1.EVENT_ID , T5.SIR_FOLLOWUP_REPORT_ID, t6.DATE_CREATED as DATE_OF_EVENT ,(select count(*) from UAC_SIR_NEW WHERE T1.EVENT_ID = EVENT_ID AND NVL(ADDENDUM_ID, 0) = 0 AND ABUSE_NEGLECT_TYPE = 'Sexual Abuse or Sexual Harassment') NUM_SEXABUSE from UAC_SIR_NEW T1 INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO T2 ON T1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = T2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN UAC_INFO T3 ON T2.UAC_ID = T3.UAC_ID INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS T4 ON T2.PROGRAM_ID = T4.PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN ADM_USER_PROGRAM T6 ON T6.PROGRAM_ID = T2.PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN UAC_SIR_EVENT T6 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T6.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_SIR_FOLLOWUP_RPT T5 ON T1.EVENT_ID = T5.EVENT_ID WHERE T1.EVENT_ID = vEVENT_ID AND T1.ADDENDUM_ID IS NULL AND T6.USER_ID = vUSER_ID; End If; END SP_GET_SIRS_BY_EVENTID;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SIR_DOCLIST_BY_EVENT
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SOUTHWEST_BORDER_SUMMARY
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_ADDRESSES
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_SPONSOR_ADDRESSES ( vSponsorId IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT 'Sponsorship' AS ADDRESS_TYPE, A.SPONSOR_ID, A.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || A.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, A.SPONSOR_CITY AS CITY, A.SPONSOR_STATE AS STATE, A.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE AS ZIP_CODE, A.SPONSOR_CITY || ', ' || A.SPONSOR_STATE || ' ' || A.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE AS CITY_STATE_ZIP, A.DATE_CREATED, B.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || B.LAST_NAME AS UAC_SPONSORED_AT_ADDR, B.ALIEN_NO, B.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || B.LAST_NAME || ' (A# ' || B.ALIEN_NO || ')' AS CHILD_SPONSORED_AT_ADDR, UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_ID FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT UPI1.UAC_ID, UPI1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI1 WHERE (UPI1.UAC_ID, UPI1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID) IN ( SELECT UAC_ID, MAX(UAC_PROGRAM_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO GROUP BY UAC_ID ) ) UPI ON A.UAC_ID = UPI.UAC_ID WHERE A.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId AND A.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY A.DATE_CREATED; END SP_GET_SPONSOR_ADDRESSES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_ASSESSMENT
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_CURRENT
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_SPONSOR_CURRENT" ( v_UAC_ID IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out For SELECT FIRST_NAME || ' ' || LAST_NAME as SPONSOR_NAME, A.SPONSOR_ID, CASE WHEN TO_DATE(B.DATE_CREATED, 'DD-MON-RR') <= (SELECT TO_DATE(PARAM_VALUE, 'DD-MON-RR') FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE PARAM_NAME = 'OLD_SPONSOR_FORM_DATE') OR B.DATE_CREATED IS NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS SHOW_OLD_SPONSOR_FORM FROM SPONSOR_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B ON A.SPONSOR_ID = B.SPONSOR_ID AND B.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 WHERE UAC_ID = v_UAC_ID; END SP_GET_SPONSOR_CURRENT;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_D
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_SPONSOR_D" ( sponsorId NUMBER, uac_Id NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS spId Number(10) := sponsorId; uacId_ NUMBER(10) := uac_Id; BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.DOB, D.Relationship, D.Sponsor_Category, B.SPONSOR_HOME_PHONE, B.SPONSOR_WORK_PHONE, CONCAT(CONCAT(B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, ' '), B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY) as SPONSOR_ADDRESS, B.SPONSOR_CITY, B.SPONSOR_STATE, B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, C.PHONE_TYPE, CASE WHEN TO_DATE(B.DATE_CREATED, 'DD-MON-RR') <= (SELECT TO_DATE(PARAM_VALUE, 'DD-MON-RR') FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE PARAM_NAME = 'OLD_SPONSOR_FORM_DATE') OR B.DATE_CREATED IS NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS SHOW_OLD_SPONSOR_FORM From SPONSOR_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.Sponsor_ID = B.Sponsor_ID and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 left join LIST_RELATIONSHIP D on B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC=D.RELATIONSHIP_ID left JOIN LIST_PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE C ON B.BACKUP_PHONE_TYPE = C.PHONE_TYPE_ID Where A.SPONSOR_ID = spId And B.UAC_ID = uacId_; END SP_GET_SPONSOR_D;
--GRANT EXECUTE ON "UACPORTAL"."SP_GET_SPONSOR_D" TO "UAC_VIEWER";

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_GET_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD ( vSponsorId IN NUMBER, v_Page_Number Number := 1, CUR_OUT1 OUT SYS_REFCURSOR, CUR_OUT2 OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_PageSize Number; BEGIN SELECT to_number(PARAM_VALUE) into v_PageSize from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS where PARAM_NAME = 'OTHER_SPONSORS_ADDR_PAGE_SIZE'; OPEN CUR_OUT1 For Select * FROM ( Select z.*, rownum as line_number FROM ( -- GET HHS Info SELECT HO.OCCUPANT_ID, HO.SPONSOR_ID, HO.UAC_ID, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME || ' ' || LAST_NAME As FULL_NAME, GENDER, AGE, DOB, (Select RELATIONSHIP From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = HO.RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR) as RELATIONSHIP, --Check FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME and DOB against SPONSOR_INFO to see if this HHO is a possible sponsor CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS SPNMATCH FROM SPONSOR_INFO WHERE TRIM(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) = TRIM(UPPER(HO.FIRST_NAME)) AND TRIM(UPPER(LAST_NAME)) = TRIM(UPPER(HO.LAST_NAME)) AND TO_DATE(DOB, 'DD-MON-RR') = TO_DATE(HO.DOB,'DD-MON-RR') ) > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS POSSIBLE_SPONSOR, --Check if this CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) as BGCHECK FROM SPONSOR_BACKGROUND_CHECK WHERE OCCUPANT_ID = HO.OCCUPANT_ID) > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS HAS_BGCHECK FROM SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS HO INNER JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST USL ON USL.SPONSOR_ID = HO.SPONSOR_ID AND USL.UAC_ID = HO.UAC_ID and usl.is_deleted = 0 WHERE HO.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId AND HO.ISDELETED = 0 )Z ) Where line_number Between Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + 1 Else 1 End and Case When v_Page_Number > 1 Then ((v_Page_Number - 1) * v_PageSize) + v_PageSize Else v_PageSize End order by line_number; OPEN CUR_OUT2 For Select Count(*) as v_count FROM SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS HO INNER JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST USL ON USL.SPONSOR_ID = HO.SPONSOR_ID AND USL.UAC_ID = HO.UAC_ID WHERE HO.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId AND HO.ISDELETED = 0;
END SP_GET_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_INFO
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_LIST
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROFILE_FLD_LOCK_COUNT
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROFILE_INFO
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROFILE_INFO ( vSponsorId IN NUMBER , cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS n Number(4) := 0; BEGIN select count(*) into n from UAC_SPONSOR_LIST Where SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId and is_deleted = 0;
If n > 0 Then OPEN cur_Out For SELECT A.*, B.CURRENT_SPONSOR, B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY as SPONSOR_ADDRESS, B.SPONSOR_CITY, B.SPONSOR_STATE, B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, B.SPONSOR_HOME_PHONE AS CURRENT_HOME_PHONE, B.SPONSOR_WORK_PHONE AS CURRENT_WORK_PHONE, B.SPONSOR_EMAIL AS CURRENT_EMAIL, B.PHONE_TYPE FROM SPONSOR_INFO A INNER JOIN ( Select z.*, P.PHONE_TYPE, rownum as line_number FROM (SELECT * FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A WHERE SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId and a.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY DATE_CREATED DESC, UPTIME DESC) Z LEFT JOIN LIST_PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE P ON Z.BACKUP_PHONE_TYPE = P.PHONE_TYPE_ID WHERE rownum = 1) B On A.SPONSOR_ID = B.SPONSOR_ID and a.is_deleted = 0 ; ELSE OPEN cur_Out For SELECT A.*, Null as CURRENT_SPONSOR, A.ADDRESS || ' ' || A.ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS SPONSOR_ADDRESS, A.CITY AS SPONSOR_CITY, A.STATE AS SPONSOR_STATE, A.ZIP_CODE AS SPONSOR_ZIPCODE, A.HOME_PHONE AS CURRENT_HOME_PHONE, A.WORK_PHONE AS CURRENT_WORK_PHONE, A.EMAIL AS CURRENT_EMAIL, null As PHONE_TYPE FROM SPONSOR_INFO A WHERE SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId and a.is_deleted = 0; END IF; END SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROFILE_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROFILE_LOCK_COUNT
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROGRAM_EXIT_DATE
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROGRAM_EXIT_DATE ( vUAC_Id IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT NVL2(( SELECT TO_CHAR(UAC_PROGRAM_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = vUAC_Id), ( SELECT CASE WHEN SYSDATE - DATE_OF_DISCHARGE > 3650 THEN 'Over 3650 days' ELSE 'Within 3650 days' END AS date_status FROM UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = vUAC_Id ), 'Within 3650 days') AS date_status FROM dual; END SP_GET_SPONSOR_PROGRAM_EXIT_DATE;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_UAC_LIST
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_GET_SPONSOR_UAC_LIST ( vSponsorId IN NUMBER , vCounterType IN CHAR , cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if vCounterType = 'P' Then OPEN cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UPTIME, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", B.SPONSOR_ID, Case When nvl(Current_Sponsor,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End As Current_Sponsor, (Select SPONSOR_CATEGORY From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as SPONSOR_CATEGORY, (Select RELATIONSHIP From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as RELATIONSHIP, A.UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_CREATED, B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_CITY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_STATE || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE as ADDRESS, B.QUERY_ID, A.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || A.LAST_NAME as FULL_NAME, LP.PROGRAM_NAME, LDT.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY as DISCHARGE_TYPE, UPE.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, ORRD.ORR_DECISION, C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID and b.Is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = ( SELECT MAX(D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D WHERE D.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID ) LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON C.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT UPE ON C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPE.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE LDT ON LDT.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID = UPE.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE LEFT JOIN UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR ON RR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND RR.RELEASE_ID = ( SELECT MAX(RR1.RELEASE_ID) FROM UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR1 WHERE RR1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND (RR1.ISDELETED = 0 OR RR1.ISDELETED is null) ) LEFT JOIN LIST_ORR_DECISION ORRD On RR.ORR_DECISION = ORRD.ORR_DECISION_ID Where B.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId order by A.UPTIME Desc ; Elsif vCounterType = 'A' Then OPEN cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB,A.UPTIME, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", B.SPONSOR_ID, Case When nvl(Current_Sponsor,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End As Current_Sponsor, (Select SPONSOR_CATEGORY From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as SPONSOR_CATEGORY, (Select RELATIONSHIP From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as RELATIONSHIP, A.UAC_STATUS, A.DATE_CREATED, B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_CITY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_STATE || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE as ADDRESS, B.QUERY_ID, A.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || A.LAST_NAME as FULL_NAME, LP.PROGRAM_NAME, LDT.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY as DISCHARGE_TYPE, UPE.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, ORRD.ORR_DECISION, C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID and b.Is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = ( SELECT MAX(D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D WHERE D.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID ) LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON C.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT UPE ON C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPE.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE LDT ON LDT.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID = UPE.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE LEFT JOIN UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR ON RR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND RR.RELEASE_ID = ( SELECT MAX(RR1.RELEASE_ID) FROM UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR1 WHERE RR1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND (RR1.ISDELETED = 0 OR RR1.ISDELETED is null) ) LEFT JOIN LIST_ORR_DECISION ORRD On RR.ORR_DECISION = ORRD.ORR_DECISION_ID Where B.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId And B.Current_Sponsor = 1 AND A.UAC_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' And Exists (Select 1 from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT E On D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where D.UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And D.CURRENT_STATUS = A.UAC_STATUS And E.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = 3) order by A.UPTIME Desc ; Else OPEN cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB,A.UPTIME, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", SPONSOR_ID, Case When nvl(Current_Sponsor,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End As Current_Sponsor, (Select SPONSOR_CATEGORY From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as SPONSOR_CATEGORY, (Select RELATIONSHIP From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as RELATIONSHIP, A.UAC_STATUS From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID and b.is_deleted = 0 Where B.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId order by A.UPTIME Desc ; End If; END SP_GET_SPONSOR_UAC_LIST;
--GRANT EXECUTE ON "UACPORTAL"."SP_GET_SPONSOR_UAC_LIST" TO "UAC_VIEWER";

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SPONSOR_UAC_LIST_SPONSOR_SEARCH
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_SPONSOR_UAC_LIST_SPONSOR_SEARCH ( vSponsorId IN NUMBER , vCounterType IN CHAR , cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if vCounterType = 'P' Then OPEN cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UPTIME, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", B.SPONSOR_ID, Case When nvl(Current_Sponsor,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End As Current_Sponsor, (Select SPONSOR_CATEGORY || NVL(SPONSOR_SUB_CATEGORY,'') From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as SPONSOR_CATEGORY, (Select RELATIONSHIP From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as RELATIONSHIP, A.UAC_STATUS, B.DATE_CREATED, B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_CITY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_STATE || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE as ADDRESS, B.QUERY_ID, A.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || A.LAST_NAME as FULL_NAME, LP.PROGRAM_NAME, LDT.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY as DISCHARGE_TYPE, UPE.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, ORRD.ORR_DECISION, C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID and b.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = ( SELECT MAX(D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D WHERE D.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID ) LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON C.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT UPE ON C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPE.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE LDT ON LDT.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID = UPE.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE LEFT JOIN UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR ON RR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND RR.RELEASE_ID = ( SELECT MAX(RR1.RELEASE_ID) FROM UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR1 WHERE RR1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND (RR1.ISDELETED = 0 OR RR1.ISDELETED is null) ) LEFT JOIN LIST_ORR_DECISION ORRD On RR.ORR_DECISION = ORRD.ORR_DECISION_ID Where B.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId order by A.UPTIME Desc ; Elsif vCounterType = 'A' Then OPEN cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB,A.UPTIME, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", B.SPONSOR_ID, Case When nvl(Current_Sponsor,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End As Current_Sponsor, (Select SPONSOR_CATEGORY || NVL(SPONSOR_SUB_CATEGORY,'') From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as SPONSOR_CATEGORY, (Select RELATIONSHIP From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as RELATIONSHIP, A.UAC_STATUS, A.DATE_CREATED, B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_CITY || ', ' || B.SPONSOR_STATE || ' ' || B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE as ADDRESS, B.QUERY_ID, A.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || A.LAST_NAME as FULL_NAME, LP.PROGRAM_NAME, LDT.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY as DISCHARGE_TYPE, UPE.DATE_OF_DISCHARGE, ORRD.ORR_DECISION, C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID and b.Is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C ON A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID AND C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = ( SELECT MAX(D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID) FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D WHERE D.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID ) LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LP ON C.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT UPE ON C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPE.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE LDT ON LDT.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID = UPE.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE LEFT JOIN UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR ON RR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND RR.RELEASE_ID = ( SELECT MAX(RR1.RELEASE_ID) FROM UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST RR1 WHERE RR1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND (RR1.ISDELETED = 0 OR RR1.ISDELETED is null) ) LEFT JOIN LIST_ORR_DECISION ORRD On RR.ORR_DECISION = ORRD.ORR_DECISION_ID Where B.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId And B.Current_Sponsor = 1 AND A.UAC_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' And Exists (Select 1 from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO D Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT E On D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where D.UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID And D.CURRENT_STATUS = A.UAC_STATUS And E.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = 3) order by A.UPTIME Desc ; Else OPEN cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID,A.ALIEN_NO, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.DOB, A.COB,A.UPTIME, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, CASE When GENDER='M' Then 'Male' When GENDER='F' Then 'Female' Else '' End "GENDER", SPONSOR_ID, Case When nvl(Current_Sponsor,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End As Current_Sponsor, (Select SPONSOR_CATEGORY From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as SPONSOR_CATEGORY, (Select RELATIONSHIP From LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) as RELATIONSHIP, A.UAC_STATUS From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID and b.is_deleted = 0 Where B.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId order by A.UPTIME Desc ; End If; END SP_GET_SPONSOR_UAC_LIST_SPONSOR_SEARCH;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SSO_SETTINGS
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_STATES
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_STATES" ( cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open CUR_OUT for select DISTINCT L.STATE,L.STATENAME from LIST_STATES L inner join FACILITY_INFO F on L.STATE = F.STATE WHERE F.IsDeleted = 0 order by L.STATENAME; END SP_GET_STATES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_STATE_BY_CITY
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_STATE_BY_CITY" ( v_CITY varchar2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For select B.* from LIST_ENTRY_LOCATIONS A Inner Join List_STATES B On A.STATE = B.STATENAME where CITY=v_CITY;
END SP_GET_STATE_BY_CITY;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_STATUS_INFO
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_SUMMARY_RPT
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UACINFO_BY_SPONSOR
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_UACINFO_BY_SPONSOR" ( vSponsorId NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.ALIEN_NO,A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS as ADDRESS,B.SPONSOR_CITY as CITY,B.SPONSOR_STATE as STATE, B.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE as ZIP_CODE, A.DOB, A.COB, A.UAC_STATUS, D.PROGRAM_NAME, E.RELATIONSHIP, E.SPONSOR_CATEGORY, B.UAC_ID, Case When nvl(B.CURRENT_SPONSOR,0) = 1 Then 'Yes' Else 'No' End As Current_Sponsor, B.QUERY_ID From UAC_INFO A INNER join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B on A.UAC_ID=B.UAC_ID and b.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID And A.UAC_STATUS = C.CURRENT_STATUS LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS D On C.PROGRAM_ID = D.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP E ON B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID Where B.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId Order by 1,2; END SP_GET_UACINFO_BY_SPONSOR;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS ( V_APP_TYPE IN VARCHAR2 , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN IF (V_APP_TYPE IS NULL) THEN OPEN cur_OUT FOR Select * from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS ORDER BY APP_TYPE; ELSE OPEN cur_OUT FOR Select * from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS Where TRIM(UPPER(APP_TYPE)) = TRIM(UPPER(V_APP_TYPE)) ORDER BY PARAM_NAME; END IF; END SP_GET_UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UACPROG_INFO
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_UACPROG_INFO" ( PROGRAM_ID IN NUMBER , FNAME IN VARCHAR2 , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS
fName_ VARCHAR2(250) := FNAME; progId_ NUMBER(3) := PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN if Length(fName_) = 0 or fName_ is null Then fName_ := '%'; End if; OPEN cur_OUT For SELECT DISTINCT UI.UAC_ID, UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, UPI.PROGRAM_ID, UPI.DATE_ADMITTED,UI.ALIEN_NO, UI.FIRST_NAME, UI.LAST_NAME, UI.DOB, UI.COB, UI.DATE_OF_ENTRY, UPI.CURRENT_STATUS as UAC_STATUS, D.UPTIME as UAC_ASSESS_DATE, Case when UCM.FIRST_NAME is null then 'NOT ASSIGNED' Else UCM.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || UCM.LAST_NAME End as "ASSIGNED_TO" FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI INNER JOIN UAC_INFO UI ON UPI.UAC_ID = UI.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT MAX(UPTIME) as UPTIME, UAC_PROGRAM_ID FROM UAC_ASSESSMENT Where nvl(ISDELETED,0) = 0 GROUP BY UAC_PROGRAM_ID) D ON UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_CASE_MANAGERS UCM on UCM.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID and UCM.IS_PRIMARY = 1 Where UPI.PROGRAM_ID = progId_ And UI.FIRST_NAME LIKE fName_ AND UPI.CURRENT_STATUS in ('ADMITTED','IN-TRANSFER') Order by UPI.DATE_ADMITTED DESC; END SP_GET_UACPROG_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UACSPONSORS_BY_ARRAY
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UACSPONSOR_INFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_UACSPONSOR_INFO ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID IN NUMBER , FNAME IN VARCHAR2 , LNAME IN VARCHAR2 , SSN IN VARCHAR2 , ALIEN_NO IN VARCHAR2 , ADDRESS IN VARCHAR2 , CITY IN VARCHAR2 , STATE IN VARCHAR2 , COB IN VARCHAR2 , DOB IN DATE , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; fName_ VARCHAR2(100) := Trim(Upper(nvl(FNAME, ''))); lName_ VARCHAR2(150) := Trim(Upper(nvl(LNAME,''))); ssn_ VARCHAR2(11) := Trim(nvl(SSN, 'xxx')); aNumber_ VARCHAR2(10) := Trim(Upper(nvl(ALIEN_NO, 'xxx'))); address_ VARCHAR2(500) := Trim(Upper(nvl(ADDRESS,''))); city_ VARCHAR2(500) := Trim(Upper(nvl(CITY, 'xxx'))); state_ CHAR(2) := Trim(Upper(nvl("STATE",'xx'))); cob_ VARCHAR2(500) := Trim(Upper(nvl(COB,'xxx'))); dob_ DATE := DOB; BEGIN If dob_ is null then Open cur_OUT for Select * from ( Select A.* From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where UPPER(nvl(FIRST_NAME, 'xxx')) Like '%' || fName_ || '%' And UPPER(nvl(LAST_NAME,'xxx')) Like '%' || lName_ || '%' And UPPER(nvl(ADDRESS,'xxx')) Like '%' || address_ || '%' And (CASE WHEN ssn_ = 'xxx' THEN 1 WHEN (Replace(nvl(SSN,''), '-', '') = Replace(ssn_, '-', '')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN aNumber_ = 'XXX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl(ALIEN_NO, '')) = aNumber_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN city_ = 'XXX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl(CITY,'')) = city_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN state_ = 'XX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl("STATE",'')) = state_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN cob_ = 'XXX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl(COB,''))= cob_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And SPONSOR_ID Not In (Select SPONSOR_ID from UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_) Order by A.First_Name, A.SPONSOR_ID, A.Last_Name) where rownum <= 150; Else Open cur_OUT for Select * from ( Select A.* From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where UPPER(nvl(FIRST_NAME, 'xxx')) Like '%' || fName_ || '%' And UPPER(nvl(LAST_NAME,'xxx')) Like '%' || lName_ || '%' And UPPER(nvl(ADDRESS,'xxx')) Like '%' || address_ || '%' And (CASE WHEN ssn_ = 'xxx' THEN 1 WHEN (Replace(nvl(SSN,''), '-', '') = Replace(ssn_, '-', '')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN aNumber_ = 'XXX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl(ALIEN_NO, '')) = aNumber_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN city_ = 'XXX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl(CITY,'')) = city_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN state_ = 'XX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl("STATE",'')) = state_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And (CASE WHEN cob_ = 'XXX' THEN 1 WHEN (UPPER(nvl(COB,''))= cob_) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 And SPONSOR_ID Not In (Select SPONSOR_ID from UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Where B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_) AND To_Date(DOB, 'DD-MON-RR') = To_Date(dob_, 'DD-MON-RR') Order by A.First_Name, A.SPONSOR_ID, A.Last_Name) where rownum <= 150; END If; END SP_GET_UACSPONSOR_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UACSPONSOR_LIST
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_UACSPONSOR_LIST" ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId Number(10) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select A.SPONSOR_ID, DecodeText(B.LAST_NAME || ', ' || B.FIRST_NAME) as SPONSOR_NAME FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A INNER JOIN SPONSOR_INFO B ON A.SPONSOR_ID = B.SPONSOR_ID and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.IS_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On A.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Where C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId; END SP_GET_UACSPONSOR_LIST;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UAC_CASESTATUS_ALT_CAREGIVER
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UAC_CASESTATUS_HH
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UAC_CASESTATUS_INFO
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UAC_CASESTATUS_SPONSOR
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_UAC_CASESTATUS_SPONSOR" ( UAC_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_ID; BEGIN Open CUR_OUT for SELECT B.BACKGROUND_CHECK_ID, B.UAC_ID, B.SPONSOR_ID, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY,B.BG_PUBLIC,B.FINGER_PRINT_METHOD,B.FINGER_PRINT_DATE_AVAILABLE,B.FINGER_PRINT_APPOINTMENT,br.description, B.ID_DATE_SENT,B.ARI_SENT_TO_ORR,B.FIELD_PRINTDATE_AVAILABLE,B.FIELD_PRINT_APPOINTMENT,B.CARD_PRINT_SENT_DATE,B.CARD_PRINT_DATE_RECEIVED, CASE WHEN B.BG_PUBLIC=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_REQUESTED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (1,2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_PUBLIC_DATE_REQUESTED, CASE WHEN B.BG_PUBLIC=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_RECEIVED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (1,2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_PUBLIC_DATE_RECIEVED, B.BG_SEX, CASE WHEN B.BG_SEX=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_REQUESTED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (1,2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_SEX_DATE_REQUESTED, CASE WHEN B.BG_SEX=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_RECEIVED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (1, 2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_SEX_DATE_RECIEVED, B.BG_IMM, CASE WHEN B.BG_IMM=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_REQUESTED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_IMM_REQUESTED, CASE WHEN B.BG_IMM=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_RECEIVED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_IMM_RECIEVED, B.BG_FBICH, CASE WHEN B.BG_FBICH=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_REQUESTED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_FBICH_REQUESTED, CASE WHEN B.BG_FBICH=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_RECEIVED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (2,3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_FBICH_RECIEVED, B.BG_CAN, CASE WHEN B.BG_CAN=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_REQUESTED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_CAN_REQUESTED, CASE WHEN B.BG_CAN=1 THEN To_Char(B.DATE_RECEIVED, 'mm/dd/yyyy') ELSE CASE WHEN A.SPONSOR_CATEGORY IN (3,4) Then Null Else 'N/A' End End AS BG_CAN_RECIEVED , CASE WHEN B.BG_FBICH=1 THEN 1 else 2 end as orderby FROm (Select A.UAC_ID, B.FIRST_NAME, B.LAST_NAME, A.SPONSOR_ID, E.SPONSOR_CATEGORY From UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A Inner Join SPONSOR_INFO B On A.SPONSOR_ID = B.SPONSOR_ID and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 Left Join List_Relationship E On A.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = E.RELATIONSHIP_ID Where A.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 And A.UAC_ID = uacId_ ) A LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_BACKGROUND_CHECK B ON B.SPONSOR_ID = A.SPONSOR_ID ANd B.UAC_ID = A.UAC_ID and b.occupant_id is null and b.sponsor_alternate_caregiver_id is null LEFT JOIN LIST_BG_CHECK_RESULT_TYPE BR ON B.result_id = BR.result_id WHERE OCCUPANT_ID Is Null and b.sponsor_alternate_caregiver_id is null and b.sponsor_id = a.sponsor_id ORDER BY orderby; END SP_GET_UAC_CASESTATUS_SPONSOR;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UAC_DISCHARGE_EXIT_DATE
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_UAC_DISCHARGE_EXIT_DATE ( vUAC_Id IN NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT DISTINCT u.UAC_ID, u.UAC_STATUS, P.DATE_DISCHARGED, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - P.DATE_DISCHARGED >= 365 THEN 'Over 365 days' ELSE 'Within 365 days' END AS date_status FROM uAC_INFO U INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO P ON P.UAC_ID = U.UAC_ID WHERE U.UAC_ID = vUAC_Id ; END SP_GET_UAC_DISCHARGE_EXIT_DATE;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UAC_DOCS
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_UAC_Docs (UACPROGRAMID IN NUMBER, CUR_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR) AS BEGIN OPEN CUR_OUT FOR SELECT d.*, dt.document_type FROM UAC_DOCUMENTS d LEFT JOIN LIST_DOCUMENT_TYPE dt on d.document_type_id = dt.document_type_id WHERE d.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UACPROGRAMID and d.isdeleted = 0 order by UPTIME Desc; END SP_GET_UAC_Docs;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_UAC_STATUSES
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_UAC_STATUSES" ( v_DataSet VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN if v_DataSet = 'UAC' then Open cur_Out For select distinct UAC_STATUS From UAC_INFO order by UAC_STATUS; else Open cur_Out For select distinct SPONSORTHIP_STATUS From SPONSOR_INFO where is_deleted = 0 order by SPONSORTHIP_STATUS; end if;
END SP_GET_UAC_STATUSES;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_USER
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_USER" ( v_USER_ID IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN IF v_USER_ID ='All' then Open cur_Out For select A.USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, B.PROGRAM_ID, USER_PRIVELEGE,ROLE_TYPE, C.PROGRAM_NAME from ADM_LIST_WEB_USER A inner join ADM_USER_PROGRAM B on A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C ON C.PROGRAM_ID=B.PROGRAM_ID order by LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME ASC, A.UPTIME DESC; else Open cur_Out For select A.*, '' PROGRAM_NAME from ADM_LIST_WEB_USER A where Upper(Trim(A.USER_ID))=Upper(Trim(v_USER_ID)) order by LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, A.UPTIME DESC; end if; END SP_GET_USER;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_USER_INFO
UACPORTAL.SP_GET_USER_PROGRAM
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_GET_USER_PROGRAM( v_USER_ID IN VARCHAR2, v_USER_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN If v_USER_TYPE = 'Program' Then Open cur_Out For select B.PROGRAM_ID, C.PROGRAM_NAME from ADM_USER_PROGRAM B inner join LIST_PROGRAMS C ON C.PROGRAM_ID=B.PROGRAM_ID where Upper(Trim(B.USER_ID))= Upper(Trim(v_USER_ID)) and B.USER_TYPE=v_USER_TYPE order by C.PROGRAM_NAME; ELSE Open cur_Out For select B.PROGRAM_ID, C.DESCRIPTION AS PROGRAM_NAME from ADM_USER_PROGRAM B inner join LIST_ICE_CBP C ON C.ICE_CBP_ID=B.PROGRAM_ID and B.USER_TYPE=C.ICE_CBP_TYPE where Upper(Trim(B.USER_ID))= Upper(Trim(v_USER_ID)) and B.USER_TYPE=v_USER_TYPE order by C.DESCRIPTION; End If; END SP_GET_USER_PROGRAM;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_USER_PWD_EXPIRE
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_GET_USER_PWD_EXPIRE" ( cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS BEGIN Open cur_Out For Select U.USER_ID, U.FIRST_NAME, U.LAST_NAME, U.EMAIL, M.MAX_PASSWORDLASTCHANGED, ((SELECT to_number(PARAM_VALUE) from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS where PARAM_NAME = 'PWD_EXPIRATION_PERIOD') - datediff('Day', M.MAX_PASSWORDLASTCHANGED, CURRENT_DATE)) as DueDay FROM ADM_LIST_WEB_USER U INNER JOIN (SELECT USER_ID, max(PASSWORDLASTCHANGED) as MAX_PASSWORDLASTCHANGED FROM ADM_WEB_USER_PWD GROUP BY USER_ID) M ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID /*WHERE Not U.EMAIL is null AND U.SUSPENDED = 0 AND ( (SELECT to_number(PARAM_VALUE) from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS where PARAM_NAME = 'PWD_EXPIRATION_PERIOD') - datediff('Day', M.MAX_PASSWORDLASTCHANGED, CURRENT_DATE) ) Between 0 and (SELECT to_number(PARAM_VALUE) from UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS where PARAM_NAME = 'PWD_EMAIL_REMINDER_PERIOD')*/ WHERE U.EMAIL is null ;
END SP_GET_USER_PWD_EXPIRE;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_GET_VOR
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_GET_VOR" ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; uacId_ NUMBER(10,0); uacImage VARCHAR2(112) := 'NOIMAGE'; n NUMBER(4); BEGIN select UAC_ID into uacId_ from UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; Select count(*) into n from ( Select DISTINCT FILE_NAME from UAC_IMAGES A1 Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B1 On A1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B1.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C1 On B1.UAC_ID = C1.UAC_ID Where C1.UAC_ID = uacId_ ); if n > 0 Then Select FILE_NAME into uacImage From ( Select DISTINCT FILE_NAME, DATE_UPLOADED from UAC_IMAGES A2 Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B2 On A2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B2.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO C2 On B2.UAC_ID = C2.UAC_ID Where C2.UAC_ID = uacId_ Order by A2.DATE_UPLOADED Desc ) where rownum = 1; end if; Open cur_Out For Select UACI.UAC_ID,UACI.ALIEN_NO, UACI.FIRST_NAME, UACI.LAST_NAME, UACI.AKA, UACI.DOB, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, UACI.DOB) /12) as Age, UACI.COB, UACI.GENDER, CURRENT_STATUS as UAC_STATUS,DATE_ADMITTED, UACP.PROGRAM_ID, UACP.DATE_DISCHARGED, LP.PROGRAM_NAME, F.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || F.LAST_NAME as Sponsor_NAME, F.SSN as Sponsor_SSN, F.ALIEN_NO as Sponsor_ANo, F.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, F.Sponsor_City, F.Sponsor_State, F.Sponsor_ZipCode, F.Sponsor_Home_Phone as Sponsor_Phone, F.Relationship, UACIA.UAC_PRIMARY_LANG_DDL, CASE WHEN UACIA.UAC_PRIMARY_LANG_DDL is null Then UACIA.UAC_PRIMARY_LANGUAGE ELSE LL.LANGUAGE END AS PRIMARY_LANGUAGE, UACIA.EYE_COLOR_ID, LE.COLOR_NAME AS EYE_COLOR, G.IMAGE_PATH || G.FILE_NAME as UAC_PHOTO, uacImage as ImageName FROM UAC_INFO UACI LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UACP ON UACI.UAC_ID = UACP.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_INITIAL_ASSESSMENT UACIA On UACP.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UACIA.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LP On UACP.PROGRAM_ID = LP.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_LANGUAGES LL On UACIA.UAC_PRIMARY_LANG_DDL = LL.LANGUAGE_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_EYE_COLOR LE ON UACIA.EYE_COLOR_ID = LE.COLOR_ID Left Join ( Select B.UAC_ID, CONCAT(CONCAT(B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS, ' '), B.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY) as Sponsor_Address, B.Sponsor_City, B.Sponsor_State, B.Sponsor_ZipCode, B.Sponsor_Home_Phone, A.*, C.Relationship From SPONSOR_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST B On A.SPONSOR_ID = B.SPONSOR_ID and a.is_deleted=0 and b.is_deleted = 0 Left Join LIST_RELATIONSHIP C On B.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = C.RELATIONSHIP_ID Where B.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 ) F On UACI.UAC_ID = F.UAC_ID Left Join UAC_IMAGES G On UACP.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = G.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where UACP.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; END SP_GET_VOR;

UACPORTAL.SP_HOMESTUDY_GET_APPREHENSION
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_HOMESTUDY_GET_APPREHENSION" ( UACID IN NUMBER , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacId_ NUMBER(10) := UACID; BEGIN OPEN cur_OUT For SELECT DISTINCT B.UAC_ID, B.ALIEN_NO, B.FIRST_NAME, B.LAST_NAME, B.RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, A.CURRENT_STATUS, C.RELATIONSHIP_ID, D.RELATIONSHIP, C.APPREHENSION_TYPE, C.UPTIME, CASE WHEN E.REFERRAL_STATUS IN (1,2) THEN 'HOME STUDY' WHEN F.REFERRAL_STATUS IN (1,2) AND F.PRS_TYPE = 0 THEN 'PRS - TVPRA' WHEN F.REFERRAL_STATUS IN (1,2) AND F.PRS_TYPE = 1 THEN 'PRS' ELSE '' END as REFERRED_FOR FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_INFO B ON A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER JOIN UAC_APPREHENSION_INFO C ON B.ALIEN_NO = C.ANUMBER LEFT JOIN LIST_RELATIONSHIP D ON C.RELATIONSHIP_ID = D.RELATIONSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL E ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE F ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID WHERE C.UAC_ID = uacId_ AND C.IN_ORR_CARE = 1 Order by C.UPTIME DESC; END SP_HOMESTUDY_GET_APPREHENSION;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_INFLUX_RPT
UACPORTAL.SP_INSERTFLAGCOMMENT
UACPORTAL.SP_INSERTSPONSORFLAG
routine.definition: PROCEDURE sp_InsertSponsorFlag ( p_SponsorId IN NUMBER, p_FlagTypeId IN NUMBER, p_FlagDescription IN VARCHAR2, p_FlaggedEntityId IN VARCHAR2, p_FlaggedEntity IN VARCHAR2, p_IsActive IN NUMBER, p_UserCreated IN VARCHAR2, p_DateCreated IN DATE, --p_FlagToken IN VARCHAR2, p_SponsorFlagId OUT NUMBER ) AS BEGIN INSERT INTO SponsorFlag ( SponsorId, FlagTypeId, FlagDescription, FlaggedEntityId, FlaggedEntity, IsActive, UserCreated, DateCreated --, FlagToken ) VALUES ( p_SponsorId, p_FlagTypeId, p_FlagDescription, p_FlaggedEntityId, p_FlaggedEntity, p_IsActive, p_UserCreated, p_DateCreated --, p_FlagToken ) RETURNING SponsorFlagId INTO p_SponsorFlagId; END sp_InsertSponsorFlag;
