UACPORTAL.SP_REACTV8_CANCEL_OVER_18
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_REACTV8_CANCEL_OVER_18" AS BEGIN UPDATE UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE PRS SET PRS.REFERRAL_STATUS = 1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TT_BK_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO UPI ON A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UPI.UAC_PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS LPR ON UPI.PROGRAM_ID = LPR.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER HSP ON A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = HSP.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID WHERE CANCELLATION_REASON IS NULL AND PRS.PRS_ID = PRS_ID) AND PRS.REFERRAL_STATUS = 4; COMMIT; END SP_REACTV8_CANCEL_OVER_18;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_RECREATE_INDEXES
UACPORTAL.SP_REFERRAL_CHECK_MASSUPDATE
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_REFERRAL_CHECK_MASSUPDATE ( v_REfIDs VARCHAR2, v_infoType VARCHAR2, v_RefStatus VARCHAR2, v_Provider VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS
BEGIN If v_infoType = 'HS' Then --For Home Studies Open cur_Out For SELECT HOMESTUDY_ID, REFERRAL_ID, E.REFERRAL_STATUS_ID, E.REFERRAL_STATUS, A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, D.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER, A.Uptime, A.Upuser, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME FROM UAC_HOMESTUDY_CASE_REFERRAL A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER D ON A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = D.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_REFERRAL_STATUS E ON A.REFERRAL_STATUS = E.REFERRAL_STATUS_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = v_RefStatus AND (ASSIGNED_PROVIDER <> v_Provider OR (v_Provider is null AND ASSIGNED_PROVIDER IS NOT NULL)) AND HOMESTUDY_ID IN (select to_number(column_value) as IDs from xmltable(v_REfIDs)); Else -- For PRS Open cur_Out For SELECT PRS_ID, REFERRAL_ID, E.REFERRAL_STATUS_ID, E.REFERRAL_STATUS, A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER, D.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER, A.Uptime, A.Upuser, C.ALIEN_NO, C.FIRST_NAME, C.LAST_NAME FROM UAC_POST_RELEASE_SERVICE A LEFT JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_INFO C ON B.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER D ON A.ASSIGNED_PROVIDER = D.HOMESTUDY_PROVIDER_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_REFERRAL_STATUS E ON A.REFERRAL_STATUS = E.REFERRAL_STATUS_ID WHERE A.REFERRAL_STATUS = v_RefStatus AND (ASSIGNED_PROVIDER <> v_Provider OR (v_Provider is null AND ASSIGNED_PROVIDER IS NOT NULL)) AND PRS_ID IN (select to_number(column_value) as IDs from xmltable(v_REfIDs)); End if; END SP_REFERRAL_CHECK_MASSUPDATE;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_REFERRAL_STATUS_MASSUPDATE
UACPORTAL.SP_REFRESH_SPONSOR_MV
UACPORTAL.SP_RESET_PASSWORD
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_RESET_PASSWORD" AS BEGIN
MERGE INTO ADM_LIST_WEB_USER des USING ( select user_id , max(passwordLASTCHANGED) PwdLastChanged from ADM_WEB_USER_PWD group by user_id ) src ON ( src.user_id = des.user_id and (extract(day from SYSDATE-PwdLastChanged))>90 ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PASSWORDRESET = 1 ; COMMIT; END "SP_RESET_PASSWORD";

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_RGETRUNAWAYINFO
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_RGETRUNAWAYINFO" ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN OPEN cur_OUT FOR Select A.First_Name, A.Last_Name, A.Alien_No, A.COB, A.DOB, '' as FINS, A.AKA, A.GENDER, A.DATE_OF_ENTRY,A.MANNER_OF_ENTRY, A.DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, A.REFERRING_OFFICE as APPREHENSION_FIELD_OFFICE, A.DATE_ORR_NOTIFIED as Date_Of_Referral_to_ORR, Case When A.NOTIFICATION_CITY is not null Then Case When A.NOTIFICATION_STATE is Not null then A.NOTIFICATION_CITY || ', ' || A.NOTIFICATION_STATE Else A.NOTIFICATION_CITY End Else Case When A.NOTIFICATION_STATE is Not null then A.NOTIFICATION_STATE Else '' End End as LOCATION_OF_UAC_AT_REFERRAL, C.PROGRAM_NAME, D.PROGRAM_TYPE, C.Address || ',' || C.City || ',' || State || ',' || ZipCode as PROGRAM_LOCATION, B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, 'RUN AWAY' as DISCHARGE_TYPE, E.DATE_OF_INCIDENT as DT_OF_INCIDENT, E.DATE_REPORTED as DT_OF_INCIDENT_REPORTED, E.LOCATION_OF_INCIDENT, E.SYNOPSIS_OF_INCIDENT, E.WITNESSES, E.STAFF_RESPONSES, E.RESOLUTION, E.RECOMMENDATIONS, E.INFO_RELEASED_TO_MEDIA, E.FILER_NAME, E.FILER_TITLE, E.FILER_PHONE, E.FOLLOWUP_NAME, E.FOLLOWUP_TITLE, E.FOLLOWUP_PHONE, E.SUPERVISOR_NAME, E.SUPERVISOR_TITLE, E.SUPERVISOR_PHONE, E.JURISDICTION_NAME, E.JURISDICTION_TITLE, E.JURISDICTION_PHONE From UAC_INFO A Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Inner Join LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE D On D.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = C.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID Inner Join (Select * from (Select UAC_PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_INCIDENT, DATE_REPORTED, LOCATION_OF_INCIDENT, SYNOPSIS_OF_INCIDENT, WITNESSES, STAFF_RESPONSES, RESOLUTION, RECOMMENDATIONS, INFO_RELEASED_TO_MEDIA, FILER_NAME, FILER_TITLE, FILER_PHONE, CONTACT_NAME as FOLLOWUP_NAME, CONTACT_TITLE as FOLLOWUP_TITLE, CONTACT_PHONE as FOLLOWUP_PHONE, SUPERVISOR_NAME, SUPERVISOR_TITLE, SUPERVISOR_PHONE, JURISDICTION_NAME, JURISDICTION_TITLE, JURISDICTION_PHONE From UAC_SIR Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ Order by DATE_CREATED DESC) where Rownum = 1) E On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = E.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Where B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; END SP_RGETRUNAWAYINFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_RGET_ORRNOTE_OF_TRNSFTOICE
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_RGET_ORRNOTE_OF_TRNSFTOICE" ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID IN NUMBER , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS
uacProgId_ NUMBER(10) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN OPEN cur_OUT For Select F.REQUESTOR_NAME as REQUESTER_NAME, F.REQUESTOR_TITLE as REQUESTER_TITLE,F.REQUESTOR_PHONE as REQUESTER_PHONE, F.DATE_REQUESTED, C.PROGRAM_NAME as CURRENT_PROGRAM, F.ARRIVAL_DATE, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.ALIEN_NO, A.AKA , A.DOB, A.COB, G.Address as Destination_Address, G.City as Destination_City, G.State as Destination_State, G.ZipCode as Destination_ZipCode, G.Phone as Destination_Phone, G.Mail_Address as Destination_Mail_Address, G.Mail_City as Destination_Mail_City, G.Mail_State as Destination_Mail_State, G.Mail_ZipCode as Destination_Mail_ZipCode, G.PROGRAM_NAME as Destination_Program, C.Address, C.City, C.State, C.ZipCode, C.Phone, C.Mail_Address, C.Mail_City, C.Mail_State, C.Mail_ZipCode, F.RECEIVING_STAFF_NAME,F.RECEIVING_STAFF_TITLE, F.TRNSF_SCH_DATE, F.NEXT_SCHDATE_COURT_APPEARANCE,REASON_TO_NOTICE_ICE as Notice48h, F.ORR_DECIDED_RELOCATE, F.UAC_HAS_SPECIAL_NEEDS, F.SPECIFY_SPECIAL_NEEDS, F.OTHER_ORR, F.OTHER_ORR_SPECIFY, F.PROVIDE_LESS_RESTRICTIVE, F.PROVIDE_MORE_RESTRICTIVE, F.REQUEST_TYPE From UAC_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER Join List_Programs C On B.Program_ID = C.Program_ID LEFT JOIN ( Select * from (Select * from UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ AND (ISDELETED is null or ISDELETED = 0) Order by DATE_CREATED Desc) Where rownum <= 1 ) F On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS G On F.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID = G.PROGRAM_ID Where B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ ; END SP_RGET_ORRNOTE_OF_TRNSFTOICE;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_RGET_ORR_DCS_TRNSF_REQUEST
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_RGET_ORR_DCS_TRNSF_REQUEST" ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID IN NUMBER , cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS
uacProgId_ NUMBER(10) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN OPEN cur_OUT For Select F.REQUESTOR_NAME as REQUESTER_NAME, F.REQUESTOR_TITLE as REQUESTER_TITLE,F.REQUESTOR_PHONE as REQUESTER_PHONE, F.DATE_REQUESTED, F.Height, F.Weight, F.MINOR_ATTORNEY_CONTACTED, F.ATTORNEY_OF_RECORD, F.ATTORNEY_PHONE, ORR_DECISION_MAKER_NAME, DATE_OF_DECISION, Trunc(months_between(sysdate, A.DOB) /12) as Age, C.PROGRAM_NAME as CurrProgramName, I.PROGRAM_TYPE as CurrProgramType, F.DEPARTURE_DATE, F.TRNSP_STAFF_NAME, F.TRNSF_STAFF_TITLE,F.ARRIVAL_DATE, RECEIVING_STAFF_NAME, RECEIVING_STAFF_TITLE, F.Eye_Color as EyeColor, F.IDENTIFYING_MARKS as IdentificationMark, A.FIRST_NAME, A.LAST_NAME, A.ALIEN_NO, A.AKA , A.DOB, A.COB, D.DATE_ADMITTED as DateInitialPlacement, B.DATE_ADMITTED as DatePlacementCurrProg, G.Address as Prev_Address, G.City as Prev_City, G.State as Prev_State, G.ZipCode as Prev_ZipCode, G.Phone as Prev_Phone, G.PROGRAM_NAME as ProposedProgram,H.PROGRAM_TYPE as ProposedProgramType, C.Address, C.City, C.State, C.ZipCode, C.Phone, C.Mail_Address, C.Mail_City, C.Mail_State, C.Mail_ZipCode, C.PROGRAM_NAME, I.PROGRAM_TYPE, F.CASE_WORKER, E.Custodian_Name, E.Custodian_Title, E.Custodian_Phone From UAC_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID INNER Join List_Programs C On B.Program_ID = C.Program_ID INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE I On C.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = I.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID Left Join ( Select * from ( Select A.UAC_ID, A.DATE_ADMITTED From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO A Where A.CURRENT_STATUS = 'DISCHARGED' Order by DATE_DISCHARGED DESC ) Where RowNum <= 1 ) D On A.UAC_ID = D.UAC_ID Left join ( Select A.UAC_ID, B.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || B.LAST_NAME as Custodian_Name, C.Relationship as Custodian_Title, A.SPONSOR_Home_Phone as Custodian_Phone from UAC_SPONSOR_LIST A Inner Join Sponsor_Info B On A.Sponsor_ID = B.Sponsor_ID AND A.IS_DELETED = 0 AND B.IS_DELETED = 0 Inner Join List_Relationship C On A.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC = C.RELATIONSHIP_ID Where A.CURRENT_SPONSOR = 1 ) E On A.UAC_ID = E.UAC_ID LEFT JOIN ( Select * from (Select * from UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ AND (ISDELETED is null or ISDELETED = 0) Order by DATE_CREATED Desc) Where rownum <= 1 ) F On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = F.UAC_PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS G On F.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID = G.PROGRAM_ID LEFT JOIN LIST_PROGRAM_TYPE H On G.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID = H.PROGRAM_TYPE_ID Where B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ ; END SP_RGET_ORR_DCS_TRNSF_REQUEST;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_RGET_ORR_NOTE_TO_ICE
UACPORTAL.SP_ROLLBACK_ARCHIVED_SPONSORS
UACPORTAL.SP_RUN_SPONSOR_ADDR_RPT
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_RUN_SPONSOR_ADDR_RPT" ( v_REPORT_TYPE VARCHAR2, v_FROM_DATE DATE, v_TO_DATE DATE, cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS reportType_ VARCHAR2(50):=v_REPORT_TYPE; fromDate_ DATE:= v_FROM_DATE; toDate_ DATE:= v_TO_DATE; BEGIN if UPPER(reportType_) = 'LASTUPDATED' then Open CUR_OUT for SELECT SPN.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME ,SPN.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME ,SPN.DOB AS SPONSOR_DOB ,SPN.COB AS SPONSOR_COB ,USL.QUERY_ID As SPONSOR_QUERY_ID ,TRIM(SPN.ADDRESS) || ', ' || TRIM(SPN.CITY) || ', ' || TRIM(SPN.STATE) || ' ' || TRIM(SPN.ZIP_CODE) AS PREVIOUS_ADDRESS ,TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_ADDRESS) || ', ' || TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_CITY) || ', ' || TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_STATE) || ' ' || TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE) AS CURRENT_ADDRESS ,SPN.SSN AS SPONSOR_SSN ,SPN.ALIEN_NO AS SPONSOR_ALIEN_NO ,SHO.LAST_NAME AS HOUSEHOLD_LAST_NAME ,SHO.FIRST_NAME AS HOUSEHOLD_FIRST_NAME ,SHO.DOB AS HOUSEHOLD_DOB ,SHO.QUERY_ID AS HOUSEHOLD_QUERY_ID ,USL.UPTIME AS SPONSOR_LAST_UPDATED FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST USL INNER JOIN SPONSOR_INFO SPN ON USL.SPONSOR_ID = SPN.SPONSOR_ID and usl.is_deleted = 0 and spn.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS SHO ON SHO.SPONSOR_ID = USL.SPONSOR_ID AND SHO.UAC_ID = USL.UAC_ID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SPONSOR_INFO SI WHERE UPPER(TRIM(SI.ADDRESS)) = UPPER(TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_ADDRESS)) AND UPPER(TRIM(SI.STATE)) = UPPER(TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_STATE))) AND TRUNC(USL.UPTIME) BETWEEN fromDate_ AND toDate_ ORDER BY SPN.LAST_NAME, SPN.FIRST_NAME; else Open CUR_OUT for SELECT SPN.LAST_NAME AS SPONSOR_LAST_NAME ,SPN.FIRST_NAME AS SPONSOR_FIRST_NAME ,SPN.DOB AS SPONSOR_DOB ,SPN.COB AS SPONSOR_COB ,USL.QUERY_ID As SPONSOR_QUERY_ID ,TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_ADDRESS) || ', ' || TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_CITY) || ', ' || TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_STATE) || ' ' || TRIM(USL.SPONSOR_ZIPCODE) AS CURRENT_ADDRESS ,SPN.SSN AS SPONSOR_SSN ,SPN.ALIEN_NO AS SPONSOR_ALIEN_NO ,SHO.LAST_NAME AS HOUSEHOLD_LAST_NAME ,SHO.FIRST_NAME AS HOUSEHOLD_FIRST_NAME ,SHO.DOB AS HOUSEHOLD_DOB ,SHO.QUERY_ID AS HOUSEHOLD_QUERY_ID ,SPN.DATE_CREATED AS SPONSOR_DATE_CREATED ,SHO.DATE_CREATED AS HOUSEHOLD_DATE_CREATED FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST USL INNER JOIN SPONSOR_INFO SPN ON USL.SPONSOR_ID = SPN.SPONSOR_ID and usl.is_deleted = 0 and spn.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD_OCCUPANTS SHO ON SHO.SPONSOR_ID = USL.SPONSOR_ID AND SHO.UAC_ID = USL.UAC_ID WHERE TO_DATE(USL.DATE_CREATED, 'DD-MON-RR') BETWEEN TO_DATE(fromDate_, 'DD-MON-RR') AND TO_DATE(toDate_, 'DD-MON-RR') OR TO_DATE(SHO.DATE_CREATED, 'DD-MON-RR') BETWEEN TO_DATE(fromDate_, 'DD-MON-RR') AND TO_DATE(toDate_, 'DD-MON-RR') ORDER BY SPN.LAST_NAME, SPN.FIRST_NAME; end if; END SP_RUN_SPONSOR_ADDR_RPT;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_SEARCH_BY_HOUSEHOLD
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_SEARCH_BY_HOUSEHOLD" ( v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, v_FilterType VARCHAR2, v_FilteredWord VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_Param1 varchar2(300); BEGIN v_Param1 := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',UPPER(v_Search_Value)), '%');
if v_FilterType = 'FilterByCity' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And CITY = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterByState' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And STATE = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterByHHFName' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And HHFIRST_NAME = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterByHHLName' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And HHLAST_NAME = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterBySFName' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And SFIRST_NAME = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterBySLName' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And SLAST_NAME = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterByUFName' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And UFIRST_NAME = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterByULName' Then Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And ULAST_NAME = v_FilteredWord And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Else Open cur_Out For Select E.*, Count(*) over() as rowC From ( SELECT * FROM V_UAC_SPONSOR_HOUSEHOLD Where (UPPER(HHFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(HHLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(SFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(SLAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(UFIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ULAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or Upper(ADDRESS) like v_Param1 or Upper(CITY) like v_Param1) And (UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'ADMITTED' Or UPPER(UAC_STATUS) like 'IN-TRANSFER') ORDER BY HHFIRST_NAME) E FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; End If; --End If; END SP_SEARCH_BY_HOUSEHOLD;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_SEARCH_BY_REFERRAL_NO
UACPORTAL.SP_SEARCH_BY_SPONSOR
routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_SEARCH_BY_SPONSOR" ( v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, v_FilterType VARCHAR2, v_FilteredWord VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_Param1 varchar2(300); v_Param_Original varchar2(300); BEGIN v_Param_Original := Trim(UPPER(v_Search_Value)); --v_Param1 := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',UPPER(v_Search_Value)), '%'); v_Param1 := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',replace(Trim(UPPER(v_Search_Value)), ' ', '%')), '%'); if v_FilterType = 'FilterByCity' Then Open cur_Out For Select * FROM ( Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 1 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(address)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME))) And City = v_FilteredWord UNION Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 2 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (UPPER(ALIEN_NO) = v_Param_Original or UPPER(FIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(Last_Name) like v_Param1 or Upper(address) like v_Param1 or UPPER(first_name) || ' ' || UPPER(last_name) LIKE v_Param1) And City = v_FilteredWord) ORDER BY ROWLEVEL, SORTCRITERIA1, SPONSOR_ID, SORTCRITERIA2 FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterByState' Then Open cur_Out For Select * FROM ( Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 1 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(address)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME))) And State = v_FilteredWord UNION Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 2 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (UPPER(ALIEN_NO) = v_Param_Original or UPPER(FIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(Last_Name) like v_Param1 or Upper(address) like v_Param1 or UPPER(first_name) || ' ' || UPPER(last_name) LIKE v_Param1) And State = v_FilteredWord) ORDER BY ROWLEVEL, SORTCRITERIA1, SPONSOR_ID, SORTCRITERIA2 FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_FilterType = 'FilterByFName' Then Open cur_Out For Select * FROM ( Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 1 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(address)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME))) And FIRST_NAME = v_FilteredWord UNION Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 2 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (UPPER(ALIEN_NO) = v_Param_Original or UPPER(FIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(Last_Name) like v_Param1 or Upper(address) like v_Param1 or UPPER(first_name) || ' ' || UPPER(last_name) LIKE v_Param1) And FIRST_NAME = v_FilteredWord) ORDER BY ROWLEVEL, SORTCRITERIA1, SPONSOR_ID, SORTCRITERIA2 FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Else Open cur_Out For Select * FROM (Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 1 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(address)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) OR v_Param_Original = Trim(UPPER(Last_Name)) || ' ' || Trim(UPPER(FIRST_NAME))) UNION Select Count(*) over() as rowC, A.* , A.FIRST_NAME AS SORTCRITERIA1, A.Last_Name AS SORTCRITERIA2, 2 AS ROWLEVEL From V_SPONSOR_INFO A Where (UPPER(ALIEN_NO) = v_Param_Original or UPPER(FIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(Last_Name) like v_Param1 or Upper(address) like v_Param1 or UPPER(first_name) || ' ' || UPPER(last_name) LIKE v_Param1)) ORDER BY ROWLEVEL, SORTCRITERIA1, SPONSOR_ID, SORTCRITERIA2 FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; End If; END SP_SEARCH_BY_SPONSOR;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_SEARCH_BY_SPONSORS_ADDRESS
UACPORTAL.SP_SEARCH_BY_SPONSORS_BY_ARRAY
UACPORTAL.SP_SEARCH_BY_SPONSORS_FIRSTLAST_NAMES
UACPORTAL.SP_SEARCH_BY_UAC
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_SEARCH_BY_UAC ( v_Search_Value VARCHAR2, v_RoleType VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS v_Param1 varchar2(300); BEGIN v_Param1 := CONCAT(CONCAT('%',UPPER(v_Search_Value)), '%');
If FormattedDate(v_Search_Value) = 1 Then If v_RoleType = 'ChildAdvocade' Or v_RoleType = 'LegalServices' Then Open cur_OUT For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, GENDER, Case When CURRENT_STATUS is null Then A.UAC_STATUS Else B.CURRENT_STATUS End as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, '' as APPROVED_FIELD_OFFICE, '' as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, C.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, E.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY AS DISCHARGE_TYPE, RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, COUNT(*) Over() as rowC, CASE WHEN (datediff('Day', B.DATE_DISCHARGED, CURRENT_DATE) <= 45) OR B.DATE_DISCHARGED Is Null OR (SELECT LOCK_RECORD FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN datediff('Hour', DATETIME_CREATED, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) >= (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE UPPER(PARAM_NAME) = UPPER('UnlockHours')) THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS LOCK_RECORD FROM UAC_UNLOCKED_HIST WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND NOT DATETIME_CREATED Is Null ORDER BY UNLOCKED_HIST_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )) = 'NO' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS LOCKED ,UTR.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID ,Case When A.UAC_STATUS ='ENROUTE' OR A.UAC_STATUS ='IN-TRANSFER' Then 1 Else 0 End as ALLOW_PREV_PROG_ACCESS From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE E On D.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = E.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST UTR ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UTR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND UTR.ORR_DECISION = 'Approve' Where A.DOB = To_Date(v_Search_Value, 'mm/dd/yyyy') And A.UAC_STATUS in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'DISCHARGED') Order by DATE_ADMITTED Desc FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Else Open cur_OUT For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, GENDER, Case When CURRENT_STATUS is null Then A.UAC_STATUS Else B.CURRENT_STATUS End as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, '' as APPROVED_FIELD_OFFICE, '' as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, C.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, E.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY AS DISCHARGE_TYPE, RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, COUNT(*) Over() as rowC, CASE WHEN (datediff('Day', B.DATE_DISCHARGED, CURRENT_DATE) <= 45) OR B.DATE_DISCHARGED Is Null OR (SELECT LOCK_RECORD FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN datediff('Hour', DATETIME_CREATED, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) >= (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE UPPER(PARAM_NAME) = UPPER('UnlockHours')) THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS LOCK_RECORD FROM UAC_UNLOCKED_HIST WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND NOT DATETIME_CREATED Is Null ORDER BY UNLOCKED_HIST_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )) = 'NO' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS LOCKED ,UTR.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID ,Case When A.UAC_STATUS ='ENROUTE' OR A.UAC_STATUS ='IN-TRANSFER' Then 1 Else 0 End as ALLOW_PREV_PROG_ACCESS From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE E On D.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = E.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST UTR ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UTR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND UTR.ORR_DECISION = 'Approve' Where A.DOB = To_Date(v_Search_Value, 'mm/dd/yyyy') Order by DATE_ADMITTED Desc FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; End If; Else If isNumeric(v_Search_Value) = 1 Or (Length(v_Search_Value) > 1 And isNumeric(Substr(v_Search_Value, 0, Length(v_Search_Value) - 1)) = 1) Then Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, GENDER, Case When CURRENT_STATUS is null Then A.UAC_STATUS Else B.CURRENT_STATUS End as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, '' as APPROVED_FIELD_OFFICE, '' as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, C.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, E.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY AS DISCHARGE_TYPE, RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, COUNT(*) Over() as rowC, CASE WHEN (datediff('Day', B.DATE_DISCHARGED, CURRENT_DATE) <= 45) OR B.DATE_DISCHARGED Is Null OR (SELECT LOCK_RECORD FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN datediff('Hour', DATETIME_CREATED, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) >= (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE UPPER(PARAM_NAME) = UPPER('UnlockHours')) THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS LOCK_RECORD FROM UAC_UNLOCKED_HIST WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND NOT DATETIME_CREATED Is Null ORDER BY UNLOCKED_HIST_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )) = 'NO' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS LOCKED ,UTR.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID ,Case When A.UAC_STATUS ='ENROUTE' OR A.UAC_STATUS ='IN-TRANSFER' Then 1 Else 0 End as ALLOW_PREV_PROG_ACCESS From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE E On D.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = E.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST UTR ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UTR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND UTR.ORR_DECISION = 'Approve' Where UPPER(ALIEN_NO) like v_Param1 Order by DATE_ADMITTED Desc FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Elsif v_RoleType = 'ChildAdvocade' Or v_RoleType = 'LegalServices' Then Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, GENDER, Case When CURRENT_STATUS is null Then A.UAC_STATUS Else B.CURRENT_STATUS End as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, '' as APPROVED_FIELD_OFFICE, '' as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, C.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, E.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY AS DISCHARGE_TYPE, RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, COUNT(*) Over() as rowC, CASE WHEN (datediff('Day', B.DATE_DISCHARGED, CURRENT_DATE) <= 45) OR B.DATE_DISCHARGED Is Null OR (SELECT LOCK_RECORD FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN datediff('Hour', DATETIME_CREATED, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) >= (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE UPPER(PARAM_NAME) = UPPER('UnlockHours')) THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS LOCK_RECORD FROM UAC_UNLOCKED_HIST WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND NOT DATETIME_CREATED Is Null ORDER BY UNLOCKED_HIST_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )) = 'NO' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS LOCKED ,UTR.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID ,Case When A.UAC_STATUS ='ENROUTE' OR A.UAC_STATUS ='IN-TRANSFER' Then 1 Else 0 End as ALLOW_PREV_PROG_ACCESS From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE E On D.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = E.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST UTR ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UTR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND UTR.ORR_DECISION = 'Approve' Where (UPPER(FIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(LAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID) like v_Param1 or UPPER(C.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1 Or UPPER(E.DISCHARGE_TYPE) Like v_Param1 Or UPPER(E.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY) Like v_Param1) And A.UAC_STATUS in ('ADMITTED', 'IN-TRANSFER', 'DISCHARGED') Order by DATE_ADMITTED Desc FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; Else Open cur_Out For Select Distinct A.UAC_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, ALIEN_NO, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AKA, DOB, COB, GENDER, Case When CURRENT_STATUS is null Then A.UAC_STATUS Else B.CURRENT_STATUS End as UAC_STATUS,B.DATE_ADMITTED, B.DATE_DISCHARGED, C.PROGRAM_NAME, '' as APPROVED_FIELD_OFFICE, '' as ORR_APPROVED_DATE, C.PROGRAM_ID, DATE_OF_APPREHENSION, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(B.DATE_ADMITTED) LOS, E.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY AS DISCHARGE_TYPE, RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID, COUNT(*) Over() as rowC, CASE WHEN (datediff('Day', B.DATE_DISCHARGED, CURRENT_DATE) <= 45) OR B.DATE_DISCHARGED Is Null OR (SELECT LOCK_RECORD FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN datediff('Hour', DATETIME_CREATED, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) >= (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROm UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE UPPER(PARAM_NAME) = UPPER('UnlockHours')) THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS LOCK_RECORD FROM UAC_UNLOCKED_HIST WHERE UAC_PROGRAM_ID = B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND NOT DATETIME_CREATED Is Null ORDER BY UNLOCKED_HIST_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )) = 'NO' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS LOCKED ,UTR.PROPOSED_PROGRAM_ID ,Case When A.UAC_STATUS ='ENROUTE' OR A.UAC_STATUS ='IN-TRANSFER' Then 1 Else 0 End as ALLOW_PREV_PROG_ACCESS From UAC_INFO A Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B On A.UAC_ID = B.UAC_ID Left join LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID Left Join UAC_PROGRAM_EXIT D On B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID Left Join LIST_DISCHARGE_TYPE E On D.TYPE_OF_DISCHARGE = E.DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN UAC_TRANSFER_REQUEST UTR ON B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = UTR.UAC_PROGRAM_ID AND UTR.ORR_DECISION = 'Approve' Where (UPPER(FIRST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(LAST_NAME) like v_Param1 or UPPER(RELATIONSHIP_GRP_ID) like v_Param1 or UPPER(C.PROGRAM_NAME) like v_Param1 Or UPPER(E.DISCHARGE_TYPE) Like v_Param1 Or UPPER(E.DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY) Like v_Param1) Order by DATE_ADMITTED Desc FETCH FIRST 150 ROWS ONLY; End If; End If; END SP_SEARCH_BY_UAC;

routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_PROGRAM_INFO" ( vUacId IN NUMBER, vSponsorId IN NUMBER, cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS
BEGIN OPEN cur_OUT FOR select B.Program_ID, B.PROGRAM_NAME,U.ALIEN_NO, E.UAC_ID, C.uac_program_id From SPONSOR_INFO A Inner Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST E On A.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and a.is_deleted = 0 and e.is_deleted = 0 Inner Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On E.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Inner Join List_Programs B On C.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID Inner Join UAC_INFO U On E.UAC_ID = U.UAC_ID Where C.UAC_id = vUacId and A.SPONSOR_ID = vSponsorId; END SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_PROGRAM_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UAC_INFO
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UAC_INFO ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID IN VARCHAR2, cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10,0) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; BEGIN OPEN cur_Out FOR SELECT E.UAC_ID, C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.SPONSOR_ID, HTML_CHARACTER_TO_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS(A.FIRST_NAME) AS FIRST_NAME, HTML_CHARACTER_TO_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS(A.LAST_NAME) AS LAST_NAME, A.SSN, E.SPONSOR_ADDRESS || ' ' || E.SPONSOR_ADDRESS_SECONDARY AS ADDRESS, E.SPONSOR_CITY AS city, E.SPONSOR_STATE AS state,
-- Curr_Sponsor logic CASE WHEN NVL(E.CURRENT_SPONSOR, 0) = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS Curr_Sponsor,
P_Counter, A_Counter, B.Program_ID, PROGRAM_NAME,
-- Flag logic CASE WHEN NVL(A.FLAG, 0) = 1 OR NVL(A.FLAG_ADDRESS, 0) = 1 OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SponsorFlag WHERE SPONSORID = A.SPONSOR_ID) THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS Flag,
-- Show Old Sponsor Form logic CASE WHEN TO_DATE(E.DATE_CREATED, 'DD-MON-RR') <= (SELECT TO_DATE(PARAM_VALUE, 'DD-MON-RR') FROM UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE PARAM_NAME = 'OLD_SPONSOR_FORM_DATE') OR E.DATE_CREATED IS NULL THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END AS SHOW_OLD_SPONSOR_FORM,
A.DOB, A.COB, (SELECT ISO_CODE FROM LIST_COUNTRIES WHERE COUNTRY_NAME = A.COB) AS ISO_COB, A.COR, (SELECT ISO_CODE FROM LIST_COUNTRIES WHERE COUNTRY_NAME = A.COR) AS ISO_COR, A.HOME_PHONE, LOWER(HTML_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS_TO_CHARACTER(UPPER(A.EMAIL))) AS EMAIL, E.PRIMARY_LANGUAGE,
-- Sponsor Type logic CASE WHEN E.SF_APPLICATION_TYPE IS NULL THEN 'Create' ELSE INITCAP(E.SF_APPLICATION_TYPE) END AS SPONSOR_TYPE,
-- Additional parameters for Sponsor Experience (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROM UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE APP_TYPE = 'SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE' AND PARAM_NAME = 'AI_SERVICE_DOMAIN') AS SPONSOR_SERVICE,
(SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROM UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE APP_TYPE = 'SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE' AND PARAM_NAME = 'SALESFORCE_SERVICE_OPEN') AS SALESFORCE_SERVICE_OPEN,
(SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROM UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE APP_TYPE = 'SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE' AND PARAM_NAME = 'SALESFORCE_SERVICE_CREATE') AS SALESFORCE_SERVICE_CREATE,
-- SF Application ID logic (SELECT DISTINCT SF_APPLICATION_ID FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST WHERE SPONSOR_ID = A.SPONSOR_ID AND SF_APPLICATION_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 1) AS SF_APPLICATION_ID,
-- SF Application Type logic CASE WHEN UPPER(E.SF_APPLICATION_TYPE) LIKE 'CANCEL%' THEN 'Create' WHEN E.SF_APPLICATION_TYPE IS NOT NULL THEN INITCAP(E.SF_APPLICATION_TYPE) WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST WHERE sponsor_id = A.SPONSOR_ID AND sf_application_id IS NOT NULL) THEN 'Add' WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM UAC_SPONSOR_LIST WHERE sponsor_id = A.SPONSOR_ID AND sf_application_id IS NULL) THEN 'Create' WHEN E.SF_APPLICATION_ID IS NULL THEN 'Create' ELSE INITCAP(E.SF_APPLICATION_TYPE) END AS SF_APPLICATION_TYPE,
-- UC Information HTML_CHARACTER_TO_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS(U.FIRST_NAME) AS UCFirstName, HTML_CHARACTER_TO_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS(U.LAST_NAME) AS UCLastName, U.DOB AS UCDOB, U.UAC_ID AS UCPortalId, U.ALIEN_NO AS UCANumber, U.COB AS UCCountryOfOrigin,
(SELECT ISO_CODE FROM LIST_COUNTRIES WHERE COUNTRY_NAME = U.COB) AS ISO_UCCountryOfOrigin,
C.CURRENT_STATUS,
-- Salesforce Service Enabled (SELECT PARAM_VALUE FROM UACPORTAL_APP_PARAMS WHERE APP_TYPE = 'SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE' AND PARAM_NAME = 'SALESFORCE_SERVICE_ENABLED') AS SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_ENABLED
FROM SPONSOR_INFO A INNER JOIN UAC_SPONSOR_LIST E ON A.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID AND A.IS_DELETED = 0 AND E.IS_DELETED = 0 INNER JOIN UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C ON E.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS B ON C.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID INNER JOIN UAC_INFO U ON E.UAC_ID = U.UAC_ID WHERE C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ ORDER BY A.UPTIME DESC;
END SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UAC_INFO;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UAC_PROGRAMS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UAC_PROGRAMS ( V_SPONSOR_ID IN NUMBER , cur_Out OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS
BEGIN Open cur_Out For SELECT distinct C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID, A.SPONSOR_ID, C.UAC_ID, U.SF_APPLICATION_TYPE, U.ALIEN_NO From SPONSOR_INFO A Join UAC_SPONSOR_LIST E On A.SPONSOR_ID = E.SPONSOR_ID and a.is_deleted = 0 and e.is_deleted = 0 Join UAC_PROGRAM_INFO C On E.UAC_ID = C.UAC_ID Join List_Programs B On C.PROGRAM_ID = B.PROGRAM_ID Join UAC_INFO U On E.UAC_ID = U.UAC_ID --inner join UAC_DOCUMENTS D On C.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = D.UAC_PROGRAM_ID WHERE A.SPONSOR_ID = V_SPONSOR_ID AND (C.CURRENT_STATUS = 'ADMITTED' or C.CURRENT_STATUS ='IN-TRANSFER') order by A.Sponsor_id; END SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UAC_PROGRAMS;

UACPORTAL.SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UPD_ARI_DATE
routine.definition: PROCEDURE SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UPD_ARI_DATE ( v_UAC_ID IN NUMBER , v_SPONSOR_ID IN NUMBER , v_DATE_ARI_RECEIVED IN VARCHAR2 , v_USER_NAME IN VARCHAR2 ) AS status_ VARCHAR2(112); BEGIN --dbms_output.Put_line(uacIdVar_); --display SELECT UAC_STATUS into status_ FROM UAC_INFO WHERE UAC_ID = v_UAC_ID; if status_ = 'DISCHARGED' then update UAC_SPONSOR_LIST --set DATE_IDENTITY = drAriDate_ set UPTIME = SYSTIMESTAMP , UPUSER = 'Sponsor Application' , DATE_APPLICATION_RECEIVED = null where SPONSOR_ID = v_SPONSOR_ID and UAC_ID = v_UAC_ID and is_deleted = 0; else update UAC_SPONSOR_LIST --set DATE_IDENTITY = drAriDate_ set UPTIME = SYSTIMESTAMP , UPUSER = 'Sponsor Application' , ARI_DATE_RECEIVED = SYSTIMESTAMP , DATE_APPLICATION_RECEIVED = null where SPONSOR_ID = v_SPONSOR_ID and UAC_ID = v_UAC_ID and is_deleted = 0; end if; /* update UAC_SPONSOR_LIST --set DATE_IDENTITY = drAriDate_ set UPTIME = SYSTIMESTAMP , UPUSER = v_USER_NAME , ARI_DATE_RECEIVED = SYSTIMESTAMP , DATE_APPLICATION_RECEIVED = null where SPONSOR_ID = v_SPONSOR_ID and UAC_ID = v_UAC_ID; */ END SP_SPONSOR_EXPERIENCE_UPD_ARI_DATE;

routine.definition: PROCEDURE "SP_SPONSOR_INFO" ( SPONSOR_ID IN NUMBER, cur_OUT OUT SYS_REFCURSOR ) AS sponsorId_ NUMBER(10) := SPONSOR_ID; BEGIN OPEN cur_OUT FOR Select A.*, (Select Relationship from LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = A.SPONSOR_RELATIONSHIP_TO_UAC) S_TO_UAC, (Select Relationship from LIST_RELATIONSHIP Where RELATIONSHIP_ID = A.UAC_RELATIONSHIP_TO_SPONSOR) UAC_TO_S, (Select Legal_Status from LIST_LEGAL_STATUS Where LEGAL_STATUS_ID = A.LEGAL_STATUS_ID) as LEGAL_STATUS, Trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN (sysdate, DOB) /12) as Age from SPONSOR_INFO A Where A.Sponsor_ID = sponsorId_ and a.is_deleted = 0; END SP_SPONSOR_INFO;

routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_UPD_CURRENT_LOCATION" ( vCHILD_LCTN_HIST_ID IN NUMBER, vCHILD_LOCATION_TYPE IN NUMBER, vLIVING_WITH_SPONSOR IN NUMBER, vLIVING_WITH_CAREGIVER IN NUMBER, vADDRESS_KNOWN IN NUMBER, vPRIMARY_CAREGIVER_TYPE IN NUMBER, vPRIMARY_CAREGIVER_OTHER IN VARCHAR2 := null, vLOCATION_ADDRESS IN VARCHAR2, vLOCATION_ADDRESS_SECONDARY IN VARCHAR2 := null, vLOCATION_CITY IN VARCHAR2, vLOCATION_STATE IN VARCHAR2, vLOCATION_ZIPCODE IN VARCHAR2, vLOCATION_COUNTRY IN NUMBER, vLOCATION_COUNTY IN VARCHAR2, vLOCATION_LATITUDE IN VARCHAR2, vLOCATION_LONGITUDE IN VARCHAR2, vSMARTY_STREET_VALIDATION IN VARCHAR2, vCAREGIVER_FIRST_NAME IN VARCHAR2, vCAREGIVER_LAST_NAME IN VARCHAR2, vCAREGIVER_PHONE IN VARCHAR2, vNOTES IN VARCHAR2 := null, vUSER IN VARCHAR2, vREASON_FOR_UPDATE_ID IN NUMBER ) AS childLCTNHIST_Id_ NUMBER(10,0) := vCHILD_LCTN_HIST_ID; n NUMBER(4); BEGIN --Check if there is a UAC_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST record with select count(*) into n from ( Select 1 from UAC_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST WHERE CHILD_LCTN_HIST_ID = childLCTNHIST_Id_ Union Select 0 from dual ); if n > 1 then UPDATE UAC_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST SET CHILD_LOCATION_TYPE = vCHILD_LOCATION_TYPE, LIVING_WITH_SPONSOR = vLIVING_WITH_SPONSOR, LIVING_WITH_CAREGIVER = vLIVING_WITH_CAREGIVER, ADDRESS_KNOWN = vADDRESS_KNOWN, PRIMARY_CAREGIVER_TYPE = vPRIMARY_CAREGIVER_TYPE, PRIMARY_CAREGIVER_OTHER = vPRIMARY_CAREGIVER_OTHER, LOCATION_ADDRESS = vLOCATION_ADDRESS, LOCATION_ADDRESS_SECONDARY = vLOCATION_ADDRESS_SECONDARY, LOCATION_CITY = vLOCATION_CITY, LOCATION_STATE = vLOCATION_STATE, LOCATION_ZIPCODE = vLOCATION_ZIPCODE, LOCATION_COUNTRY = vLOCATION_COUNTRY, LOCATION_COUNTY = vLOCATION_COUNTY, LOCATION_LATITUDE = vLOCATION_LATITUDE, LOCATION_LONGITUDE = vLOCATION_LONGITUDE, SMARTY_STREET_VALIDATION = vSMARTY_STREET_VALIDATION, DATE_LAST_UPDATED = SYSDATE, USER_LAST_UPDATED = vUSER, CAREGIVER_FIRST_NAME = vCAREGIVER_FIRST_NAME, CAREGIVER_LAST_NAME = vCAREGIVER_LAST_NAME, CAREGIVER_PHONE = vCAREGIVER_PHONE, NOTES = vNOTES, REASON_FOR_UPDATE_ID = vREASON_FOR_UPDATE_ID WHERE CHILD_LCTN_HIST_ID = childLCTNHIST_Id_; End If;
END SP_UPD_CURRENT_LOCATION;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.SP_UPD_FC_TRAVEL_REQUEST
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_UPD_FC_TRAVEL_REQUEST" ( v_TRAVEL_REQUEST_ID NUMBER, v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID NUMBER, v_DATE_REQUESTED DATE, v_REQUESTOR_NAME VARCHAR2, v_REQUESTOR_PHONE VARCHAR2, v_REQUESTOR_EMAIL VARCHAR2,
v_CHILD_NAME VARCHAR2, v_CHILD_ALIEN_NO VARCHAR2,
v_DATE_TRAVEL_BEGIN DATE, v_DATE_TRAVEL_END DATE, v_CHILD_NAME_ON_TRAVEL VARCHAR2,
v_CHILD_RELATIONSHIP VARCHAR2, v_CONTACT_NUMBER VARCHAR2, v_ADDRESS_CHILD_STAY VARCHAR2,
v_TRANSPORTATION_MODE_ID NUMBER, v_TRANSPORTATION_INFO VARCHAR2, v_VEHICLE_MAKE_ID NUMBER, v_VEHICLE_MODEL VARCHAR2, v_LICENSE_PLATE VARCHAR2,
v_PRIMARY_DRIVERS_NAME VARCHAR2, v_DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER VARCHAR2, v_DRIVERS_LICENSE_STATE VARCHAR2, v_INSURANCE_COMPANY VARCHAR2, v_POLICTY_NUMBER VARCHAR2,
v_TRAVEL_REASON VARCHAR2, v_TRAVEL_COMPLIES_STATE_RULES VARCHAR2, v_NONCOMPLIANCE_EXPLANATION VARCHAR2, v_TRIP_SUMMARY VARCHAR2, v_CHILD_SUPERVISION_PLAN VARCHAR2, v_TRAVEL_SAFETY_CONCERN VARCHAR2, v_SAFETY_CONCERN_EXPLANATION VARCHAR2, v_HAS_FLIGHT_RISK NUMBER, v_FLIGHT_RISK_EXPLANATION VARCHAR2, v_TRAVEL_COMMENT VARCHAR2,
v_DATE_COMMENT DATE, v_ORR_OFFICIAL VARCHAR2, v_UPUSER VARCHAR2, v_CMD_TYPE VARCHAR2 ) AS
BEGIN
if UPPER(v_CMD_TYPE) = 'INSERT' Then
Insert into UAC_FOSTER_CARE_TRAVEL_REQUEST ( TRAVEL_REQUEST_ID, UAC_PROGRAM_ID, DATE_REQUESTED, REQUESTOR_NAME,REQUESTOR_PHONE, REQUESTOR_EMAIL,
CHILD_NAME, CHILD_ALIEN_NO, DATE_TRAVEL_BEGIN, DATE_TRAVEL_END, CHILD_NAME_ON_TRAVEL, CHILD_RELATIONSHIP,CONTACT_NUMBER,ADDRESS_CHILD_STAY,
TRANSPORTATION_MODE_ID,TRANSPORTATION_INFO,VEHICLE_MAKE_ID,VEHICLE_MODEL, LICENSE_PLATE, PRIMARY_DRIVERS_NAME,DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER, DRIVERS_LICENSE_STATE,INSURANCE_COMPANY,POLICTY_NUMBER, TRAVEL_REASON,TRAVEL_COMPLIES_STATE_RULES,NONCOMPLIANCE_EXPLANATION, TRIP_SUMMARY,CHILD_SUPERVISION_PLAN,TRAVEL_SAFETY_CONCERN, SAFETY_CONCERN_EXPLANATION,HAS_FLIGHT_RISK,FLIGHT_RISK_EXPLANATION,TRAVEL_COMMENT,
DATE_COMMENT,ORR_OFFICIAL, DATE_CREATED, USER_CREATED,UPTIME,UPUSER) SELECT SEQ_TRAVEL_REQUEST.NEXTVAL, v_UAC_PROGRAM_ID, v_DATE_REQUESTED, v_REQUESTOR_NAME,v_REQUESTOR_PHONE, v_REQUESTOR_EMAIL,
v_CHILD_NAME, v_CHILD_ALIEN_NO, v_DATE_TRAVEL_BEGIN, v_DATE_TRAVEL_END, v_CHILD_NAME_ON_TRAVEL,v_CHILD_RELATIONSHIP,v_CONTACT_NUMBER,v_ADDRESS_CHILD_STAY,
v_TRANSPORTATION_MODE_ID,v_TRANSPORTATION_INFO,v_VEHICLE_MAKE_ID,v_VEHICLE_MODEL, v_LICENSE_PLATE, v_PRIMARY_DRIVERS_NAME,v_DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER,v_DRIVERS_LICENSE_STATE, v_INSURANCE_COMPANY,v_POLICTY_NUMBER,v_TRAVEL_REASON,v_TRAVEL_COMPLIES_STATE_RULES, v_NONCOMPLIANCE_EXPLANATION,v_TRIP_SUMMARY, v_CHILD_SUPERVISION_PLAN,v_TRAVEL_SAFETY_CONCERN,v_SAFETY_CONCERN_EXPLANATION, v_HAS_FLIGHT_RISK,v_FLIGHT_RISK_EXPLANATION,v_TRAVEL_COMMENT, v_DATE_COMMENT,v_ORR_OFFICIAL, sysdate,v_UPUSER, sysdate,v_UPUSER from dual; commit; elsif UPPER(v_CMD_TYPE) = 'UPDATE' Then update UAC_FOSTER_CARE_TRAVEL_REQUEST set DATE_REQUESTED=v_DATE_REQUESTED, REQUESTOR_NAME=v_REQUESTOR_NAME, REQUESTOR_PHONE=v_REQUESTOR_PHONE, REQUESTOR_EMAIL=v_REQUESTOR_EMAIL, CHILD_NAME=v_CHILD_NAME, CHILD_ALIEN_NO=v_CHILD_ALIEN_NO, DATE_TRAVEL_BEGIN=v_DATE_TRAVEL_BEGIN,DATE_TRAVEL_END=v_DATE_TRAVEL_END, CHILD_NAME_ON_TRAVEL=v_CHILD_NAME_ON_TRAVEL,CHILD_RELATIONSHIP=v_CHILD_RELATIONSHIP, CONTACT_NUMBER=v_CONTACT_NUMBER,ADDRESS_CHILD_STAY=v_ADDRESS_CHILD_STAY,
TRANSPORTATION_MODE_ID=v_TRANSPORTATION_MODE_ID,TRANSPORTATION_INFO=v_TRANSPORTATION_INFO, VEHICLE_MAKE_ID=v_VEHICLE_MAKE_ID,VEHICLE_MODEL=v_VEHICLE_MODEL, LICENSE_PLATE=v_LICENSE_PLATE, PRIMARY_DRIVERS_NAME=v_PRIMARY_DRIVERS_NAME, DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER=v_DRIVERS_LICENSE_NUMBER,DRIVERS_LICENSE_STATE=v_DRIVERS_LICENSE_STATE, INSURANCE_COMPANY=v_INSURANCE_COMPANY,POLICTY_NUMBER=v_POLICTY_NUMBER, TRAVEL_REASON=v_TRAVEL_REASON,TRAVEL_COMPLIES_STATE_RULES=v_TRAVEL_COMPLIES_STATE_RULES, NONCOMPLIANCE_EXPLANATION=v_NONCOMPLIANCE_EXPLANATION,TRIP_SUMMARY=v_TRIP_SUMMARY, CHILD_SUPERVISION_PLAN=v_CHILD_SUPERVISION_PLAN,TRAVEL_SAFETY_CONCERN=v_TRAVEL_SAFETY_CONCERN, SAFETY_CONCERN_EXPLANATION=v_SAFETY_CONCERN_EXPLANATION,HAS_FLIGHT_RISK=v_HAS_FLIGHT_RISK, FLIGHT_RISK_EXPLANATION=v_FLIGHT_RISK_EXPLANATION,TRAVEL_COMMENT=v_TRAVEL_COMMENT, DATE_COMMENT=v_DATE_COMMENT,ORR_OFFICIAL=v_ORR_OFFICIAL, UPTIME=SYSDATE, UPUSER=v_UPUSER where TRAVEL_REQUEST_ID=v_TRAVEL_REQUEST_ID; commit; end if;
END SP_UPD_FC_TRAVEL_REQUEST;

UACPORTAL.SP_UPD_UAC_STATUS
routine.definition:
PROCEDURE "SP_UPD_UAC_STATUS" ( UAC_PROGRAM_ID IN NUMBER, STATUS_TYPE IN VARCHAR2, UPUSER IN VARCHAR2 ) AS uacProgId_ NUMBER(10) := UAC_PROGRAM_ID; statusType_ VARCHAR2(50) := STATUS_TYPE; userId_ VARCHAR2(112) := UPUSER; BEGIN If statusType_ = 'IN-TRANSFER' Then -- Set up Location History for IN-TRANSFER INSERT INTO UAC_CHILD_LOCATION_HIST ( UAC_ID, DISCHARGE_TYPE_ID, DISCHARGE_TYPE, LOCATION_TYPE_ID, LOCATION_TYPE, LOCATION_NAME, LOCATION_ADDRESS, LOCATION_ADDRESS_SECONDARY, LOCATION_CITY, LOCATION_STATE, LOCATION_ZIPCODE, DATE_LAST_UPDATED, USER_LAST_UPDATED, ISDELETED, PROGRAM_ID, UAC_PROGRAM_ID) SELECT B.UAC_ID, null, null, null, 'Program', C.PROGRAM_NAME, C.ADDRESS, null, C.CITY, C.STATE, C.ZIPCODE, to_timestamp(to_char(B.DATE_ADMITTED, 'DD-MON-RR HH.MI.SS AM'),'DD-MON-RR HH.MI.SSXFF AM'), B.UPUSER, 1, B.PROGRAM_ID, B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID FROM UAC_PROGRAM_INFO B INNER JOIN LIST_PROGRAMS C On B.PROGRAM_ID = C.PROGRAM_ID WHERE B.UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; Update UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Set CURRENT_STATUS = 'IN-TRANSFER', UPTIME = Sysdate, Upuser = userId_ Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; Update UAC_INFO Set UAC_STATUS = 'IN-TRANSFER', UPTIME = Sysdate, Upuser = userId_ Where UAC_ID = (Select UAC_ID From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_); Else --Update UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Set CURRENT_STATUS = 'ADMITTED', UPTIME = Sysdate, Upuser = userId_ Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ AND CURRENT_STATUS='IN-TRANSFER'; Update UAC_INFO Set UAC_STATUS = 'ADMITTED', UPTIME = Sysdate, Upuser = userId_ Where UAC_ID = (Select UAC_ID From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ AND CURRENT_STATUS = 'IN-TRANSFER') And UAC_STATUS = 'IN-TRANSFER'; Update UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Set CURRENT_STATUS = 'ADMITTED', UPTIME = Sysdate, Upuser = userId_ Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_ AND CURRENT_STATUS='IN-TRANSFER'; End If;
--Insert Into UAC_PROGRAM_INFO (UAC_PROGRAM_ID, UAC_ID, PROGRAM_ID, DATE_REFERRED, CURRENT_STATUS, DATE_CREATED, USER_CREATED, UPTIME, UPUSER) --Select SEQ_UAC_PROGRAM_INFO.nextval, UAC_ID, progId_, sysdate, 'ENROUTE', sysdate, userId_, sysdate, userId_ --From UAC_PROGRAM_INFO Where UAC_PROGRAM_ID = uacProgId_; END SP_UPD_UAC_STATUS;

UACPORTAL.TR_INSERT_NEW_ORR_DECISION_HISTORY
routine.definition:
TRIGGER TR_INSERT_NEW_ORR_DECISION_HISTORY AFTER INSERT ON UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST FOR EACH ROW BEGIN
if ((:new.ORR_DECISION <> -1 AND Not :new.ORR_DECISION is Null) OR (:new.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS <> -1 AND Not :new.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS is Null) OR (:new.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS <> -1 AND Not :new.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS is Null) OR (:new.REMAND_REASON <> -1 AND Not :new.REMAND_REASON is Null) ) THEN INSERT INTO ORR_DECISION_HISTORY ( RELEASE_ID, ORR_DECISION, ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS, ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS, REMAND_REASON, UPTIME, UPUSER ) VALUES ( :new.RELEASE_ID, CASE WHEN :new.ORR_DECISION = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.ORR_DECISION END, CASE WHEN :new.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS END, CASE WHEN :new.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS END, CASE WHEN :new.REMAND_REASON = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.REMAND_REASON END, :new.UPTIME, :new.UPUSER ); End If; END;

routine.name: UACPORTAL.TR_INSERT_PRS_SERVICE_LVL_HIST
UACPORTAL.TR_INSERT_SPONSOR_HISTORY
UACPORTAL.TR_INSERT_UPD_ORR_DECISION_HISTORY
routine.definition:
TRIGGER TR_INSERT_UPD_ORR_DECISION_HISTORY AFTER UPDATE OF ORR_DECISION, ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS, ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS, REMAND_REASON ON UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST FOR EACH ROW BEGIN -- Insert record into ORR_DECISION_HISTORY table -- when either ORR_DECISION, ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS, ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS, REMAND_REASON -- fields are updated in UAC_RELEASE_REQUEST INSERT INTO ORR_DECISION_HISTORY ( RELEASE_ID, ORR_DECISION, ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS, ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS, REMAND_REASON, UPTIME, UPUSER ) VALUES ( :new.RELEASE_ID, CASE WHEN :new.ORR_DECISION = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.ORR_DECISION END, CASE WHEN :new.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.ORR_HOME_STUDY_STATUS END, CASE WHEN :new.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.ORR_DECISION_AFTER_HS END, CASE WHEN :new.REMAND_REASON = -1 THEN Null ELSE :new.REMAND_REASON END, :new.UPTIME, :new.UPUSER );
END;
